(e) Iyakokin Siyasa na Halitta Tsaunukan tsaunuka suna aiki a matsayin iyakokin siyasa na halitta tsakanin ƙasashen Notes kuma suna kare su daga mamayewa har zuwa wani mataki. Himalaya sun kafa iyaka tsakanin Indiya da China. (f) Tasiri ga Yanayi Yankunan tsaunuka suna da ƙarancin yanayin zafi. Suna aiki a matsayin rabuwar yanayi tsakanin yankuna biyu maƙwabta. Misali, Himalaya suna samar da shinge ga motsin iska mai sanyi daga Tsakiyar Asiya zuwa yankin Indiya na TECH. Suna kuma tilasta wa Kudu maso Yamma Monsoons su hau su haifar da ruwan sama a kan gangaren kudu. (g) Cibiyoyin Yawon Bude Ido Yanayi mai daɗi da kyawawan wurare na tsaunuka sun haifar da ci gaban su a matsayin cibiyoyin jan hankalin masu yawon buɗe ido. Masana'antar yawon buɗe ido da otal-otal suna samun ƙarin ƙarfafawa a irin waɗannan yankuna. Shimla, Nainital, Mussorie da Srinagar wasu daga cikin muhimman tashoshin tuddai na Indiya waɗanda ke jan hankalin masu yawon buɗe ido a duk faɗin duniya. TAMBAYOYIN RUBUTU 7.1 1. translation.en: 1.3 OPERATION ENVIROMENT A digital platform where you can store, organize, and read e-books. You Digital platform can access it through a website or apps on different devices. Good internet connection is really important so you can read your e- books anytime, anywhere without any interruptions. It makes sure Internet connectivity everything runs smoothly when you're browsing, downloading, or reading. The platform works with lots of devices like phones, tablets readers, and computers. That means you can read your e-books no Device compatibility matter which device you like to use. Get help easily with online guides, FAQs, and customer service User support whenever you need assistance using the e-book library. 1.4 MAJOR FEATURES  User Authentication and Authorization  Reading Experience Enhancement  A Web Portal of E-books for all users.  A database to store all books data and receive updates for the new added books in the library.  Secure online book issuing system to issue books to all staff and students.  Web portal for librarian to manage Library data features. 2. Elicitation: Requirement elicitation is the process of collecting the requirements of a system or requirement gathering from user, customers and stakeholders by conducting meetings, interviews, and prototyping. translation.ha: 1.3 MUHALLIN AIKI Dandalin dijital inda za ku iya adanawa, tsarawa, da kuma karanta littattafan lantarki na . Dandalin dijital na iya samun damar shiga ta hanyar gidan yanar gizo ko manhajoji akan na'urori daban-daban. Kyakkyawan haɗin intanet yana da matuƙar mahimmanci don haka za ku iya karanta littattafan lantarki na <TECH> a kowane lokaci, ko'ina ba tare da wani katsewa ba. Yana tabbatar da cewa haɗin Intanet yana gudana cikin sauƙi lokacin da kuke lilo, saukewa, ko karatu. Dandalin yana aiki tare da na'urori da yawa kamar wayoyi, masu karanta kwamfutar hannu, da kwamfutoci. Wannan yana nufin za ku iya karanta littattafan lantarki naku ba tare da jituwa da na'ura ba komai na'urar da kuke son amfani da ita. Sami taimako cikin sauƙi tare da jagororin kan layi, Tambayoyi akai-akai, da tallafin sabis na abokin ciniki <TECH>Mai amfani duk lokacin da kuke buƙatar taimako ta amfani da ɗakin karatu na littafin lantarki. 1.4 MUHIMMAN FASALI  Mai amfani Tabbatarwa da Izini  Inganta Ƙwarewar Karatu  Tashar Yanar Gizo ta littattafan lantarki ga duk masu amfani.  Tashar bayanai ta  don adana duk bayanan littattafai  da karɓar sabuntawa don sabbin littattafan da aka ƙara a cikin ɗakin karatu.  Tsarin bayar da littattafai na kan layi na  don bayar da littattafai ga dukkan ma'aikata da ɗalibai.  Tashar yanar gizo don mai kula da ɗakin karatu don sarrafa fasalulluka na Bayanai na Laburare. 2. translation.en: 619 Smruti R. Sarangi thatisperformed. Incomparison,wemightbeinterestedintransient analysis. Hereweareinterestedin thevariationoftemperatureacrosstime. Forexample,wemightbeinterestedtoknowhowlongittakes the temperature to rise to a given value after the power consumption of a functional unit is increased. Thermal time constants are typically of the order of milliseconds, and thus whenever we are interested in finer timescales we opt for transient analysis. Note that transient analysis is far more expensive in terms of time and computational resources as compared to steady-state analysis. Definition 95 When the power profile does not vary, and we are interested in the temperature profile after it has stabilized, we perform steady-state analysis. In comparison, if we wish to compute the variation of temperature over time, we opt for transient analysis. This is more expensive than steady-state analysis in terms of both computational time and computational resources. 11.2.2 Basic Physics Itisnecessarytoprovideabriefoverviewofthephysicsofheattransfertounderstandhowtemperature is modeled in modern chips. There are three primary mechanisms for heat transfer. Heat Transfer Mechanisms Conduction This is a process of heat transfer between objects that are in direct contact. Heat is transferred from the object that has a higher temperature to the object that has a lower temper- ature. For example, if we touch a hot electric iron, heat is transferred from it to our fingers. In a semiconductor chip, this is the primary mode of heat transfer within the package. Convection Thiskindofheattransferoccurswithinafluid(liquidorgas). Forexample,nearanactive volcano,hotairandhotgasesriseupintotheatmosphere,effectivelyheatinguptheupperreaches of the atmosphere. Cold air takes its place, its temperature rises, and then it rises up in the same manner. The heat sink behaves similarly. When the processor is running, the temperature of the heat sink rises which further increases the temperature of the nearby air. This hot air expands and moves through the cabinet, and cold air takes its place. The heat sink is effective because of this process of convective cooling. Sometimes, it is necessary to increase the velocity of air such that this process becomes more efficient, and this is why fans are required in laptop, desktop, and server processors. Radiation Radiativeheattransferhappensinfreespace. Anyheatedobjectemitsradiationatdifferent frequencies, and when this radiation is absorbed by remote objects their temperature rises. This method of heat transfer sustains our life. This is how the sun transfers its energy to our planet! In semiconductor chips we are mostly interested in conductive cooling. There are two kinds of conductive processes in modern systems. Vertical and Lateral Heat Conduction Most of the heat escapes vertically, i.e., through the heat spreader and the heat sink. This is a desirable feature because the rest of the boundaries are mostly adiabatic. However, we do have some lateral heat conduction, where the heat flows sideways. This can happen either through the silicon die, or via the heat spreader. Even though lateral heat conduction is not as large as vertical heat conduction, it is still an important heat transfer mechanism and determines the placement of tasks and components on the chip as we shall see in Section 11.4.
translation.ha: 619 Smruti R. Sarangi wanda aka yi. Idan ba a kwatanta ba, za mu iya sha'awar nazarin yanayin wucin gadi. Muna sha'awar bambancin yanayin zafi a kowane lokaci. Misali, za mu iya sha'awar sanin tsawon lokacin da zafin jiki zai ɗauka ya tashi zuwa wani ƙima bayan an ƙara yawan amfani da wutar lantarki na na'urar aiki. Madaidaitan lokacin zafi yawanci suna da tsari na milliseconds, don haka duk lokacin da muke sha'awar mafi kyawun lokaci, muna zaɓar nazarin yanayin wucin gadi. Lura cewa nazarin yanayin wucin gadi ya fi tsada dangane da lokaci da albarkatun lissafi idan aka kwatanta da nazarin yanayin dindindin. Ma'ana 95 Lokacin da bayanin wutar lantarki bai bambanta ba, kuma muna sha'awar bayanin yanayin zafi bayan ya daidaita, muna yin nazarin yanayin dindindin. Idan aka kwatanta, idan muna son ƙididdige bambancin zafin jiki akan lokaci, muna zaɓar nazarin yanayin wucin gadi. Wannan ya fi tsada fiye da nazarin yanayin dindindin dangane da lokacin lissafi da albarkatun lissafi. 11.2.2 Asali na Fizik Yana da mahimmanci a samar da taƙaitaccen bayani game da kimiyyar canja wurin zafi don fahimtar yadda ake kwaikwayon yanayin zafi a cikin kwakwalwan zamani. Akwai manyan hanyoyi guda uku don canja wurin zafi. Hanyoyin Canja wurin Zafi Wannan tsari ne na canja wurin zafi tsakanin abubuwan da ke hulɗa kai tsaye. Ana canja wurin zafi daga abin da ke da zafi mafi girma zuwa abin da ke da ƙarancin zafin jiki. Misali, idan muka taɓa ƙarfe mai zafi na lantarki, ana canja wurin zafi daga gare shi zuwa yatsunmu. A cikin guntun semiconductor, wannan shine babban hanyar canja wurin zafi a cikin kunshin. Convection Wannan nau'in canja wurin zafi yana faruwa tare da ruwa (ruwa). Misali, dutsen mai aman wuta mai kusa, zafi da iskar gas mai zafi suna tashi zuwa yanayi, suna dumama sama da sararin samaniya yadda ya kamata. Iska mai sanyi tana maye gurbinta, zafinta yana tashi, sannan tana tashi sama ta wannan hanyar. Injin dumama yana aiki iri ɗaya. Lokacin da mai sarrafawa ke aiki, zafin wurin dumama yana tashi wanda ke ƙara ƙara zafin iskar da ke kusa. Wannan iska mai zafi tana faɗaɗawa kuma tana ratsa cikin kabad, kuma iska mai sanyi ta maye gurbinta. Wurin dumama yana da tasiri saboda wannan tsari na sanyaya iska. Wani lokaci, yana da mahimmanci a ƙara saurin iska ta yadda wannan tsari zai zama mafi inganci, kuma wannan shine dalilin da yasa ake buƙatar magoya baya a cikin na'urori masu sarrafawa na kwamfutar tafi-da-gidanka, tebur, da kuma na'urorin sabar. Radiation Radiativezafin canja wurin zafi yana faruwa a cikin sararin samaniya kyauta. Duk wani abu mai zafi yana haskakawa a mitoci daban-daban, kuma lokacin da wannan hasken ya sha ta abubuwa masu nisa, zafin jikinsu yana ƙaruwa. Wannan hanyar canja wurin zafi tana kiyaye rayuwarmu. Wannan shine yadda rana ke aika kuzarinta zuwa duniyarmu! A cikin kwakwalwan semiconductor muna da sha'awar sanyaya mai sarrafawa. Akwai nau'ikan hanyoyin gudanarwa guda biyu a cikin tsarin zamani. Gudanar da Zafi a tsaye da kuma a gefe Yawancin zafi yana fita a tsaye, wato, ta hanyar watsa zafi da wurin nutsewa. Wannan fasali ne mai kyau saboda sauran iyakokin galibi adiabatic ne. Duk da haka, muna da wasu hanyoyin isar da zafi a gefe, inda zafi ke gudana a gefe. Wannan na iya faruwa ko dai ta hanyar silicon die, ko ta hanyar watsa zafi. Ko da yake watsa zafi a gefe ba shi da girma kamar watsa zafi a tsaye, har yanzu muhimmin hanyar canja wurin zafi ce kuma tana ƙayyade wurin da ayyuka da abubuwan da aka haɗa a kan guntu kamar yadda za mu gani a Sashe na 11.4.

translation.en: 159 Smruti R. Sarangi store (S) is the most recent store in the store set. There are several ways in which we can enforce a dependence. For example, we can proceed to find the instruction window entry of the store S, and then wait for S to be issued first. To find the instruction window entry we need a separate storage structure that maps the instruction number to the instruction window entry. By ensuring that there is an order in issuing the instructions, we can ensure that S is issued first, and then load L is issued. After the store is issued, we read the value it is going to write to the memory system from the register file. Since, we have predicted a load-store dependence, this value can be directly given to the load instruction. The load instruction can thus start early, albeit speculatively, and broadcast its result to instructions that are waiting for it. Another way of enforcing the dependence is to search in the LSQ for store S once load L is resolved. If S is present before L then we wait for it to get resolved before sending L to memory. What did we gain in this process? We were able to significantly cut down on the latency of the load instruction. We did not have to send it to memory, nor wait for any value to be forwarded in the LSQ. It also allowed us to predict a dependence with a store, and directly use the value that it is going to store. Then, we were then able to wake up the consumers of the load. To enable this mechanism in the instruction window, wakeup and broadcast mechanisms have to be modified slightly. Any store with a valid store set id, can broadcast its instruction number. Any load waiting on that instruction number can wake up and then get the value that the store is writing. Recall that after the address for the store is computed, we do not send it to the memory system (Section 4.4), we rather wait for it to retire. This store will thus remain in the LSQ. Let us see what happens after we compute the address of the store. Since it has an entry in the LSQ, we can use it to forward values to any subsequent loads that come. Even if the address of the load is not computed, we can still speculatively forward the data if the store instruction is the latest instruction in the store set of the load. Upon retirement, we need to invalidate the LFST entry for the store, if it still points to it. ThelastpieceofthepuzzleisthecreationofanentryintheSSIT.Thereareseveralwaystodothis, and there are different trade-offs associated with them. Let us discuss a simple scheme. Whenever we detect a dependence between a store S and a subsequent load L in the LSQ, we need to see if we need to create an SSIT entry or not. We first check the SSIT entry for S. If there is a valid entry then we do not do anything, otherwise we check the SSIT for L. If it is associated with a store set whose id is i then we set the store set of S to i. We write the instruction number of S to the ith entry of the LFST. Otherwise, if L does not have an associated store set entry we need to create a new store set id for both L and S and then populate the LFST. Finally, let us discuss the issue of the instruction number. We chose to have a 7 or 8 bit instruction number as opposed to identifying a store by its 64-bit PC. This was done to reduce the required storage and the resources required to broadcast the id of the store. If there are 160 entries in the ROB, then we can simply create an 8-bit counter that is incremented (modulo 256) every time a new instruction is decoded. The instruction number of an instruction will be the value of this count; we are guaranteed to never have two instructions in the pipeline with the same instruction number. 5.1.4 Latency Speculation Let us consider a simple system with a pipeline, an L1 cache, and an L2 cache. An access can either be a hit in the L1 cache or a miss. If it misses in the L1 cache, then it goes down the memory system, and it can either get its data from the L2 cache, or somewhere from deep within the memory system such as main memory or the swap space in the hard disk. The latency of a cache miss is not very predictable, andthusitisunwisetoassumeanythingaboutthelatencyofamissinacache. However,wecanassume that a very large percentage of our memory accesses will hit in the L1 cache. Furthermore, the latency of a hit in the L1 cache is almost always a constant. It is a very small number – typically between 1-3 cycles. Wehavetwooptionshere. Thefirstoptionisveryconservative. Here,wewaitfortheloadtoreadits data, before we wake up consumer instructions. In this case, we need to wait for the load instruction to
translation.ha: 159 Smruti R. Shagon Sarangi (S) shine shagon da ya fi kwanan nan a cikin saitin shagon. Akwai hanyoyi da yawa da za mu iya tilasta dogaro. Misali, za mu iya ci gaba da nemo shigarwar taga umarni na shagon S, sannan mu jira a fara bayar da S. Don nemo shigarwar taga umarni muna buƙatar tsarin ajiya daban wanda ke nuna lambar umarni zuwa shigarwar taga umarni. Ta hanyar tabbatar da cewa akwai oda wajen bayar da umarnin, za mu iya tabbatar da cewa an bayar da S da farko, sannan a bayar da loda L. Bayan an bayar da shagon, za mu karanta ƙimar da za ta rubuta zuwa tsarin ƙwaƙwalwar  daga fayil ɗin rajista. Tunda, mun yi hasashen dogaro da shagon kaya, wannan ƙimar za a iya ba da ita kai tsaye ga umarnin kaya. Don haka umarnin kaya zai iya farawa da wuri, kodayake ana hasashe, kuma a watsa sakamakonsa ga umarnin da ke jiran sa. Wata hanyar tilasta dogaro ita ce a bincika a cikin LSQ don shagon S da zarar an warware loda L. Idan S yana nan kafin L to muna jira ya warware kafin aika L zuwa ƙwaƙwalwar ajiya. Me muka samu a wannan tsari? Mun sami damar rage latency na <TECH> na umarnin kaya sosai. Ba sai mun aika shi zuwa ƙwaƙwalwar ajiya ba, kuma ba mu jira wani ƙima a cikin LSQ ba. Hakanan ya ba mu damar annabta dogaro da shago, kuma mu yi amfani da ƙimar da zai adana kai tsaye. Sannan, mun sami damar farkar da masu amfani da kayan. Don kunna wannan tsarin a cikin taga umarni, dole ne a ɗan gyara hanyoyin farkawa da watsawa. Duk wani shago mai ingantaccen ID na shagon, zai iya watsa lambar umarninsa. Duk wani kaya da ke jiran wannan lambar umarni zai iya farkawa sannan ya sami ƙimar da shagon yake rubutawa. Ku tuna cewa bayan an ƙididdige adireshin shagon, ba mu aika shi zuwa tsarin <TECH> na ƙwaƙwalwar ajiya ba (Sashe na 4.4), muna gwammace mu jira ya yi ritaya. Don haka wannan shagon zai kasance a cikin LSQ. Bari mu ga abin da zai faru bayan mun ƙididdige adireshin shagon. Tunda yana da shigarwa a cikin LSQ, za mu iya amfani da shi don tura ƙima zuwa ga duk wani kaya da zai biyo baya. Ko da adireshin kayan ba a lissafta shi ba, har yanzu za mu iya tura bayanan <TECH> ta hanyar hasashe idan umarnin shagon shine sabon umarni a cikin saitin kayan shagon. Bayan ritaya, muna buƙatar ɓata shigarwar LFST don shagon, idan har yanzu yana nuna shi. Mataki na ƙarshe na wasanin gwada ilimi shine ƙirƙirar shigarwar a cikin SSIT. Akwai da yawa da yawa da ke yin wannan, kuma akwai musayar ra'ayoyi daban-daban da ke da alaƙa da su. Bari mu tattauna wani tsari mai sauƙi. Duk lokacin da muka gano dogaro tsakanin shagon S da kaya na gaba L a cikin LSQ, muna buƙatar ganin ko muna buƙatar ƙirƙirar shigarwar SSIT ko a'a. Da farko muna duba shigarwar SSIT don S. Idan akwai shigarwa mai inganci to ba ma yin komai, in ba haka ba muna duba SSIT don L. Idan yana da alaƙa da saitin shagon wanda id ɗinsa shine i to muna saita saitin shagon na S zuwa i. Mun rubuta lambar umarnin S a cikin shigarwar LFST ta farko. In ba haka ba, idan L ba shi da shigarwar saitin shago mai alaƙa, muna buƙatar ƙirƙirar sabon saitin shago don duka L da S sannan mu cika LFST. A ƙarshe, bari mu tattauna batun lambar umarni. Mun zaɓi samun lambar umarni mai 7 ko 8 bit maimakon gano shago ta hanyar PC ɗinsa mai 64-bit. An yi wannan ne don rage ajiyar da ake buƙata da albarkatun da ake buƙata don watsa ID na shagon. Idan akwai shigarwar 160 a cikin ROB, to kawai za mu iya ƙirƙirar <TECH>ƙirƙirar mai ƙidayar bit 8 wanda aka ƙara (modulo 256) duk lokacin da aka canza sabon umarni. Lambar umarni na umarni zai zama ƙimar wannan ƙidayar; an tabbatar mana ba za mu taɓa samun umarni biyu a cikin bututun mai lambar umarni iri ɗaya ba. 5.1.4 Latency Hasashe Bari mu yi la'akari da tsarin mai sauƙi tare da bututun mai, cache na L1, da cache na L2. Samun damar shiga na iya zama bugawa a cikin cache na L1 ko kuma ɓacewa. Idan ya ɓace a cikin cache na L1, to zai shiga cikin tsarin ƙwaƙwalwar , kuma zai iya samun bayanan <TECH>sakonsa daga cache na L2, ko kuma daga cikin zurfin tsarin ƙwaƙwalwar  kamar babban ƙwaƙwalwar ajiya ko sararin musanya a cikin rumbun kwamfutarka. Rashin latti na <TECH>ba abu ne mai faɗi ba, don haka ba za a iya ɗauka wani abu game da latti na amisssinacache ba. Duk da haka, za mu iya ɗauka cewa babban kaso na damar shiga ƙwaƙwalwarmu zai shiga cikin cache na L1. Bugu da ƙari, latti na <TECH>na bugawa a cikin cache na L1 kusan koyaushe yana canzawa. Ƙaramin lamba ne - yawanci tsakanin zagaye 1-3. Muna da zaɓuɓɓuka biyu a nan. Zaɓin farko yana da matukar kiyayewa. A nan, muna jiran lodawa don karantawa <TECH>bayanai, kafin mu farka umarnin mai amfani. A wannan yanayin, muna buƙatar jira umarnin kaya don

translation.en: ● Focus: Establishing the foundation of the AmanPay system, ensuring that essential features and security measures are in place. ● Key Deliverables: ○ User Management Module: ■ Implement account creation, user authentication, and profile management features. ■ Integrate multi-factor authentication (MFA) for enhanced security. ○ Payment Processing Module: ■ Develop the basic payment initiation functionality, allowing users to make payments to sellers. ■ Implement split payment functionality, enabling users to divide payments among multiple participants. ○ Backend Infrastructure Subsystem: ■ Set up the core server infrastructure, ensuring data encryption (e.g., AES-256) and secure communication protocols (e.g., HTTPS). ○ Security Measures: ■ Conduct initial security audits and penetration testing to identify and mitigate vulnerabilities. Increment 2: User Interface and Cross-Platform Compatibility ● Focus: Enhancing the user experience by developing a responsive, user-friendly interface and ensuring cross-platform compatibility. ● Key Deliverables: ○ User Interface Subsystem: ■ Design and implement a responsive UI that works seamlessly across web and mobile platforms (iOS and Android). ■ Develop intuitive navigation and user flows for key functionalities like payments, split payments, and

translation.en: Smruti R. Sarangi 216 It is true that we can dynamically create sophisticated processing elements on the fly using FPGAs. However, given the fact that they are being created from generic processing blocks using a generic interconnection network, they have performance limitations. As of 2020, FPGAs cannot be clocked at a frequency more than 600 MHz (general purpose processors can be clocked at 3-4 GHz). Furthermore, for most of their logic, they rely on lookup tables (LUTs). Lookup tables are large arrays that are used tocomputethevaluesofBooleanexpressions(logicfunctions). AnaiveversionofanLUTforafunction with 16 variables contains 216 (65,536) entries. Each row represents a Boolean combination of inputs, and each entry in a row contains the result of the function that is being evaluated. We can use such LUTs to compute the values of Boolean functions. The advantage of an LUT is that we can implement any Boolean function using it. We simply need to change its contents. Of course, there are limitations in the scalability of this approach. If a function takes two values – 64 bits each – then we cannot afford to have a single LUT. Instead, we need to break the computation into several sub-computations, and we can have an LUT for each sub-computation. Having a network of such LUTs, and a generic programmable interconnect is a very good idea for creating a high throughput system for a particular set of algorithms such as gene mapping or image reconstruction. However, FPGAs again have limited applicability, and also require fairly sophisticated programming tools. We desire a piece of hardware, which is reasonably generic, can be programmed with a fairly general purpose programming language, and delivers great performance. This is precisely where GPUs (graphics processing units) come in to the picture. Let us understand traditionalGPUsbeforemovingtotheirmodernavatars–generalpurposeGPUs(GPGPUs). Traditional GPUswereexclusivelyusedforacceleratinggraphicscomputations;however,modernGPGPUsareused for general purpose numerical codes. 6.2 Traditional GPUs InthegoodolddaysofMS-DOSandotheroperatingsystemsthatprimarilyoperatedviathecommand line,computergraphicshadaverylimitedroletoplay. Mostpersonalcomputerusersaswellasbusiness users primarily used text-only terminals and were happy with predominantly textual interfaces. Even popular computer games like Tetris (see Figure 6.1) did not use a great amount of animation and graphics. However,theentiresituationchangedwiththeintroductionofoperatingsystemssuchasWindows(cid:13)R thatdidnotrelyonthecommandline,andhighlygraphicsintensivegames. Tosustaintherequirements for such applications, there was a concomitant increase in the resolution of monitors. We started seeing monitors with a resolution of (1024x768 pixels and more) that used displays with vivid colors. Current monitors support 16 million colors. Even the nature and quality of animation increased, and suddenly car racing games felt like actually racing a real car in a FORMULA 1TM race. Let us figure out the cost of doing all of this computation. A car racing game requires a lot of computation; consider something simpler – minimizing a window. In a modern system, we see the window artistically minimizing itself and becoming an icon on the taskbar at the bottom of the screen. The space that is left behind is used to show the contents of other windows or the Desktop. This much of computation definitely does take a toll on the processor. Consider a relatively old display with a resolution of 1024x768 pixels. This makes a total of 786,432 pixels. Ifweconsidera3GHzprocessorwithanIPCequalto2(floatingpoint+memoryoperations), then we are only allowed to execute 7633 instructions per pixel per second. If we consider a 60 Hz monitor that displays 60 frames per second, it means that we can only run 127 instructions per pixel per frame. Thismightbeenoughforminimizingawindow;however,thisisclearlynotenoughforallthegamesthat we play. Some such games have multiple characters shooting bullets, cracking windows, and characters jumping across ledges and crevasses. We need to calculate a lot of things such as scenes, animations, shadows, illumination, and even the way that the hair of the characters will bounce when they jump. Sadly, the resources of a general purpose processor falls short for the requirements of modern games,
translation.ha: Smruti R. Sarangi 216 Gaskiya ne cewa za mu iya ƙirƙirar abubuwan sarrafawa masu inganci ta hanyar amfani da FPGAs. Duk da haka, idan aka yi la'akari da cewa ana ƙirƙirar su ne daga tubalan sarrafawa na gaba ɗaya ta amfani da hanyar sadarwa ta gaba ɗaya, suna da iyakokin aikin . Tun daga shekarar 2020, ba za a iya ɗaukar FPGAs a mita fiye da 600 MHz ba (ana iya ɗaukar masu sarrafawa na gaba ɗaya a 3-4 GHz). Bugu da ƙari, ga mafi yawan dabaru, suna dogara da teburin bincike (LUTs). Teburan bincike manyan tsare-tsare ne waɗanda ake amfani da su don ƙididdige ƙimar maganganun Boolean (ayyukan dabaru). AnaiveversionofanLUT don aiki tare da masu canji 16 ya ƙunshi shigarwar 216 (65,536). Kowane layi yana wakiltar haɗin shigarwar <TECH>Boolean, kuma kowane shigarwa a jere ya ƙunshi sakamakon aikin da ake kimantawa. Za mu iya amfani da irin waɗannan LUTs don ƙididdige ƙimar ayyukan Boolean. Fa'idar LUT ita ce za mu iya aiwatar da duk wani aikin Boolean ta amfani da shi. Kawai muna buƙatar canza abubuwan da ke ciki. Tabbas, akwai iyakoki a cikin scalability na  na wannan hanyar. Idan aiki yana ɗaukar ƙima biyu - rago 64 kowannensu - to ba za mu iya samun LUT ɗaya ba. Madadin haka, muna buƙatar raba lissafin zuwa ƙananan ƙididdiga da yawa, kuma za mu iya samun LUT don kowane ƙaramin lissafi. Samun hanyar sadarwa ta irin waɗannan LUTs, da haɗin kai na shirye-shirye gabaɗaya kyakkyawan ra'ayi ne don ƙirƙirar tsarin  mai girma don takamaiman saitin algorithms kamar taswirar kwayoyin halitta ko sake gina hoto. Duk da haka, FPGAs kuma suna da iyakataccen amfani, kuma suna buƙatar kayan aikin shirye-shirye masu inganci. Muna son wani kayan aiki, wanda yake da sauƙin amfani, wanda za a iya tsara shi da yaren shirye-shirye na gabaɗaya, kuma yana ba da babban aikin . Wannan shine ainihin inda GPUs (raka'o'in sarrafa zane-zane) suka zo cikin hoton. Bari mu fahimci GPUs na gargajiya kafin mu koma ga avatars na zamani - GPUs na gabaɗaya (GPGPUs). Ana amfani da GPUs na gargajiya musamman don hanzarta lissafin zane-zane; duk da haka, ana amfani da GPU na zamani don lambobin lambobi na gabaɗaya. 6.2 GPUs na gargajiya A cikin kwanakin da suka gabata na MS-DOS da tsarin aiki na waje waɗanda ke aiki ta hanyar layin umarni, zane-zanen kwamfuta suna da iyakataccen aiki don wasa. Yawancin masu amfani da kwamfuta na mutum da kuma masu amfani da kasuwanci galibi suna amfani da tashoshi na rubutu kawai kuma sun gamsu da mafi yawan hanyoyin sadarwa na rubutu. Har ma shahararrun wasannin kwamfuta kamar Tetris (duba Hoto na 6.1) ba su yi amfani da adadi mai yawa na zane-zane da zane-zane ba. Duk da haka, yanayin ya canza gaba ɗaya tare da gabatar da tsarin aiki kamar Windows (cid:13) R wanda bai dogara akan layin umarni ba, da kuma wasanni masu ƙarfi. Domin ci gaba da buƙatu don irin waɗannan aikace-aikacen, akwai ƙaruwa a cikin ƙudurin allo. Mun fara ganin allo tare da ƙudurin (pixels 1024x768 da ƙari) waɗanda suka yi amfani da nunin faifai masu launuka masu haske. Allon da ke yanzu yana tallafawa launuka miliyan 16. Har ma yanayi da ingancin zane-zane sun ƙaru, kuma ba zato ba tsammani wasannin tseren mota sun ji kamar a zahiri suna tseren mota ta gaske a cikin tseren FORMULA 1TM. Bari mu gano farashin yin duk wannan lissafi. Wasan tseren mota yana buƙatar lissafi mai yawa; yi la'akari da wani abu mafi sauƙi - rage taga. A cikin tsarin zamani na TECH</TECH>, muna ganin taga yana rage kansa da fasaha kuma ya zama gunki akan taskbar da ke ƙasan allon. Ana amfani da sararin da aka bari don nuna abubuwan da ke cikin wasu windows ko Desktop. Wannan yawan lissafi tabbas yana ɗaukar nauyi ga mai sarrafawa. Yi la'akari da tsohon nuni na <TECH> wanda yake da ƙudurin pixels 1024x768. Wannan yana yin jimlar pixels 786,432. Idan muka yi la'akari da mai sarrafawa na 3GHz tare da IPCequalto2 (wurin iyo + ayyukan ƙwaƙwalwa), to ana ba mu izinin aiwatar da umarni 7633 kawai a kowace pixel a daƙiƙa. Idan muka yi la'akari da mai saka idanu na 60 Hz wanda ke nuna firam 60 a daƙiƙa, yana nufin cewa za mu iya gudanar da umarni 127 kawai a kowace pixel a kowace firam. Wannan yana iya zama isasshe don ƙirƙirar taga; duk da haka, wannan a bayyane yake isa ga duk wasannin da muke yi. Wasu irin waɗannan wasannin suna da haruffa da yawa suna harbi harsasai, tagogi masu fashewa, da haruffa suna tsalle a kan layuka da ramuka. Muna buƙatar ƙididdige abubuwa da yawa kamar yanayin, abubuwan motsa jiki, inuwa, haske, har ma da yadda gashin haruffan zai yi tsalle lokacin da suka yi tsalle. Abin baƙin ciki, albarkatun mai sarrafawa na manufa gabaɗaya sun gaza ga buƙatun wasannin zamani,

translation.en: Human Settlement MODULE - 9 Human resource development in India 29 HUMAN SETTLEMENT Notes In the previous lesson, we have discussed about population composition; total population; rural-urban population; population growth, etc. In this lesson, our focus will be on human settlements. Therefore, discussion will revolve around the concept of settlements meaning and nature, evolution and classification of rural and urban settlements in India. OBJECTIVES After reading this lesson, you will be able to:  describe the meaning of settlement;  identify various types of rural settlements;  describe various house types in India;  establish the relationship between house types with relief, climate and building materials;  define an urban areas as given by census of India;  analyse the distributional patterns of rural and urban settlements; and  explain functional classification of urban settlements as given by census of India. 29.1 WHAT IS A SETTLEMENT Though we use this term very frequently, but when it comes for defining, it is very difficult to give a clear cut definition. In simpler term we can define settlement as any form of human habitation which ranges from a single dowelling to large city. The word settlement has another connotation as well as this is a process of opening up and settling of a previously uninhabited area by the people. In geography this process is also known as occupancy. Therefore, we can say settlement is a process GEOGRAPHY 301
translation.ha: MASARAR MA'AUNIN 'YAN ADAM - 9 Ci gaban albarkatun ɗan adam a Indiya 29 MA'AUNIN 'YAN ADAM Bayanan kula A cikin darasin da ya gabata, mun tattauna game da yawan jama'a; jimillar yawan jama'a; yawan jama'a na karkara da birane; ƙaruwar yawan jama'a, da sauransu. A cikin wannan darasin, za mu mayar da hankali kan matsugunan mutane. Saboda haka, tattaunawa za ta ta'allaka ne akan ma'anar matsugunan da yanayi, juyin halitta da rarraba matsugunan karkara da birane a Indiya. MANUFOFI Bayan karanta wannan darasin, za ku iya:  bayyana ma'anar matsugunan;  gano nau'ikan matsugunan karkara daban-daban;  bayyana nau'ikan gidaje daban-daban a Indiya;  kafa alaƙa tsakanin nau'ikan gidaje da kayan agaji, yanayi da kayan gini;  ayyana yankunan birane kamar yadda ƙidayar jama'a ta Indiya ta bayar;  bincika tsarin rarraba matsugunan karkara da birane; da kuma  bayyana rarrabuwar aiki na matsugunan birane kamar yadda ƙidayar jama'a ta Indiya ta bayar. 29.1 MENENE MA'AUNIN 'YAN ADAM Ko da yake muna amfani da wannan kalma akai-akai, amma idan ana maganar fayyace ta, yana da matukar wahala a ba da ma'anar da ta dace. A cikin sauƙi, za mu iya bayyana matsuguni a matsayin kowace irin mazaunin ɗan adam wanda ya kama daga gida ɗaya zuwa babban birni. Kalmar matsuguni tana da wata ma'ana kuma wannan tsari ne na buɗewa da kuma zama yankin da ba a da mazaunansa a da. A cikin yanayin ƙasa, ana kuma kiran wannan tsari da zama. Saboda haka, za mu iya cewa zama tsari ne na GEOGRAPHY 301.

LIN Master nodes send a go-to-sleep command when entering sleep state. Rationale: Basic functionality Use Case: -- Dependencies: -- Supporting Material: ISO 17987 specifications ⌋( RS_BRF_01768, RS_BRF_01104) 4.1.2.4.2 [SRS_Lin_01596] The LIN Interface shall provide bus idle condition observation for slave nodes. ⌈ Type: Valid Description: This requirement is only applicable to LIN slave nodes. For LIN slave nodes, the LIN interface shall observe each LIN bus for communication. If no communication occurs for a configurable time, the LIN interface shall inform the upper layer about the sleep state of the LIN bus. Rationale: Implementation of the LIN standard. Use Case: Basic functionality and support of LIN conformance test. translation.en: Software RequirementsSpecificationforStudentAssistant Page73 Data retrieval from external sources, such as the university email server, should occur within 10 seconds for routine queries.  Email Summarization: The email summarization process should be completed in real-time as emails are received, ensuring that users receive summarized content promptly.  AI Assistant's Processing Time: The AI Assistant should process complex user queries and provide responses within 7 seconds to maintain efficient interactions.  Database Queries: Database queries for user data and timetables should execute in less than 10 seconds.  Mobile Application Launch Time: The mobile application should launch and become operational within 7 seconds of user interaction. 6.2 Safety Requirements  Data Security: The Student Utility App must implement robust data security measures to protect sensitive user information, including personal and financial data, to prevent unauthorized access and data breaches.  User Privacy: The application should adhere to data privacy regulations and protect user privacy by ensuring that personal information is not shared with third parties without explicit consent.

translation.en: Software Requirements Specification | 64 e. Manually. 3.8 The actor selects City-based. 3.9 The system generates groups so that most members in the team belong to the same city. 3.10 The system displays the groups to be generated with the names of participants in each. 3.11 The system prompts the actor to either Confirm Generation or Go Back. 3.12 The actor selects Confirm Generation. 3.13 The system stores the generated groups. 3.14 The system enrolls each participant in their respective group. 3.15 The system directs the actor back to the Groups Management screen. Alternative Flow 3.8 If the actor selects Language-based, System will generate groups so that most members in the group have the same language. Steps continue at 2.10. 3.8 if the actor selects Average-score based, the system collects the scores of the participants in quizzes and games taken before, calculates the average score, and generate groups so that each group has the same weighted score. Steps continue at 2.10. 3.8 if the actor selects Randomly, the system randomly generates groups. Steps continue at 2.10. 3.8 if the actor selects Manually: 3.8.1 The system displays the names of all participants. 3.8.2 The system prompts the actor to select the names of participants to be placed in the current group. 3.8.3 The admin selects names of participants, and then choose “Place in One Group”. 3.8.4 The system collects the participants selected by the admin and place them in one group. 3.8.5 If more names still exist in the list of names of participants, steps continue at 3.8.2. 3.8.6 If all names have been selects, steps continue at 3.10. 3.11 if the actor selects Go Back, Steps continue at 3.8. Business Rules None. Post Conditions • Success: o The Groups are generated, and participants can see which group they belong to.

Matakai suna ci gaba da 2.10. 3.8 idan ɗan wasan ya zaɓi da hannu: 3.8.1 Tsarin  yana nuna sunayen duk mahalarta. 3.8.2 Tsarin  yana sa ɗan wasan ya zaɓi sunayen mahalarta da za a sanya su cikin rukunin na yanzu. 3.8.3  admin yana zaɓar sunayen mahalarta, sannan ya zaɓi "Sanya a cikin Rukunin Ɗaya". 3.8.4 Tsarin  yana tattara mahalarta da  admin ya zaɓa ya sanya su a cikin rukuni ɗaya. 3.8.5 Idan har yanzu akwai ƙarin sunaye a cikin jerin sunayen mahalarta, matakan za su ci gaba da zuwa 3.8.2. 3.8.6 Idan an zaɓi dukkan sunaye, matakai za su ci gaba da zuwa 3.10. 3.11 idan ɗan wasan ya zaɓi Komawa Baya, Matakai za su ci gaba da zuwa 3.8. translation.en: C: - Technical study of the project The technical study focuses on identifying the requirements for developing the electronic wallet, including the use of NFC technologies, security protocols, and facial or fingerprint recognition technologies. The infrastructure requires powerful servers and backups. Applications compatible with iOS and Android must be developed, in addition to the possibility of using the wallet electronically on laptops, with a timetable for development, testing, and launch. Integration includes ensuring compatibility with bank systems and launching periodic updates to improve performance and security. translation.en: Sport Facility Booking System Kirtan Shah Update, and Delete (CRUD) operations, maintaining consistent data handling and reducing redundant code across the application.  Caching Strategy: For frequently accessed data, such as facility details and user session information, a caching layer (e.g., Redis) can be employed to reduce database load and improve response times.  Security Practices: Sensitive data fields, like passwords, are stored in hashed formats, and payment data is encrypted. Access to database resources is controlled through role-based permissions, and sensitive operations are audited to ensure compliance with security policies.  Backup and Disaster Recovery: Daily automated backups of the database are scheduled, with recovery procedures documented and tested periodically to ensure quick restoration in case of data loss. By adopting these practices, the Sports Facility Booking Management System ensures that data is effectively managed, secure, and consistently available to support application functionality and meet user needs. 17h Access Control and Security Access control and security mechanisms are fundamental components of the Sports Facility Booking Management System, ensuring that only authorized users can access, modify, or delete sensitive information. This includes user data, booking details, payment information, and facility management data. Implementing stringent access controls not only protects against unauthorized access but also helps in maintaining data integrity and compliance with relevant regulations. The motivation behind establishing effective access control and security measures is multifaceted:  Data Protection: Protect sensitive data, such as user information and financial details, from unauthorized access or breaches, ensuring privacy and compliance with data protection laws.  User Trust: Foster user confidence in the system by demonstrating a commitment to security, which can enhance user engagement and loyalty. 68
translation.ha: Yin Rajista a Wurin Wasanni Tsarin Kirtan Shah Sabuntawa, da kuma ayyukan Share (CRUD), tare da kula da sarrafa bayanai  akai-akai da kuma rage lambar da ba a buƙata ba a cikin aikace-aikacen .  Dabarun Ajiye Bayanai: Don bayanan  da ake yawan shiga, kamar bayanan kayan aiki da kuma bayanan zaman  mai amfani , ana iya amfani da matakin adana bayanai (misali, Redis) don rage nauyin  da kuma inganta lokutan amsawa.  Ayyukan Tsaro: Ana adana filayen Bayanai masu mahimmanci, kamar kalmomin shiga, a cikin tsarin hashed, kuma ana ɓoye bayanan Bayanai na biyan kuɗi. Ana sarrafa damar shiga Bayanai ta hanyar izini bisa ga rawar da aka taka, kuma ana duba ayyukan masu mahimmanci don tabbatar da bin ka'idojin tsaro tare da manufofin tsaro.  Ajiyewa da Farfado da Bala'i: Ana tsara ajiyar bayanai ta atomatik na Ma’ajiya ta bayanai kowace rana, tare da rubuta hanyoyin dawo da bayanai akai-akai don tabbatar da dawo da bayanai cikin sauri idan an rasa Bayanai. Ta hanyar ɗaukar waɗannan hanyoyin, Tsarin Gudanar da Rajista na Gidajen Wasanni Tsarin yana tabbatar da cewa ana sarrafa Bayanai yadda ya kamata, amintacce, kuma koyaushe yana samuwa don tallafawa ayyukan Manhaja da kuma biyan buƙatun mai amfani. Tsarin Kula da Shiga na awanni 17 da Tsaro da hanyoyin Kula da Shiga na tsaro sune muhimman sassan Gudanar da Rajista na Gidajen Wasanni Tsarin, yana tabbatar da cewa masu amfani da aka ba izini ne kawai za su iya shiga, gyara, ko share Bayanai masu mahimmanci. Wannan ya haɗa da mai amfani Bayanai, bayanan yin rajista, bayanan biyan kuɗi bayanai, da kuma kula da wurare bayanai. Aiwatar da tsauraran matakan shiga ba wai kawai yana kare shiga ba tare da izini ba ne, har ma yana taimakawa wajen kiyaye amincin Bayanai da bin ƙa'idodi masu dacewa. Dalilin da ya sa aka kafa ingantattun matakan sarrafa shiga da tsaro tech> yana da fannoni da yawa:  <TECH>Bayani: Kare bayanan masu mahimmanci, kamar mai amfani bayanai da bayanan kuɗi, daga shiga ba tare da izini ba ko keta doka, tabbatar da sirrin  da bin dokokin kariya na <TECH>bayanai.  Mai amfaniAmincewa: Haɓaka amincewa da mai amfani ga tsarin  ta hanyar nuna jajircewa ga <TECH>tsaro, wanda zai iya haɓaka haɗin kai da aminci na <TECH>mai amfani</TECH. 68

translation.en: Human Settlement MODULE - 9 Human resource Mahanadi in Chhattisgarh, coastal areas of Andhra Pradesh, cauvery delta development in India of Tamil Nadu, Maidaus of Karnataka, lower Assam and Tripura, in the valleys of Siwaliks etc. Sometimes people live in compact settlement for security or defence purpose. The greatest example of this type is in Bundelkhand region of Madhya Pradesh and Uttar Pradesh. In Rajasthan also people live in compact settlement because of the scarce availability of cultivable land and water body. Therefore, they want to make maximum use of available natural resources. Notes Such settlements generally range from a cluster of about thirty to hundreds of dwelling of different forms, size and functions. On an average their size various from 500 to 2,500 persons in sparsely populated parts of Rajasthan to more than 10,000 persons in Ganga plain. Very often these settlements have a definite pattern due to closely built area and intervening street patterns. As many as 11 patterns are identified. We will discuss only Five major patterns. These patterns are: (i) Linear pattern (ii) Rectangular pattern (iii) Circular pattern (iv) Square pattern (v) Radial pattern (i) Linear Pattern : It is commonly found along main roads, railways, streams, etc. It may have a single row of houses arranged along the main artery. For example rural settlements found along the sea coast, river valley, mountain ranges etc. (ii) Rectangular Pattern : This is a very common type which develops around the rectangular shape of agricultural fields as it is common to find a system of land measurement based on square units. Village paths and cart tracks also confirm to the rectangular field patterns and run through the village in north-south and east-west directions. Accessibility to farms and fields and connectivity to other settlements lead to rectangular shape of settlements. The settlements of coastal Maharashtra and Andhra Pradesh and either side of Aravali hills, etc. may be cited for examples. (iii) Square Pattern: This is basically a varient of rectangular type. Such a pattern is associated with villages lying at the crossing of cart tracks or roads and also related to features restricting the extension of the village outside a square space. These features may include an old boundary wall, thick orchards, a road or a pond. (iv) Circular Pattern : In the upper Doab and Trans – Yamuna districts, Malwa region, Punjab and Gujarat, large villages are characterized by a very high degree of compactness. The outer walls of dwellings adjoin each other and present a continuous front so that when viewed from outside, the villages look like a walled and fortified enclosure pierced by a few openings. The round form was a natural outcome of maximum aggregation for the purpose of defence during the past. (v) Radial Pattern : In this type, a number of streets converge on one GEOGRAPHY 303
translation.ha: MASU ZAMANTAR DA 'YAN ADAM - Mahanadi 9 na albarkatun ɗan adam a Chhattisgarh, yankunan bakin teku na Andhra Pradesh, ci gaban kogin kogo a Indiya na Tamil Nadu, Maidaus na Karnataka, ƙananan Assam da Tripura, a kwarin Siwaliks da sauransu. Wani lokaci mutane suna zaune a cikin ƙaramin matsuguni don tsaron  ko manufar tsaro. Mafi kyawun misali na wannan nau'in yana cikin yankin Bundelkhand na Madhya Pradesh da Uttar Pradesh. A Rajasthan kuma mutane suna zaune a cikin ƙaramin matsuguni saboda ƙarancin <TECH>samfuran na ƙasa da ruwa da za a iya nomawa. Saboda haka, suna son yin amfani da albarkatun ƙasa da ake da su sosai. Bayani Irin waɗannan matsuguni galibi suna daga tarin gidaje kusan talatin zuwa ɗaruruwan siffofi, girma da ayyuka daban-daban. A matsakaici, girmansu ya bambanta daga mutane 500 zuwa 2,500 a cikin sassan Rajasthan marasa yawan jama'a zuwa sama da mutane 10,000 a cikin fili na Ganga. Sau da yawa waɗannan matsuguni suna da takamaiman tsari saboda yankin da aka gina sosai da kuma tsarin tituna masu shiga tsakani. An gano har zuwa tsare-tsare 11. Za mu tattauna manyan tsare-tsare guda biyar kawai. Waɗannan alamu sune: (i) Tsarin layi (ii) Tsarin kusurwa (iii) Tsarin zagaye (iv) Tsarin murabba'i (v) Tsarin radial (i) Tsarin layi: Ana samunsa akai-akai a kan manyan hanyoyi, layin dogo, rafuka, da sauransu. na iya yana da layuka guda ɗaya na gidaje da aka shirya a gefen babban magudanar ruwa. Misali, matsugunan karkara da aka samu a gefen teku, kwarin kogi, tsaunuka da sauransu. (ii) Tsarin murabba'i: Wannan nau'in abu ne da aka saba gani wanda ke tasowa a kusa da siffar murabba'i na filayen noma domin abu ne da aka saba samun tsarin  na auna ƙasa bisa ga murabba'in murabba'i. Hanyoyin ƙauye da hanyoyin keken shanu suma suna tabbatar da tsarin filin murabba'i kuma suna gudana ta cikin ƙauyen a arewa-kudu da gabas-yamma. Samun dama ga gonaki da gonaki da haɗi zuwa wasu matsugunan yana haifar da siffar murabba'i na matsugunan. Matsugunan Maharashtra da Andhra Pradesh na bakin teku da kuma kowane gefen tuddai na Aravali, da sauransu. <TECH>na iya a matsayin misalai. (iii) Tsarin murabba'i: Wannan ainihin nau'in murabba'i ne daban-daban. Irin wannan tsari yana da alaƙa da ƙauyuka da ke matsewa a kan hanyoyin keken shanu ko hanyoyi, kuma yana da alaƙa da fasalulluka da ke takaita faɗaɗa ƙauyen a wajen murabba'in sarari. Waɗannan fasalulluka na iya sun haɗa da tsohon bango mai iyaka, gonakin inabi masu kauri, hanya ko tafki. (iv) Tsarin Zagaye: A cikin manyan gundumomin Doab da Trans - Yamuna, yankin Malwa, Punjab da Gujarat, manyan ƙauyuka suna da alaƙa da ƙaramin matakin. Bangon waje na gidaje suna haɗuwa da juna kuma suna gabatar da gaba mai ci gaba ta yadda idan aka duba daga waje, ƙauyukan suna kama da shinge mai katanga da aka huda ta wasu ramuka. Tsarin zagaye sakamako ne na halitta na yawan haɗuwa don manufar tsaro a baya. (v) Tsarin Zagaye: A cikin wannan nau'in, hanyoyi da yawa suna haɗuwa akan GOBARAFI 303 ɗaya

(a) The river transports its load in four ways by traction, by saltation, by suspension and by solution. (b) (i) Slope, velocity, structure of river bed. (ii) Velocity, volume and size of particles. (c) The work of river erosion is accomplished by corrasion, corrosion, hydraulic action and attrition. 2. (a) Estuary- The funnel shaped mouth of river, where tides flow in and out and where fresh water and sea water mix. They are formed by drown- ing of coastal lowlands by a relative rise of sea level. Delta - A more or less triangular and level tract of alluvium formed at the mouth of river and traversed by the distributaries of the river. (b) Flood Plain - A plain bordering a river formed as a result of sediments deposited by a river and is generally liable to flooding. Braided stream - A river that gets divided into a network of intercon- nected channels, forming bars and sand island in between. 3. Work of Erosion - Gorge, ‘V’ shaped valley, Meander, Canyon. Work of Deposition- Meander, Flood plain, Alluvial Fan. 4. (a) Ox-Bow lake- The meanders develop in the middle course of the river. translation.en: Food For All Software Requirements Specification, Version 1.0 12 The database shall have sections available for customization for the user to store favorite, edited, or customized recipes. 3.1.2 Hardware Interfaces 3.1.2.1 Hardware Interface Outputs 3.1.2.1.1 Shareable Recipes (RR-56 - RR 58) ​ ​ The application shall allow exporting of recipes in multiple formats( .pdf, .docx, .jpeg, .txt) in order to share or print the recipe that the user has retrieved from the application database. 3.1.3 Software Interfaces 3.1.3.1 Software Interface Inputs 3.1.3.1.1 List of Used API’s (actual API undecided) (RR-6) ​ ​ 3.1.3.1.1.1 United States Recommended Daily Allowance API (RR-40) ​ ​ The United States Recommended Daily Allowance API shall be used to provide nutritional analysis and recommended amounts of ingredients for recipes. This API can be found at ​ 3.1.3.1.1.2 Recipe Card API (RR-6) ​ ​ The Recipe Card API shall be able to sort and retrieve recipes based on the search requirements defined in (RR-19 through RR-26) ​ ​ 3.1.3.1.1.3 Authentication/Security API (RR-6) ​ ​ The Authentication/Security API shall be able to store, encrypt, and retrieve personal user information such as name, email, and password using best security protocols. Auth0 can be a potential API used for this requirement. ​ 3.1.3.1.1.4 Ingredients parsing API (RR-21) ​ ​ The Ingredient Parsing API shall be able to store and manipulate ingredients for user saved recipes. The user shall also be able to search this API for ingredients and or measurements defined in their recipes. Zestful can be a potential API used for this requirement. ​ 3.1.3.1.1.5 Google Calendar API (RR-48) ​ ​ Google’s API shall be used to create application calendar and shared calendar interfacing of menus and meal plans. This API can be found at

translation.en: Software Requirements Specification for Bug Tracking Page 41 System Level-1 DFD: The Level 1 DFD provides a more detailed view, breaking down the system into five main processes. It focuses on the logical flow of data between processes, external entities, and data stores. Processes: 1. Login and Authentication (1.1): o Verifies the credentials of users (e.g., admins, developers, or general users). o Receives login details and provides authentication status. 2. Bug Reporting (1.2): o Allows users to submit bugs with relevant details (e.g., title, description, severity, and optional attachments). o Passes validated bug data to the storage process. 3. Bug Validation and Storage (1.3): o Validates bug inputs for completeness and correctness. o Stores bug details in the database for tracking. 4. Bug Assignment Notification (1.4): o Assigns validated bugs to appropriate developers based on certain criteria (e.g., workload, expertise). o Sends notifications to developers with details of the assigned bugs. 5. Bug Management (1.5): o Allows the admin to manage the lifecycle of bugs (e.g., updating statuses, reassigning bugs, or resolving duplicates). o Generates detailed reports on the system's activities and bug statistics. Entities and Data Flows: 1. User: o Inputs login details into the authentication module. o Submits bug information to the system. o Receives authentication status or error messages. 2. Developer: o Receives notifications for assigned bugs, including details such as severity and deadline. 3. Admin: o Sends bug management commands (e.g., update bug status). o Retrieves system-generated reports summarizing bugs. 4. Data Stores: o Bug Database: Stores all bug details and their lifecycle statuses.

translation.en: 623 Smruti R. Sarangi voltage, and power with current. This is known as the electrical analog of a thermal problem. Let us now try to map the rest of the terms. The matrix G can be thought of as conductance matrix. Recall from high school physics that conductance is the reciprocal of resistance. By the Ohm’s law the product of conductance and voltage is equal to the current (power in this case). The second term in the LHS, P, can be thought of as the output of a set of current sources. Thus, the sum of the two terms on the left-hand side indicates the total amount of current being injected into the circuit. In an electrical circuit when current is injected the voltage rises, which is being captured by the expression on the right-hand side. To understand the right-hand side, let us consider the equations related to capacitance: Q = VC (Q is the stored charge, V is the voltage, and C is the capacitance). If we differentiate it, we get dQ/dt = I = CdV/dt. The time derivative of voltage can be equated with the time derivative of temperature T(cid:48). The matrix C in Equation 11.20 can thus be thought of as the thermal capacitance. Let us now describe the electrical analog in a simpler setting. Consider a 1-dimensional rod. By Equation 11.10 the temperature difference across its ends T −T is equal to the inlet power multiplied 1 2 by the term ∆x/kA (ignoring the negative sign). Here, ∆x is the length of the one-dimensional rod. This is very similar to the formula for electrical resistance: ρl/A (ρ is the resistivity, l is the length, and A is the cross-sectional area). We can interpret the constant k as the thermal conductivity. Similarly, for capacitance let us start with the equation: P = ρ.dV.c ∂T. In this case, P can be st p ∂t st mapped to the electrical current and ∂T to the time derivative of voltage (dV/dt). Since I = CdV/dt, ∂t the thermal capacitance can be represented by ρ.dV.c . Note that this is a capacitance to ground. p Theadvantageofthisapproachisthatwecanreplaceathermalproblemwithananalogouselectrical problem, andthenwecanusetraditionalcircuitsimulatorstofindthevoltagesandcurrentsatdifferent places. Thesevaluescanthenbemappedtotemperatureandpowervalues. Sincethereareveryefficient methods to simulate circuits, this method is very efficient. Consider an example in Figure 11.7. The cell in the center is connected to the neighboring cells via thermalresistances. Additionally, notethecapacitancetoground. Forcellsattheedgeswewillnotadd a resistance to the ambient if the boundaries are adiabatic (no heat flow). Figure 11.7: The electrical analog of a thermal problem 11.2.5 The Finite Element Method (FEM) The main advantage of the finite difference based approaches is that they are simple. However, for complicated thermal models that consider a variety of heat transfer paths, the effect of the thermal interface materials and heat transfer via the PCB, often finite element-based methods are found to be more accurate. Along with the effect of capturing complex geometries, this method is also very effective when the properties of materials tend to vary over space. The cost of such additional accuracy is slower speed. Let us now provide an outline of the basic steps that are involved. For a deeper discussion readers can refer to the book by Logan et al. [Logan, 1986].
translation.ha: 623 Smruti R. Ƙarfin lantarki na Sarangi, da ƙarfi tare da wutar lantarki. Wannan ana kiransa da misalin lantarki na matsalar zafi. Bari mu yi ƙoƙarin tsara sauran sharuɗɗan. Ana iya ɗaukar matrix G a matsayin matrix na gudanarwa. Ka tuna daga kimiyyar sakandare cewa gudanarwa ita ce amsawar juriya. Ta hanyar dokar Ohm, samfurin gudanarwa da ƙarfin lantarki daidai yake da wutar lantarki (ƙarfi a wannan yanayin). Kalma ta biyu a cikin LHS, P, ana iya ɗaukarta a matsayin fitowar saitin tushen wutar lantarki. Don haka, jimlar kalmomin biyu a gefen hagu yana nuna jimlar adadin wutar lantarki da aka allura a cikin da'irar. A cikin da'irar lantarki lokacin da aka allurar wutar lantarki, ƙarfin lantarki yana ƙaruwa, wanda ake kamawa ta hanyar magana a gefen dama. Don fahimtar gefen dama, bari mu yi la'akari da daidaiton da suka shafi ƙarfin lantarki: Q = VC (Q shine cajin da aka adana, V shine ƙarfin lantarki, kuma C shine ƙarfin lantarki). Idan muka bambanta shi, muna samun dQ/dt = I = CdV/dt. Ana iya daidaita lokacin da aka samo daga ƙarfin lantarki da lokacin da aka samo daga zafin jiki T (cid:48). Don haka, ana iya ɗaukar matrix C a cikin Lissafi 11.20 a matsayin ƙarfin zafi. Bari yanzu mu bayyana analog na lantarki a cikin yanayi mai sauƙi. Yi la'akari da sandar girma 1. Ta hanyar Lissafi 11.10, bambancin zafin jiki a ƙarshensa T −T daidai yake da ƙarfin shigarwa da aka ninka 1 2 ta kalmar ∆x/kA (yin watsi da alamar mara kyau). A nan, ∆x shine tsawon sandar girma ɗaya. Wannan yayi kama da dabarar juriyar lantarki: ρl/A (ρ shine juriya, l shine tsayi, kuma A shine yankin giciye). Za mu iya fassara daidaiton k a matsayin daidaitaccen yanayin zafi. Hakazalika, don ƙarfin bari mu fara da lissafi: P = ρ.dV.c ∂T. A wannan yanayin, ana iya daidaita P zuwa wutar lantarki da kuma ∂T zuwa lokacin da aka samo asali na ƙarfin lantarki (dV/dt). Tunda I = CdV/dt, ∂t ƙarfin zafi za a iya wakilta shi ta hanyar ρ.dV.c. Lura cewa wannan ƙarfin lantarki ne ga ƙasa. p Amfanin wannan hanyar shine za mu iya maye gurbin matsalar zafi tare da matsalar lantarki mai alaƙa, kuma za mu iya amfani da na'urori masu kwaikwayon da'irori na gargajiya don nemo ƙarfin lantarki da kwararar ruwa a wurare daban-daban. Waɗannan ƙimar za a iya tsara su zuwa ƙimar zafin jiki da iko. Tunda akwai hanyoyi masu inganci don kwaikwayon da'irori, wannan hanyar tana da inganci sosai. Yi la'akari da misali a Hoto na 11.7. Tantanin da ke tsakiya yana da alaƙa da ƙwayoyin da ke maƙwabtaka ta hanyar juriyar zafi. Bugu da ƙari, lura da ƙarfin lantarki zuwa ƙasa. Tilasta gefuna ba za su ƙara juriya ga yanayi ba idan iyakoki suna adiabatic (babu kwararar zafi). Siffa ta 11.7: Misalin wutar lantarki na matsalar zafi 11.2.5 Hanyar Ƙarfin ...

translation.en: SRS Hurricanix E-Learning 1.3.9 Accessibility and Readability  Accessibility Guidelines: Ensure the documentation is accessible, considering readability, use of color, and accommodating various reading aids.  Navigation: Include a table of contents, hyperlinks, or navigation aids for easy access to different sections. 1.3.10 Document Maintenance  Regular Updates: Schedule periodic reviews and updates to keep the documentation current and reflective of project changes.  Archival Process: Define procedures for archiving obsolete versions or retired documents. 1.4 References: This Software Requirements Specification (SRS) document references the following documents: Document Author Ve Date Source URL Title rsi on Scope and Syed Shah 1.0 20-10-2023 SRS E- Vision Hussain and Learning hxHussain/SRS-E- Document Mahad Wajid Repository Learning-Platform Throughout the development of the E-Learning Platform project, the following references will be consulted:  Academic research on educational psychology and pedagogy, focusing on online learning and engagement strategies.  Industry best practices and guidelines for user interface design in e-learning systems.  Reports and studies on educational technology trends and innovations, particularly in online course delivery and learner interaction.  Publications and resources highlighting effective methods for content curation and instructional design in e-learning environments." These references can serve as a foundation for understanding the pedagogical, technological, and design aspects essential for developing a robust and engaging E-Learning Platform. translation.en: Software Requirements Specification for Elysium Page 20 3.3.6 Use Case #6 Author - This use case was written by Gottupulla Venkata Aman and Ritesh Baviskar. Purpose - To inform users about upcoming workshops and open registration. Requirements Traceability - The coaches and counsellors will have access to a common database which they will update regarding workshops and events within a certain timeframe. Also, coaches and counsellors and students will have access to the app which will notify them regarding upcoming sessions. Priority - The priority of this use case is medium. The app will still retain its main functionality even if this use case fails. Preconditions - The coaches and counsellors should update the database as and when required. Post conditions - The users have the sessions and workshops in their upcoming schedule and all users will be notified. Actors - Coaches and counsellors for scheduling sessions and students for booking sessions. Exceptions - Users who have opted out of the notifications will not be notified.
translation.ha: Bayanin Bukatun Software don Elysium Shafi na 20 3.3.6 Shawarar Amfani #6 Marubuci - Gottupulla Venkata Aman da Ritesh Baviskar ne suka rubuta wannan shari'ar amfani. Manufa - Don sanar da masu amfani game da tarurrukan bita da kuma rajistar budewa. Bukatu Bibiya - Masu horarwa da masu ba da shawara za su sami damar shiga rumbun bayanai na wanda za su sabunta game da tarurrukan bita da abubuwan da suka faru a cikin wani lokaci. Haka kuma, masu horarwa da masu ba da shawara da ɗalibai za su sami damar shiga manhajar wanda zai sanar da su game da zaman da ke tafe. Fifiko - Fifiko na wannan shari'ar amfani shine matsakaici. Manhajar za ta ci gaba da riƙe babban aikinta koda kuwa wannan shari'ar amfani ta gaza. Sharuɗɗa na gaba - Masu horarwa da masu ba da shawara ya kamata sabunta rumbun bayanai na <TECH> kamar yadda ake buƙata. Sharuɗɗan bayan-bayanan - Masu amfani suna da zaman da bita a cikin jadawalin su na gaba kuma za a sanar da duk masu amfani. 'Yan wasan kwaikwayo - Masu horarwa da masu ba da shawara don tsara zaman da ɗalibai don yin rajistar zaman. Keɓancewa - Ba za a sanar da masu amfani da suka zaɓi fita daga sanarwar ba.

translation.en: SOFTWARE REQUIREMENTS SPECIFICATION 2014 - 11 - 26 2.3.2. Product functions The game is a single player game with 4 levels with similar characteristics. The gameplay is in an environment where the player moves around on the screen with the character Bloba, who has a number on his body. Enemies (slobs) will spawn, appearing from different directions on the screens with numbers of their bodys. The players objective is to convert these enemies which is done by colliding with them. The player should only collide with enemies which has equal or smaller numbers on their body, otherwise the number on the player will decrease, vice versa, a successful collision will result in an increase of the players number. There are different difficulties in the different levels and this is managed through the spawning of slobs with different levels, characteristics and spawning frequency. There are 4 different kinds of enemies which have different colors, moving patterns and speed. In addition to that the also have different “levels” or “sizes” i.e numbers on their body. The level is finished when the player has reached a certain number on his body. The 4th level which is the boss level also have the same characteristics as the earlier 3 except for the enemy Mad Zloby which appears in this one. After the conversion of Mad Zloby the game is finished. The user can customize their avatar which they will use in the game. After finishing each level the player will get a score in stars, one , two or three. When finishing the game the accumulated amount of stars can be viewed in the score. 2.3.3. User Characteristics This is a childrens game and the targeted group is 4-10 year olds. The youngest of these may not know math that well but the game uses wasy colors, shapes and numbers to assure that this group understand the game dynamics. The colors and size of the enemies will represent their characteristics and therefore their possible actions and movement will be predictable even for the youngest players. The older of the interval is supposed to not have any problems in understanding the game due to their preschool, early school education due to their understanding of numbers and math. As earlier mentioned the parents of the user will be able to use this game as a babysitter i.e. an activity to keep their child entertained for a while without having to help their children to understand the game. 2.3.4. Constraints, Assumptions and dependencies The application is constrained by the tv-box operating system and the navigation is constrained to the STB-remote control. One assumption about the application is that it will be displayed on televisions that can handle resolutions up to 720p and have the dimension format of 16:9 or 4:3. 8
translation.ha: <FASAHA>BAYANI GAME DA BUKATAR SOFTWARE</FASAHA> 2014 - 11 - 26 2.3.2. Ayyukan Samfura Wasan wasa ne na ɗan wasa ɗaya mai matakai 4 masu kama da juna. Wasan yana cikin yanayi inda ɗan wasa ke motsawa a allon tare da halin Bloba, wanda ke da lamba a jikinsa. Maƙiya (slobs) za su fito, suna bayyana daga wurare daban-daban akan allon tare da lambobin jikinsu. Manufar 'yan wasan shine a mayar da waɗannan abokan gaba wanda ake yi ta hanyar karo da su. Ya kamata ɗan wasan  ya yi karo da abokan gaba waɗanda ke da lambobi iri ɗaya ko ƙanana a jikinsu, in ba haka ba lambar da ke kan ɗan wasan za ta ragu, akasin haka, karo mai nasara zai haifar da ƙaruwar adadin 'yan wasa. Akwai matsaloli daban-daban a cikin matakai daban-daban kuma ana sarrafa wannan ta hanyar haifar da slobs tare da matakai daban-daban, halaye da mitar haihuwa. Akwai nau'ikan maƙiya guda 4 daban-daban waɗanda ke da launuka daban-daban, tsarin motsi da sauri. Baya ga haka kuma suna da "matakai" ko "girma" daban-daban a jikinsu. Matakin yana ƙarewa ne lokacin da ɗan wasan ya kai wani lamba a jikinsa. Mataki na 4 wanda shine matakin shugaba shi ma yana da halaye iri ɗaya da na farko guda 3 banda abokin gaba Mad Zloby wanda ya bayyana a cikin wannan. Bayan an canza Mad Zloby wasan ya ƙare. Mai amfani da <TECH> zai iya keɓance avatar ɗinsa wanda zai yi amfani da shi a wasan. Bayan kammala kowane mataki ɗan wasan zai sami maki a cikin taurari, ɗaya, biyu ko uku. Lokacin kammala wasan ana iya ganin tarin taurari a cikin maki. 2.3.3. Halayen Mai amfani Wannan wasan yara ne kuma ƙungiyar da aka yi niyya ita ce 'yan shekara 4-10. Ƙaramin cikin waɗannan ba zai iya sanin lissafi sosai ba amma wasan yana amfani da launuka masu laushi, siffofi da lambobi don tabbatar da cewa wannan rukunin ya fahimci yanayin wasan. Launuka da girman maƙiyan za su wakilci halayensu kuma saboda haka ayyukansu da motsinsu za a iya hasashen su har ma ga ƙananan 'yan wasa. Ana tsammanin cewa mafi tsufan lokacin ba zai sami wata matsala ba wajen fahimtar wasan saboda ilimin makarantar yara ta gaba, ilimin firamare saboda fahimtar lambobi da lissafi. Kamar yadda aka ambata a baya, iyayen mai amfani da  za su iya amfani da wannan wasan a matsayin mai kula da yara wato wani aiki don nishadantar da ɗansu na ɗan lokaci ba tare da taimaka wa 'ya'yansu su fahimci wasan ba. 2.3.4. Takamaiman Kariya, Zato da Abubuwan da suka dogara da shi Aikace-aikacen <TECH> yana da iyaka ta tsarin  mai aiki da akwatin talabijin kuma kewayawa yana da iyaka ga ikon sarrafawa na nesa na STB. Zato ɗaya game da aikace-aikacen <TECH> shine za a nuna shi akan talabijin waɗanda zasu iya sarrafa ƙuduri har zuwa 720p kuma suna da tsarin girma na 16:9 ko 4:3. 8

translation.en: Pressure and Winds MODULE - 4 The domain of Air on and regional factors, both at the surface and in the upper troposphere (see the Earth fig. 11.8) Notes Fig. 11.8 The Monsoon Winds India, Pakistan, Bangladesh, Myanmar(Burma), Sri Lanka, the Arabian Sea, the Bay of Bengal, South-east Asia, North Australia, China and Japan are important regions where monsoon winds are prevalent.  Winds which reverse their direction with the change of seasons are called monsoons. (c) Local Winds Till now we were discussing the major winds of the earth’s surface, which are vital for understanding the climatic regions. But we are all aware that there are winds that affect local weather. Local winds usually affect small areas and are confined to the lower levels of the troposphere. Some of the local winds are given below : (i) Land and Sea Breezes Land and sea breezes are prevalent on the narrow strips along the coasts or a lake. It is a diurnal (daily) cycle, in which the differential heating of land and water produces low and high pressures. During the day when landmass gets heated more quickly than the adjoining sea or large lake; air expands and rises. This process produces a local low pressure area on land. Sea breeze then develops, blowing from the water (high pressure) towards the land (low pressure). The sea breeze begins to develop shortly before noon and generally reaches its greatest intensity during mid-day to late afternoon. These cool winds have a significant moderating influence in coastal area. GEOGRAPHY 205
translation.ha: MA'AUNIN Matsi da Iska - 4 Yankin Iska a saman da kuma abubuwan da ke yankin, duka a saman da kuma a saman troposphere (duba hoton Duniya na 11.8) Bayanan kula Hoto na 11.8 Iskar Dusar ƙanƙara Indiya, Pakistan, Bangladesh, Myanmar (Burma), Sri Lanka, Tekun Larabawa, Tekun Bengal, Kudu maso Gabashin Asiya, Arewacin Ostiraliya, China da Japan yankuna ne masu mahimmanci inda iskar dasar take yaduwa.  Iskar da ke juyawa alkiblarta tare da canjin yanayi ana kiranta da monsoons. (c) Iskar Gida Har zuwa yanzu muna tattaunawa kan manyan iskar saman duniya, waɗanda suke da mahimmanci don fahimtar yankunan yanayi. Amma duk mun san cewa akwai iskar da ke shafar yanayin gida. Iskar gida yawanci tana shafar ƙananan yankuna kuma tana iyakance ga ƙananan matakan troposphere. Wasu daga cikin iskar gida an bayar da su a ƙasa: (i) Iskar Ƙasa da Teku Iskar ƙasa da teku suna yaɗuwa a kan ƙananan layukan da ke gefen teku ko tafki. Zagaye ne na yau da kullun (na yau da kullun), wanda bambancin dumama ƙasa da ruwa ke haifar da matsin lamba mai sauƙi da mai yawa. A lokacin da ƙasar ke dumama da sauri fiye da teku ko babban tafki da ke maƙwabtaka; iska tana faɗaɗawa da tashi. Wannan tsari yana samar da yankin matsin lamba mai sauƙi na gida a ƙasa. Iskar teku tana tasowa, tana busawa daga ruwa (matsin lamba mai yawa) zuwa ƙasa (matsin lamba mai sauƙi). Iskar teku tana fara bunƙasa jim kaɗan kafin tsakar rana kuma gabaɗaya tana kaiwa ga mafi girman ƙarfinta a tsakiyar rana zuwa ƙarshen rana. Waɗannan iska masu sanyi suna da tasiri mai mahimmanci a yankin bakin teku. GEOGRAPHY 205

translation.en: Smruti R. Sarangi 732 ofthebitvectors. Thisisveryeasytovisualizeifwethinkabouthowweactuallymultiplythenumbers using the standard primary-school multiplication algorithm. Figuring out a proof for this is left as an exercise for the reader. Wecanuseastandardsystolicarchitecturetocomputetheconvolution. Sinceitisindependentofthe number of elements (operand width in this case), we can use it to implement a bit-serial multiplier that multipliestwooperandsbitbybitcompletelydisregardingthewidthoftheoperands. Themultipliercan thus scale to any precision. Even though we gain a tremendous degree of flexibility by using such bit- serial multipliers, the latency suffers. Such multipliers take O(N) time, whereas a conventional parallel multipliertakesO(log(N))time. Here, N istheoperandwidth. Thiscanbeoffsetbythefactthatsuch multipliers have a very low area and power footprint. Bit-serial architectures can additionally make optimizations based on zero-valued bits. The key idea is to break a large n-bit number into several smaller m-bit numbers. For each of these numbers we compute the length of the prefix and suffix that contain all zeros. These are ineffectual bits, and need not be considered in the multiplication. We then multiply these m-bit numbers with the filter weight usingabit-serialmultiplier,andthenleft-shifttheresultaccordingtothelengthofthezero-valuedsuffix and the position of the m-bit number within the larger number. We can then use a traditional adder tree to add all of these partial sums. 14.5 Memory System Organization Up till now we have only discussed the design of the compute engines of CNN accelerators. However, the design of the memory system is also equally important. This is because a large array of PEs also requires a very high memory bandwidth. We need to supply all the inputs, partial sums, and weights to the large array of PEs. This requires a very high-bandwidth connection to memory. Latency is not particularly important here. The most important metric that we are concerned with is the achieved throughput. 14.5.1 DRAM+SRAM based Organization The traditional approach uses DRAM banks for off-chip memory, and SRAM technology for the global buffer and the on-chip local buffers. Consider the output stationary (OS) architecture presented in Figure 14.9. In such architectures we typically stream the inputs from one side, and stream in the filter weights from another side of the 2D array. Consider a 16×16 PE array. This means that we typically need to read 16 different input streams, and 16 different filter streams in parallel. The only way of sustaining such a high degree of parallelism is to have a 32-banked global buffer. We dedicate 16 banks to store the inputs, and we dedicate 16 banks to store the filter weights. Every cycle we access all the banks and stream in data from them. Therearetwowaystomanagetheprocessofloadingthelocalbuffersandtheglobalbuffers. Thefirst methodistousethetraditionalcacheevictionandreplacementmechanismstofillanydatathatthelocal buffer or global buffer may require. This is the traditional pull-based mechanism. However, in the case of a CNN, since the entire computational process is deterministic, we can have a push-based mechanism where we have a dedicated finite state machine that loads data from the lower levels of memory at appropriate times and effectively acts as a data prefetching engine. This process can be automated where the FSM figures out the data access pattern automatically, or it can use hints embedded in the code. The latter approach is preferred in high-performance designs. Let us show an example for an OS architecture. translation.ha: Smruti R. Sarangi 732 na bitvectors. Wannan yana da sauƙin gani idan muka yi tunani game da yadda za mu ninka lambobi ta amfani da tsarin ninkawa na makarantar firamare na daidai. Gano hujja don wannan an bar shi azaman darasi ga mai karatu. Za mu iya amfani da daidaitattun tsarin gine-gine don ƙididdige juyin halittar. Tunda ba ya dogara da adadin abubuwan da ke cikin (faɗin aiki a wannan yanayin), za mu iya amfani da shi don aiwatar da bit-serial multiplier wanda ke ninka opera biyu bit-bit gaba ɗaya ba tare da la'akari da faɗin opera. Multiplier ɗin zai iya yin girma zuwa kowane daidaito ba. Ko da yake muna samun babban matakin sassauci ta amfani da irin waɗannan bit-serial multiplier, latency na  yana shan wahala. Irin waɗannan multiplier suna ɗaukar lokaci O(N), yayin da multiplier na yau da kullun yana ɗaukar lokaci O(log(N)). A nan, N shine opera da faɗi. Wannan za a iya gyara shi ta hanyar gaskiyar cewa irin waɗannan multiplier suna da ƙarancin yanki da sawun ƙarfi. Tsarin bit serial na iya yin gyare-gyare bisa ga bits masu ƙimar sifili. Babban ra'ayin shine a raba babban lambar n-bit zuwa ƙananan lambobi na m-bit da yawa. Ga kowane ɗaya daga cikin waɗannan lambobi muna ƙididdige tsawon prefix da kari wanda ke ɗauke da duk sifili. Waɗannan bits ne marasa tasiri, kuma ba lallai ne a yi la'akari da su a cikin ninkawa ba. Sannan muna ninka waɗannan lambobin m-bit tare da nauyin tacewa ta amfani da abit-serialmultiplier, sannan a canza su zuwa hagu bisa ga tsawon kari na sifili da matsayin lambar m-bit a cikin babban lamba. Sannan za mu iya amfani da bishiyar adder ta gargajiya don ƙara duk waɗannan jimillar jimilla. 14.5 Ƙwaƙwalwa <TECH>Tsarin Tsarin Har zuwa yanzu mun tattauna kawai game da ƙirar injunan kwamfuta na masu haɓaka CNN. Duk da haka, ƙirar tsarin ƙwaƙwalwa shima yana da mahimmanci. Wannan saboda babban jerin PEs kuma yana buƙatar babban bandwidth na ƙwaƙwalwar . Muna buƙatar samar da dukkan abubuwan shigarwa, jimillar jimilla, da nauyi ga manyan jerin PEs. Wannan yana buƙatar haɗin bandwidth mai yawa na TECH zuwa ƙwaƙwalwa. <TECH>Latency ba shi da mahimmanci a nan. Mafi mahimmancin ma'auni da muke damuwa da shi shine yawan abin da aka samu. 14.5.1 Tsarin DRAM+SRAM Hanyar gargajiya tana amfani da bankunan DRAM don ƙwaƙwalwar ajiya ta waje, da fasahar SRAM don buffer na duniya da buffer na gida akan guntu. Yi la'akari da tsarin fitarwa na tsaye (OS) da aka gabatar a Hoto na 14.9. A cikin irin waɗannan gine-ginen yawanci muna kwararar shigarwar daga gefe ɗaya, kuma muna kwararar nauyin tacewa daga wani gefen jerin 2D. Yi la'akari da jerin PE na 16×16. Wannan yana nufin cewa yawanci muna buƙatar karanta rafukan shigarwa daban-daban 16, da rafukan tacewa daban-daban 16 a layi ɗaya. Hanya ɗaya tilo ta ci gaba da irin wannan babban matakin daidaitawa ita ce samun buffer na duniya mai banki 32. Mun keɓe bankuna 16 don adana abubuwan da aka shigar, kuma mun keɓe bankuna 16 don adana nauyin tacewa. Kowace zagaye muna shiga dukkan bankunan kuma muna kwarara cikin bayanai daga gare su. Akwai hanyoyi biyu don sarrafa tsarin loda buffers na gida da buffers na duniya. Hanya ta farko ita ce cacheevition na gargajiya da maye gurbin tsarin adana bayanai wanda buffer na gida ko buffer na duniya na iya ke buƙata. Wannan ita ce hanyar da aka saba amfani da ita. Koyaya, a yanayin CNN, tunda dukkan tsarin lissafi yana da ƙayyadaddun tsari, za mu iya samun hanyar da aka dogara da turawa inda muke da na'urar da aka keɓe wacce ke loda bayanai bayanai daga ƙananan matakan ƙwaƙwalwa a lokutan da suka dace kuma tana aiki yadda ya kamata azaman injin ɗaukar bayanai na bayanai. Ana iya sarrafa wannan tsari ta atomatik inda FSM ke gano tsarin samun damar bayanai ta atomatik, ko kuma yana iya amfani da alamun da aka saka a cikin lambar. Hanyar ta ƙarshe an fi so a cikin ƙirar aiki mai girma. Bari mu nuna misali ga tsarin tsarin aiki.
