translation.en: MODULE - 5 Biosphere The domain of Life on the Earth Notes Fig. 14.5 A pH Scale The long – term effects of acid precipitation on human health and agricultural production have not yet been ascertained precisely. However, the most conspicuous damage is being done to aquatic eco-system. Below given are some of the effects of acid rain. The eco-system of a stream or lake may be severely affected when its pH falls below 5. Total biomass in such systems is reduced from two to ten times because few organisms can tolerate acid. The diversity of species also decreases. The most severe effect of acidification is on fish. Acidic conditions affect the reproductive capabilities of fish, resulting in a slow decline of fish population. This has been documented in various parts of Europe and North America. In Norway, thousands of lakes and streams have largely lost their fish population, over an areas of 33,000 square kilometer. Several lakes in Eastern United States and Canada have become biological deserts during the last quarter century. The precise effects of acid rain on forest are not clearly understood, evidence, however, shows that it is responsible for forests dieback which is occurring in each continent. Forest dieback is a German word which means death or decline of forest. Even buildings and monuments are being destroyed because acid deposition accelerated erosion capacity. Acid rain is a serious global problem and its impact can spread over long distances from the origin of the pollutant. That is why Scandinavian countries complain about British pollution in Europe whereas Canadians blame United States in North America. 262 GEOGRAPHY
translation.ha: MASU KYAU - 5 Biosphere Ma'aunin Rayuwa a Duniya Bayanan Hoto na 14.5 A Sikelin pH Har yanzu ba a tantance tasirin ruwan sama na acid na dogon lokaci akan lafiyar ɗan adam da kuma samar da aikin gona ba. Duk da haka, mafi girman barna da ake gani ana yi wa tsarin muhallin ruwa . A ƙasa akwai wasu daga cikin tasirin ruwan sama na acid. Tsarin <TECH> na rafi ko tafki <TECH> na iya shafar sosai lokacin da pH ɗinsa ya faɗi ƙasa da 5. Jimlar biomass a cikin irin waɗannan tsarin yana raguwa daga sau biyu zuwa goma saboda ƙananan halittu ne za su iya jure acid. Bambancin nau'ikan kuma yana raguwa. Mafi munin tasirin acidification yana kan kifi. Yanayin acid yana shafar ikon haihuwa na kifi, wanda ke haifar da raguwar yawan kifaye a hankali. An rubuta wannan a sassa daban-daban na Turai da Arewacin Amurka. A Norway, dubban tafkuna da koguna sun rasa yawan kifayensu, a kan yankuna na murabba'in kilomita 33,000. Tafkuna da dama a Gabashin Amurka da Kanada sun zama hamadar halittu a cikin kwata na ƙarshe. Ba a fahimce ainihin tasirin ruwan sama mai guba ga dazuzzuka a sarari ba, duk da haka, shaidu sun nuna cewa ita ce ke da alhakin mutuwar dazuzzukan da ke faruwa a kowace nahiya. Dazuzzukan dazuzzuka kalma ce ta Jamusanci wacce ke nufin mutuwa ko raguwar dazuzzuka. Har ma gine-gine da abubuwan tarihi ana lalata su saboda ajiyar acid yana hanzarta ƙarfin zaizayar ƙasa. Ruwan sama mai guba matsala ce ta duniya mai tsanani kuma tasirinsa na iya yaɗuwa a wurare masu nisa daga asalin gurɓataccen abu. Shi ya sa ƙasashen <TECH>Scandinavian ke korafi game da gurɓataccen Birtaniya a Turai yayin da 'Yan Kanada ke zargin Amurka a Arewacin Amurka. 262 GEOGRAPHY

translation.en: Software Requirements Specification for PedalPal Page-22 • Performance Scalability: The number of users will increase in large numbers during campus fests. Ensure the software can handle an increased load as the user base grows. 5.3.3 Reliability • The MTTF (mean time to failure) shall be more than one week. • The system must undergo extensive feature testing, load testing, and regression testing prior to release and/or deployment. • The system should be reliable in giving correct results consistently. 5.3.4 Portability We are using Django with bootstrap and inline CSS to design the front-end part of our appli- cation, thus our application is portable, responsive and can run on most of the modern web browsers.

translation.en: SoftwareRequirementsSpecificationfor<InventoryManager> Page2 - (Log list) - (Filtering and Searching) - (Networking and Sockets) 2. Overall Description 2.1 Product Perspective - This product is not a member of a follow up or a product family, as it is a stand alone application. In terms of other requirements; the application is dependent on an android device of android version 5.0 or greater. As stated in 1.1, we chose this version for the accessibility of facilities that choose not to update their software. Two Major Components of Program: - Log Interaction Across Employee and Manager layers: An item log will be given a Type, name, and minimum amount. This is an object created with the properties of a fillable log that an employee gets to complete and send back. Essentially, the contents of - Server implementation: For the practicality of a manager and employee interaction we assume that these two will not always be together to transfer information manually. Therefore, we rely on this server client to communicate with so that different interfaces can receive this information, and require a manual save from the server client to save and send it though. 2.2 Product Functions Our product provides the user to fulfill multiple duties depending on their role as an employee or manager in their respective company or organization. In general, the user can create, view, and manage logs and manipulate the data within those logs. For the Manager side, he or she can create a new type of log consisting of a minimum amount of the item requested. The type is an indication of what category the requested item comes from. ● Employees are to report inventory quantity and indicate from the report which item is either consumed frequently or not in frequent use. ● Manager Creates and Set New Logs of different types to request and check on item space ○ Types being the category of which an item comes from (ex; Type:Kitchenware, Item: Spoons) ● UML (Full Diagram next page)
translation.ha: Bukatun SoftwareBayani na<InventoryManager> Shafi na 2 - (Jerin Rajista) - (Tacewa da Bincike) - (Sadarwar Sadarwa da Sockets) 2. Bayani Gabaɗaya 2.1 Ra'ayin Samfura - Wannan samfurin ba memba bane na bin diddigin kaya ko dangin samfura, domin aikace-aikacen  ne kawai. Dangane da wasu buƙatu; aikace-aikacen  ya dogara ne akan na'urar android ta sigar android 5.0 ko sama da haka. Kamar yadda aka bayyana a cikin 1.1, mun zaɓi wannan sigar don samun damar kayan aiki waɗanda suka zaɓi kada su sabunta software ɗin su. Manyan Abubuwa Biyu na Shirin: - Hulɗar Rajista a Tsakanin Matakan Ma'aikata da Manaja: Za a ba wa rajistar abu Nau'i, suna, da mafi ƙarancin adadin. Wannan abu ne da aka ƙirƙira tare da kaddarorin rajistar cikawa wanda ma'aikaci zai iya kammalawa da aikawa. Ainihin, abubuwan da ke cikin aiwatar da - Sabar: Don amfanin hulɗar manaja da ma'aikaci, muna ɗauka cewa waɗannan biyun ba koyaushe za su kasance tare don canja wurin bayanai da hannu ba. Saboda haka, mun dogara da wannan sabar abokin ciniki don sadarwa da su ta yadda hanyoyin sadarwa daban-daban za su iya karɓar wannan bayani, kuma muna buƙatar adanawa da hannu daga sabar abokin ciniki don adanawa da aika shi. 2.2 Ayyukan Samfura Samfur ɗinmu yana ba wa mai amfani don cika ayyuka da yawa dangane da matsayinsa na ma'aikaci ko manaja a cikin kamfaninsa ko ƙungiyarsa. Gabaɗaya, mai amfani mai amfani zai iya ƙirƙirar, duba, da sarrafa rajista da kuma sarrafa bayanai a cikin waɗannan rajistan ayyukan. Ga ɓangaren Manaja, zai iya ƙirƙirar sabon nau'in rajista wanda ya ƙunshi mafi ƙarancin adadin abin da aka nema. translation.en: 3 Revision History Version Date ReasonforChanges Name 1.0 4/21/2024 Initialversion. FirstPharmacySystem 1. INTRODUCTION 1.1 Purpose This document specifies the software requirements for a pharmaceutical store management system. The purpose of this system is to effectively manage the pharmaceutical store by achieving the following objectives: 1. Facilitating effective policing through the provision of stock drug statistics. 2. Maintaining database accuracy through options to update the stock of drugs. 3. Enhancing system efficiency by effectively monitoring services and activities. 4. Optimizing drug inventory management by monitoring drug movement in the pharmacy. 5. Implementing restricted access levels based on functionality and role. 6. Ensuring user-friendliness of the system. 7. Generating reports within specified timeframes. This Software Requirements Specification (SRS) covers the entire scope of the pharmaceutical store management system. 1.2 Document Conventions This document is printed on A4 paper. Normal font is 11 black Arial font, while section headings are size 16, bolded. Sub headings are bolded size 12 against white backgrounds. These conventions ensure consistency and readability within the SRS document. 1.3 Intended Audience and Reading Suggestions The intended readers of this document are the developers of the software, software owners, managers. However, this document is written in such a way that anyone not involved in the project or its subject matter could understand it. It is recommended that the document is read in its entirety so as to not miss crucial aspects of the project. The contents are arranged according to priority so the organized items should be read sequentially. No particular difference in reader type should affect how the document is read or in what order.

translation.en: Smruti R. Sarangi 672 the encryption. All encryption algorithms rely on such a secret key, and may also use multiple keys for encryption and decryption respectively. We can divide the space of encryption algorithms into two types: block ciphers and stream ciphers. Block ciphers encrypt data block by block, where a block is between 128 bits and 1024 bits, and stream ciphers encrypt data at a smaller granularity. It is typically possible to parallelize the implementation of block ciphers, however, stream ciphers have a predominantly sequential character. There are two properties that such ciphers should normally satisfy namely confusion and diffusion (see Definition 101). Definition 101 Confusion If we change a single bit of the key, most or all of the ciphertext bits will be affected. This ensures that the key and ciphertext are not correlated (in a statistical sense), and thus given the ciphertext, it is hard to guess the key. Diffusion This property states that if we change a single bit in the plaintext, then statistically half thebitsintheciphertextshouldchange, andlikewiseifwechangeonebitintheciphertextthen statistically half the bits in the plain text should change. This reduces the correlation between the plaintext and the ciphertext. Many of the algorithms have interesting confusion-diffusion trade-offs, which we shall study in this section. 13.1.1 AES Block Cipher Themostpopularblockcipheralgorithmasof2020istheAESalgorithm(AdvancedEncryptionStand- ard). The AES algorithm typically has a block size of 128 bits, and it uses three different key sizes (depending upon the degree of security that is required): 128, 192, or 256 bits. The AES algorithm is dividedintoasequenceofrounds, whereineachroundweperformsimplesubstitutionandpermutation operations. The number of rounds depends on the key size as shown in Table 13.1. Key size Rounds 128 10 192 12 256 14 Table 13.1: AES key sizes and rounds Consider a sequence of 128 bits or 16 bytes of plaintext. Let us number the bytes as B ,B ...B . 0 1 15 We can represent the 16 bytes as a 4×4 matrix of byte-sized blocks as shown below.   B B B B 0 4 8 12 B 1 B 5 B 9 B 13   B 2 B 6 B 10 B 14 B B B B 3 7 11 15 This matrix is known as the state of the algorithm. The state is initially set equal to a block of plaintext. Subsequently, in each round we perform a subset of the following operations. They modify this matrix. After all the rounds, this matrix contains the bytes of the ciphertext.
translation.ha: Smruti R. Sarangi 672 ɓoyewar. Duk algorithms na ɓoyewa sun dogara da irin wannan maɓallin sirri, kuma na iya kuma suna amfani da maɓallai da yawa don ɓoyewa da ɓoyewa bi da bi. Za mu iya raba sararin algorithms na ɓoyewa zuwa nau'i biyu: toshewar sirri da ɓoyewar sirri. Toshewar sirri suna ɓoyewar bayanai  toshe ta hanyar toshewa, inda toshe yake tsakanin ragowa 128 da ragowa 1024, kuma ɓoyewar sirri suna ɓoyewar bayanai  a ƙaramin girman. Yawanci yana yiwuwa a daidaita aiwatar da ɓoyewar sirri, duk da haka, ɓoyewar sirri suna da halayyar da ta fi dacewa a jere. Akwai halaye guda biyu da irin waɗannan ɓoyewar sirri  yakamata su gamsar da su galibi sune rikicewa da yaɗuwa (duba Ma'anar 101). Ma'anar 101 Ruɗani Idan muka canza ɗan ƙaramin maɓalli, yawancin ko duk ɓangarorin ɓoyewar sirri za su shafi. Wannan yana tabbatar da cewa maɓallin da rubutun ɓoyewar sirri ba su da alaƙa (a ma'anar ƙididdiga), don haka idan aka ba da rubutun ɓoyewar sirri, yana da wuya a yi hasashen maɓallin. Yaɗawa Wannan kadara ta bayyana cewa idan muka canza ɗan ƙaramin abu a cikin rubutun da aka bayyana, to a kididdiga rabin bit ɗin da ke cikin rubutun da aka fassara ya kamata ya canza, haka nan idan muka canza bit ɗin da aka fassara sannan a kididdiga rabin bit ɗin da ke cikin rubutun da aka fassara ya kamata ya canza. Wannan yana rage alaƙar da ke tsakanin rubutun da aka fassara da kuma rubutun da aka fassara. Yawancin algorithms suna da musayar rikice-rikice masu ban sha'awa, waɗanda za mu yi nazari a kansu a wannan sashe. 13.1.1 AES Block Cipher Mafi Shahararriyar Blockcipheralgorithmas na 2020 shine AESalgorithm (AdvancedEncryptionStandard- ard). Algorithm na AES yawanci yana da girman tubali na bit 128, kuma yana amfani da girma uku daban-daban (ya danganta da matakin tsaro na TECH </TECH> da ake buƙata): bit 128, 192, ko bit 256. Algorithm na AES an raba shi zuwa zagaye, inda kowane zagaye ke yin sauƙaƙan musanya da canje-canje. Adadin zagaye ya dogara da girman maɓalli kamar yadda aka nuna a Tebur 13.1. Girman maɓalli Zagaye 128 10 192 12 256 14 Tebur 13.1: Girman maɓalli da zagaye na AES Yi la'akari da jerin ragowa 128 ko byte 16 na rubutu mai sauƙi. Bari mu ƙidaya bytes kamar B,B ...B. 0 1 15 Za mu iya wakiltar bytes 16 a matsayin matrix 4 × 4 na tubalan girman byte kamar yadda aka nuna a ƙasa.   B B B B 0 4 8 12 B 1 B 5 B 9 B 13   B 2 B 6 B 10 B 14 B B B 3 7 11 15 Wannan matrix an san shi da yanayin algorithm. Da farko an saita yanayin daidai da toshe na rubutu mai sauƙi. Daga baya, a kowane zagaye muna yin ƙaramin aiki na waɗannan ayyuka. Suna gyara wannan matrix. Bayan duk zagaye, wannan matrix yana ɗauke da baiti na rubutun sirri.

translation.en: 599 Smruti R. Sarangi 10.7 Summary and Further Reading 10.7.1 Summary Summary 9 1. A typical DRAM cell is very simple; it has a single transistor and a single capacitor. 2. Two kinds of capacitors are used to create modern DRAM cells: a trench capacitor and a stacked capacitor. 3. Akin to SRAM cells, we can create an array of DRAM cells. The major difference is that in this case, the sense amplifiers appear before the column multiplexer/demultiplexer. The sense amplifiers are also designed differently. They are designed to also buffer data for the entire row (page) of cells, and drive the voltages of the bit lines. 4. Itistypicallynecessarytospliteachbitlineintomultiplesegments. Therearetwoarchitectures in this space: open bit line array architecture and folded bit line array architecture. The latter design is more tolerant to noise, at the cost of lower storage density. 5. DRAM reads are destructive in the sense that once a row is read, the contents of the cells that store a logical 1 are destroyed. Hence, it is necessary to restore their values. Since the contents of the row are stored in the array of sense amplifiers (row buffer), if subsequent reads are to the same row, then their values can be supplied from the row buffer. 6. Each DRAM cell can maintain its state for at the most 32 to 64 ms. The charge stored across the capacitor gradually leaks out. Hence, it is necessary to periodically refresh (read and then write) every single cell in the DRAM array. 7. TheearliestversionsofDRAMusedasynchronoustransfer. Therowaddresswassynchronized with the RAS strobe signal and the column address was synchronized with the CAS strobe signal. Even though pure asynchronous transfer is a generic solution; however, it has low performance and scalability. 8. Given that we often fetch a sequence of bytes from DRAM memory, a more efficient method of transfer is the fast page mode (FPM). After sending a row address, the controller sends a series of column addresses for that row. We read the sequence of bits corresponding to the column addresses. A shortcoming of this method is that we wait to receive the data and then only we send the next column address. 9. ThenextgenerationofDRAMtechnologywascalledextendeddataout(EDO).Thisovercomes the shortcoming of the FPM technology, by overlapping the transmission of data and column addresses. To provide the timing for the data signals, an additional data strobe signal DQS is used 10. EDO was succeeded by the burst extended data out (BEDO) technology. In this case, for a single column address, we read multiple bits – essentially prefetch the next few bits. This reduces the need to send additional column addresses. 11. AllofthesetechnologieshavebeensupersededbysynchronousDRAMtechnologies. TheDRAM devices have a clock that is synchronized with the clock of the memory controller prior to a message transmission.
translation.ha: 599 Smruti R. Sarangi 10.7 Takaitawa da Karin Karatu 10.7.1 Takaitawa Takaitawa 9 1. Tantanin halitta na DRAM na yau da kullun abu ne mai sauƙi; yana da transistor guda ɗaya da capacitor guda ɗaya. 2. Ana amfani da nau'ikan capacitors guda biyu don ƙirƙirar</TECH>ƙwayoyin zamani na DRAM: capacitor mai rami da capacitor mai tara. 3. Kamar ƙwayoyin SRAM, za mu iya ƙirƙirar jerin ƙwayoyin DRAM. Babban bambanci shine a wannan yanayin, amplifiers masu ji suna bayyana a gaban column multiplexer/demultiplexer. Hakanan an tsara amplifiers masu ji daban. An tsara su don kuma adana Bayanai don dukkan layuka (shafi) na ƙwayoyin, da kuma tuƙi ƙarfin lantarki na layukan bit. 4. Yana da mahimmanci a yi amfani da shi a matsayin tsari mai sauƙi. Akwai gine-gine guda biyu a cikin wannan sarari: tsarin array na layin bit mai buɗewa da tsarin array na layin bit mai naɗewa. Tsarin na ƙarshe ya fi jure hayaniya, a farashin ƙarancin yawan ajiya. 5. Karatun DRAM yana lalatawa ta hanyar cewa da zarar an karanta layi , abubuwan da ke cikin ƙwayoyin da ke adana ma'ana 1 za su lalace. Saboda haka, ya zama dole a dawo da ƙimarsu. Tunda abubuwan da ke cikin layin an adana su a cikin jerin amplifiers na ji (layi mai ma'ana), idan karatuttukan da ke biyo baya suna kan layi ɗaya, to ana iya samar da ƙimarsu daga ma'aunin layin. 6. Kowace ƙwayar DRAM za ta iya kiyaye yanayinta na matsakaicin 32 zuwa 64 ms. Cajin da aka adana a kan capacitor a hankali yana zubewa. Saboda haka, ya zama dole a sabunta lokaci-lokaci (karanta sannan a rubuta) kowace ƙwayar halitta a cikin jerin DRAM. 7. Sauye-sauyen farko na DRAM sun yi amfani da canja wurin synchronous. An haɗa adireshin row tare da siginar strobe na RAS kuma an daidaita adireshin ginshiƙi tare da siginar strobe na CAS. Ko da yake canja wurin asynchronous shine mafita ta gabaɗaya; duk da haka, yana da ƙarancin aikin  da kuma girman . 8. Ganin cewa sau da yawa muna ɗaukar jerin baiti daga ƙwaƙwalwar DRAM, hanyar canja wuri mafi inganci ita ce yanayin shafi mai sauri (FPM). Bayan aika adireshin layi, mai sarrafawa yana aika jerin adiresoshin ginshiƙi don wannan layin. Muna karanta jerin bita da suka dace da adiresoshin ginshiƙi. Kuskuren wannan hanyar shine muna jira mu karɓi bayanan  sannan kawai mu aika adireshin ginshiƙi na gaba. 9. ThenextgenerationofDRAMtechnologywascalledextendeddataout(EDO).Wannan yana shawo kan gazawar fasahar FPM, ta hanyar haɗa watsa bayanai na  da adiresoshin ginshiƙi. Don samar da lokacin siginar Bayanai, ana amfani da ƙarin siginar strobe Bayanai DQS 10. An maye gurbin EDO da fasahar fashewa ta Bayanai (BEDO). A wannan yanayin, don adireshin ginshiƙi ɗaya, muna karanta bita da yawa - a zahiri muna ɗaukar bita na gaba kaɗan. Wannan yana rage buƙatar aika ƙarin adiresoshin ginshiƙai. 11. Duk waɗannan fasahohin an maye gurbinsu da fasahar DRAM mai daidaitawa. Na'urorin DRAM suna da agogo wanda aka daidaita shi da agogon mai sarrafa ƙwaƙwalwa kafin a aika saƙo.

translation.en: MODULE - 5 Biosphere The domain of Life on the Earth (iii) Micro-organisms: These consist of a variety of micro-bacteria, fungi etc. Their numbers are unlimited and are popularly known as decomposers. As the name suggest, these organisms decompose the dead plants and animals and other organic matters. It is through this process they obtain their food. Through this process of decomposition, Notes they differentiate and separate the complex organic matter, so that the same could be put to re-use by the primary producers i.e., the plants. (C) Energy: This is the third and vital component of the biosphere without which life could not have been possible on this planet. It is essential for generation and reproduction of all biological life on this planet. All organisms in the biosphere are like machines which use energy to work and also to convert one form of energy into another. But do you know the source of such energy required for the functioning of the biosphere? Sun is the major source of energy without which we can not think about the existence of the biosphere. INTEXT QUESTION 14.1 1. Give one word for each of the following (a) The narrow zone in which life exists. ____________ (b) The non-living components of the biosphere. _____________ (c) The living component of the biosphere. __________ (d) The organisms which decompose, plant, animal, and organic matters. ________ 2. Fill in the blanks: (a) ___________ is the primary source of energy for the biosphere. (b) ___________ are those who take their food through their mouth. (c) The biotic component of the biosphere mainly consists __________, _______ and __________. (d) Biosphere is a narrow zone where _________, __________ and ________ meet which made life possible. 14.3 ECOLOGY AND ECO SYSTEM Ecology is the study of interactions between the organisms and their environment. Now, the ecologists feel that the two components of nature–organisms and environment, are not only related but both these components function in an orderly manner as a definite system. Infact, the two components, organisms and environment are not distinct. For a particular organisms, other organisms can constitute a part of its environments. Similarly, environment can also be modified and influenced by organisms, thus, organisms and environment are interacting parts of a system. 250 GEOGRAPHY
translation.ha: MASU KAYAYYAKI - 5 BAYANI A KAN BIYU Fannin Rayuwa A Duniya (iii) Ƙananan halittu: Waɗannan sun ƙunshi nau'ikan ƙwayoyin cuta iri-iri, fungi da sauransu. Adadinsu ba shi da iyaka kuma an san su da masu lalata. Kamar yadda sunan ya nuna, waɗannan halittu suna lalata shuke-shuke da dabbobi da sauran abubuwan halitta. Ta wannan hanyar ne suke samun abincinsu. Ta wannan hanyar narkar da abubuwa, Bayanan kula suna bambanta kuma suna raba abubuwa masu rikitarwa na halitta, don haka za a iya sake amfani da su ta hanyar masu samarwa na farko wato shuke-shuke. (C) Makamashi: Wannan shine na uku kuma muhimmin ɓangaren FASAHA> na biosphere wanda ba tare da shi ba rayuwa ba za ta yiwu a wannan duniyar ba. Yana da mahimmanci don samarwa da sake haifuwar dukkan halittu a wannan duniyar. Duk halittu a cikin biosphere suna kama da injuna waɗanda ke amfani da makamashi don aiki da kuma canza wani nau'in makamashi zuwa wani. Amma shin kun san tushen irin wannan kuzarin da ake buƙata don aikin biosphere? Rana ita ce babbar tushen makamashi wanda ba za mu iya tunanin wanzuwar biosphere ba tare da shi ba. TAMBAYAR JARABAWA 14.1 1. Ba da kalma ɗaya ga kowanne daga cikin waɗannan (a) Yankin da ke da kunkuntar yanki inda rayuwa take. ____________ (b) Sassan da ba su da rai na biosphere. _________ (c) Sassan <TECH>mai rai na biosphere. _________ (d) Halittun da ke ruɓewa, tsire-tsire, dabbobi, da abubuwan halitta. _________ 2. Cika guraben da ke ƙasa: (a) ____________ shine babban tushen kuzari ga biosphere. (b) _________ su ne waɗanda ke cin abincinsu ta bakinsu. (c) Sassan mai rai na biosphere galibi ya ƙunshi _________, ________ da _________. (d) Biosphere yanki ne mai kunkuntar wuri inda _________, _________ da _________ suka haɗu wanda ya sa rayuwa ta yiwu. 14.3 ILMIN HALITTA DA ECO TSARIN HALITTA Ilmin Halittu shine nazarin hulɗa tsakanin halittu da muhallinsu. Yanzu, masana kimiyyar muhalli suna jin cewa sassan yanayi guda biyu - halittu da muhalli, ba wai kawai suna da alaƙa ba ne, amma duka waɗannan sassan suna aiki cikin tsari a matsayin tsarin <FASAHA>tabbatacce</FASAHA>. A zahiri, sassan biyu, halittu da muhalli ba su bambanta ba. Ga wani takamaiman halittu, wasu halittu na iya zama wani ɓangare na muhallinsa. Hakazalika, muhalli kuma ana iya gyara shi kuma ya rinjayi halittu, don haka, halittu da muhalli suna hulɗa da sassan tsarin <FASAHA>. 250 GEOGRAPHY

translation.en: Student grading system Furthermore, it is crucial to ensure that the risk assessment process is ongoing and includes regular audits and reviews of the system. This can help identify new risks that may arise and ensure that the mitigation strategies remain effective over time. Additionally, it is important to consider the potential impact of external factors, such as changes in technology, laws, or regulations, on the student grading system. These external factors can introduce new risks or change the level of existing risks, making it important to regularly assess and update the risk assessment process. By involving stakeholders, ensuring ongoing risk assessment and monitoring, and considering external factors, it is possible to develop a student grading system that is secure, reliable, and effective while proactively addressing potential risks. Overall, risk assessment is an essential part of developing a student grading system that is secure, reliable, and effective. By identifying potential risks and developing mitigation strategies, it is possible to minimize the impact of risks and ensure that the system meets the needs of all stakeholders. 1.10. Work Breakdown Work breakdown structure (WBS) is a method used in software development to divide a large and complex project into smaller, manageable and independent tasks. It is a hierarchical decomposition of the work to be executed by the project team to accomplish the project. The WBS includes dividing the project into major activities and sub-activities, and recursively decomposing each node into smaller sub-activities until the activities become undividable and independent. The lowest level tasks are the most simple and independent tasks and take less than two weeks worth of work. The WBS is constructed using a top-down approach, and each node is decomposed into smaller sub-activities until simple and independent activities are created. The WBS is used to provide a clear understanding of how student performance is evaluated and graded, and it helps to organize the work to provide value and work towards producing tangible results. The WBS is input to all critical processes of project management, and it should be applicable to different aspects of a project. The WBS can help project managers communicate information regarding a project, and it can help them manage complicated projects. There are many examples, templates, and software tools available to help create a WBS for a student grading system. The WBS should comply with the regulations and laws of Ethiopia related to education, data privacy, and other relevant areas. The WBS should protect sensitive student data from unauthorized access or breaches, and it should be fair and transparent. 1.10.1. Project plan Activities (Schedule) 1. Requirements gathering and analysis (1 week)  Meet with stakeholders to determine requirements
translation.ha: Tsarin tantancewa ga ɗalibai tsarin Bugu da ƙari, yana da mahimmanci a tabbatar da cewa ana ci gaba da aiwatar da tsarin tantance haɗari kuma ya haɗa da dubawa akai-akai da sake dubawa na tsarin . Wannan zai iya taimakawa wajen gano sabbin haɗarin da <TECH>zasu iya su taso da kuma tabbatar da cewa dabarun rage tasirin su suna ci gaba da tasiri akan lokaci. Bugu da ƙari, yana da mahimmanci a yi la'akari da tasirin abubuwan waje, kamar canje-canje a fasaha, dokoki, ko ƙa'idoji, akan tsarin tantancewa ga ɗalibai tsarin. Waɗannan abubuwan waje na iya gabatar da sabbin haɗari ko canza matakin haɗarin da ke akwai, wanda hakan ke sa ya zama mahimmanci a riƙa tantancewa akai-akai da kuma sabunta tsarin tantance haɗarin. Ta hanyar haɗa masu ruwa da tsaki, tabbatar da ci gaba da tantance haɗari da sa ido, da kuma la'akari da abubuwan waje, yana yiwuwa a haɓaka tsarin tantancewa ga ɗalibai tsarin tantancewa wanda yake da aminci, abin dogaro, kuma mai tasiri yayin da ake magance haɗarin da ke iya tasowa. Gabaɗaya, kimanta haɗari muhimmin ɓangare ne na haɓaka tsarin tantancewa ga ɗalibai <TECH>tsarin tantancewa wanda yake da aminci, abin dogaro, kuma mai tasiri. Ta hanyar gano haɗarin da ka iya tasowa da kuma haɓaka dabarun rage tasirinsu, yana yiwuwa a rage tasirin haɗari da kuma tabbatar da cewa tsarin <TECH> ya cika buƙatun dukkan masu ruwa da tsaki. 1.10. Rushewar Aiki Tsarin rushewar aiki (WBS) hanya ce da ake amfani da ita wajen haɓaka software don raba babban aiki mai rikitarwa zuwa ƙananan ayyuka, masu sarrafawa da masu zaman kansu. Rushewar aiki ce ta tsari na ƙungiyar aikin da za ta gudanar don cimma aikin. WBS ta haɗa da raba aikin zuwa manyan ayyuka da ƙananan ayyuka, da kuma sake rarraba kowane kumburi zuwa ƙananan ayyuka har sai ayyukan sun zama ba za a iya raba su ba kuma masu zaman kansu. Ayyukan matakin ƙasa sune ayyuka mafi sauƙi da masu zaman kansu kuma suna ɗaukar ƙasa da makonni biyu na aiki. An gina WBS ta amfani da hanyar sama-ƙasa, kuma kowace kumburi ana rarraba ta zuwa ƙananan ayyuka har sai an ƙirƙiri ayyuka masu sauƙi da masu zaman kansu. Ana amfani da WBS don samar da fahimtar yadda ake kimanta aikin <TECH>na ɗalibi da kuma kimanta shi, kuma yana taimakawa wajen tsara aikin don samar da ƙima da aiki don samar da sakamako mai ma'ana. WBS yana da hannu a duk muhimman hanyoyin gudanar da ayyuka, kuma ya kamata ya zama mai amfani ga fannoni daban-daban na aikin. WBS na iya taimaka wa manajojin ayyuka su isar da <TECH>bayanai game da wani aiki, kuma yana iya taimaka musu su gudanar da ayyuka masu rikitarwa. Akwai misalai da yawa, samfura, da kayan aikin software da ake da su don taimakawa ƙirƙirar tsarin tantance ɗalibai . WBS <TECH>ya kamata ta bi ƙa'idodi da dokokin Habasha da suka shafi ilimi, bayanai sirrin, da sauran fannoni masu dacewa. WBS ya kamata ta kare bayanan ɗalibai masu hankali  daga shiga ko keta doka ba tare da izini ba, kuma ya kamata ta kasance mai adalci da gaskiya. 1.10.1. Ayyukan Tsarin Aiki (Jadawali) 1. Tattara buƙatu da nazari (mako 1)  Haɗu da masu ruwa da tsaki don tantance buƙatu

translation.en: Smruti R. Sarangi 224 Fog Computation Distance Fog is a 3D rendering technique where pixels that have a greater depth (furtherawayfromtheeye)areshaded(colored)differentlytogiveaperceptionofdistance. Recall that the vertex processor computes the distance information. This information can be used here to color objects farther away slightly differently. 6.2.7 Pixel Engine The job of the Pixel Engine is to take the output of the Fragment Processor and populate the frame buffer. The frame buffer is a simple 2D matrix that holds only the color information for each pixel on the screen. The frame buffer is directly sent to the monitor for display. Topopulatetheframebufferitisnecessarytotakeallthefragments,andcreatea2Dimage–image that is seen on the screen. Depth and color buffering Fragmentshavedifferentdepths(knownastheZ-depth). Whilerendering 3D images, one fragment might block the view of another fragment. It is possible to find out if this is happening by comparing their coordinates and Z-depths. Once this computation is done, we can find the fragments that should be visible and the fragments that should not be visible. We can then look at their colors (computed from the previous stage) and use them to create a 2D image out of the visible fragments. Transparency effects Moderncoloringsystemsarebasedonthreecolors: red,green,andblue(RGB). In addition, they take an additional value called alpha that specifies the degree of transparency. It variesfrom0.0(fullytransparent)to1.0(fullyopaque). Ifatranslucentobject(semi-transparent) is in front of an opaque object, then we should actually be able to see both. This part of the graphics pipeline ensures that this is indeed the case. Once the frame buffer is populated, it is ready to be sent to the display device. 6.2.8 Other Uses of a GPU Tillnow, wehavediscussedthedifferentstructuresinsideatraditionalGPU.Thecruxofthediscussion centered around the concept of breaking complex structures into triangles and then operating on sets of triangles. Thiswasachievedbyconvertingoperationsontrianglestodifferentkindsofmatrixoperations. Notethatmanysuchlinearalgebrabasedoperationsformthebackboneofalotofscientificcodestarting from weather simulation to finding the drag experienced by a wing of an aircraft. The users of such simulation software were traditionally using expensive workstations and large supercomputers. Starting from 2006, the scientific community gradually woke up to the fact that graphics processors arealmostaspowerfulaslargeserversifwesimplycomparethenumberoffloatingpointoperationsthat they can execute per second (FLOPs). For example, in April 2004, high-end desktop processors had a peak throughput of roughly 20 GFLOPs (giga FLOPs), whereas some of NVIDIA’s GPUs had a peak throughput of 50 GFLOPs [Geer, 2005]. By May 2005, the peak GPU throughput had increased to 170 GFLOPs with the CPU performance remaining more or less the same. This is where programmers sensedanopportunity. TheystartedthinkingonhowtocommandeertheresourcesofaGPUtoperform their numerical calculations. Someearlypioneersstartedmappingtheircalculationstoscenesandtextures. Thentheyusedvertex and fragment processing operations to perform operations on their matrices as described by Rumpf et al. [Rumpf and Strzodka, 2006]. This is like using the engine of a car to run a boat. Gradually, GPU designers understood that it is better to make the GPU far more flexible and programmable. This is the most beneficial: it opens up new markets because now a GPU can be used for many other purposes other than rendering scenes. Vendors of GPUs also realized that many of the operationsinvertexandfragmentprocessingareinrealitymassivelyparallelcomputationsmostlybased onlinearalgebra. Toincreasethedegreeofprogrammability,itiswisertomaketheseunitsmoregeneric
translation.ha: Smruti R. Sarangi 224 Hazo Nesa Hazo wata dabara ce ta yin zane ta 3D inda pixels waɗanda ke da zurfin da ya fi girma (daga ido) suka yi inuwa (launi) daban-daban don ba da fahimtar nisa. Ka tuna cewa na'urar sarrafa vertex tana ƙididdige nisa bayani. Ana iya amfani da wannan bayani anan don yin launi ga abubuwa kaɗan daban. 6.2.7 Injin Pixel Aikin Injin Pixel shine ɗaukar fitowar Mai Sarrafa Fragment da cika buffer ɗin firam. Ma'ajiyar firam matrix ce mai sauƙi ta 2D wacce ke ɗauke da bayanin launi kawai ga kowane pixel akan allon. Ana aika ma'ajiyar firam kai tsaye zuwa na'urar saka idanu don nuni. Don cike gibin firam dole ne a ɗauki dukkan gibin, kuma a ƙirƙiri 2Dimage - hoton da ake gani akan allon. Zurfin da ma'ajiyar launi Fragments suna da zurfin daban-daban (wanda aka sani da zurfin Z). Yayin da ake yin hotunan 3D, wani guntu na iya toshe ganin wani guntu. Yana yiwuwa a gano ko wannan yana faruwa ta hanyar kwatanta daidaitawarsu da zurfin Z. Da zarar an gama wannan lissafin, za mu iya nemo guntun da ya kamata ya kasance a bayyane kuma guntun da ya kamata ya kasance a bayyane ba za a iya gani ba. Sannan za mu iya duba launukansu (an lissafta su daga matakin da ya gabata) mu yi amfani da su don ƙirƙirar hoto na 2D daga guntun da ake iya gani. Tasirin bayyananniya Tsarin canza launi na zamani ya dogara ne akan launuka uku: ja, kore, da shuɗi (RGB). Bugu da ƙari, suna ɗaukar ƙarin ƙima da ake kira alpha wanda ke ƙayyade matakin bayyananniya. Ya bambanta daga 0.0 (fullly transparent) zuwa 1.0 (fulllyopaque). Ifatranslucentobject (semi-transparent) yana gaban wani abu mara haske, to ya kamata mu  mu iya ganin duka biyun. Wannan ɓangaren bututun zane yana tabbatar da cewa wannan hakika haka yake. Da zarar an cika ma'aunin firam ɗin, a shirye yake a aika shi zuwa na'urar nuni. 6.2.8 Sauran Amfani da GPU Tillnow, mun tattauna tsare-tsare daban-daban a cikin GPU na gargajiya. Tsarin tattaunawar ya mayar da hankali ne kan ra'ayin raba tsare-tsare masu rikitarwa zuwa alwatika sannan a yi aiki akan saitin alwatika. Wannan ya faru ne ta hanyar canza aiki tsakanin alwatika zuwa nau'ikan ayyuka daban-daban. Lura cewa yawancin ayyuka masu layi suna samar da kashin baya na lambar kimiyya tun daga kwaikwayon yanayi zuwa gano jan da reshe na jirgin sama ke fuskanta. Masu amfani da irin wannan software na kwaikwayo suna amfani da wuraren aiki masu tsada da manyan kwamfutoci a al'ada. Tun daga 2006, al'ummar kimiyya ta farka a hankali game da gaskiyar cewa masu sarrafa zane-zane kusan suna da ƙarfi kamar manyan sabobin kuma kawai suna kwatanta adadin ayyukan da za su iya aiwatarwa a kowane daƙiƙa (FLOPs). Misali, a watan Afrilun 2004, masu sarrafa tebur masu inganci suna da mafi girman ƙarfin aiki na kusan GFLOPs 20 (giga FLOPs), yayin da wasu GPUs na NVIDIA suna da mafi girman ƙarfin aiki na GFLOPs 50 [Geer, 2005]. Daga Mayu 2005, mafi girman ƙarfin aiki na GPU ya karu zuwa GFLOPs 170 tare da aikin CPU <TECH>wanda ya kasance iri ɗaya ko ƙasa da haka. Nan ne masu shirye-shirye ke jin dama. Sun fara tunani kan yadda ake umarni a nan tushen sofaGPU suna aiwatar da lissafin lambobi. Wasu majagaba na farko sun fara zana taswirar lissafinsu zuwa yanayin da rubutu. Sannan sun yi amfani da ayyukan sarrafa vertex da fragmentation don yin ayyuka akan matrices ɗinsu kamar yadda Rumpf et al. [Rumpf da Strzodka, 2006] suka bayyana. Wannan kamar amfani da injin mota ne don gudanar da jirgin ruwa. A hankali, masu tsara GPU sun fahimci cewa ya fi kyau a sanya GPU ya fi sassauƙa da kuma shirye-shirye. Wannan shine mafi fa'ida: yana buɗe sabbin kasuwanni saboda yanzu ana iya amfani da GPU don wasu dalilai da yawa banda yanayin zane. Masu siyar da GPU sun kuma fahimci cewa yawancin ayyukan da ke cikin yanayin aiki da rarrabawa suna cikin ainihin lissafi mai yawa waɗanda galibi suna da alaƙa da juna akan layi. Don ƙara matakin shirye-shirye, yana da kyau a sanya waɗannan na'urori su zama na gama gari.

translation.en: Population Composition in India MODULE - 9 Human Resource (b) According to 2001 census, the share of the scheduled casts population development in India is approximately __________% to the total population of the country (16.15, 8,7). (c) Scheduled castes population constitute the most significant proportion of the total population in the state of ____________________. (Uttar Pradesh, Bihar, Punjab) (d) According to the census of India 2001, the average literacy rate of Notes India is ___________ percent. (65.38,64.44, 68.01) 2. Name any two programmes taken by Government of India to increase literacy rate. (i)________________________ (ii)________________________ 3. Which state having highest literacy among both males and females? ______________________________________________________ WHAT YOU HAVE LEARNT The development of a country depends upon both quality and quantity of the human resources. The quality of human resource depends upon the population composition. They are rural - urban, sex - age, linguistic, religious, scheduled Castes, Scheduled Tribe, literate-non literate composition. India is proverbially known as the country of villages. Till today more than 72 percent of people live in rural areas. The rate of urbanisation is however increasing. The growth rate of urban population is higher than the average growth rate in the country. This is mainly due to migration of people from rural to urban areas. There are 35 metropolitan cities in India having population more than 10,00,000. On the other hand, sex ratio in India is unfavourable. The highest number of females per one thousand males in Karala (1058) whereas it is lowest in Haryana (861). If we take Union Territory into account then the lowest sex ratio in the country is in Daman and Diu (709). The sex ratio has been gradually decreasing in each successive censuses except some marginal increase in the 1951, 1981 and 2001 census. You will know about the status of sex ratio in your area by conducting the project work. The rate of literacy in India is not very high (65.38%). It is the highest in Kerala where the literacy rate is as high as 90.92% and on the other extreme is the state of Bihar where literacy is as low as 47.53% percent. India is a land of great social diversity. It is the home of people belonging to different racial stocks, languages and religions. The tribal people are the nearest relations of some of the original racial stocks. The Schedule Castes are inter- mixture of various racial stocks. According to 2001 census, Scheduled Castes and Scheduled Tribes constitute 16.00% and 8.20% respectively of the total population. The concentration of these population are found in the plain areas due to their profession. Whereas Scheduled Tribes generally live in isolated GEOGRAPHY 281
translation.ha: Tsarin Yawan Jama'a a Indiya - 9 Albarkatun Dan Adam (b) A bisa kididdigar 2001, kason ci gaban yawan jama'a da aka tsara a Indiya ya kai kusan _________% ga jimlar yawan jama'ar ƙasar (16.15, 8,7). (c) Yawan jama'ar da aka tsara sune mafi girman kaso na jimlar yawan jama'a a jihar ____________________. (Uttar Pradesh, Bihar, Punjab) (d) A bisa kididdigar Indiya ta 2001, matsakaicin yawan jama'a da aka tsara a Indiya shine kashi _________. (65.38,64.44, 68.01) 2. Faɗi duk wani shiri guda biyu da Gwamnatin Indiya ta ɗauka don ƙara yawan jama'a da karatu. (i)________________________ (ii)________________________ 3. Wace jiha ce ke da mafi yawan jama'a da karatu a tsakanin maza da mata? ____________________________________________ ABIN DA KA KOYA Ci gaban ƙasa ya dogara ne akan inganci da adadin albarkatun ɗan adam. Ingancin albarkatun ɗan adam ya dogara ne akan yawan jama'a. Suna zaune ne a karkara - birni, jinsi - shekaru, harshe, addini, ƙabilu masu tsari, ƙabila mai tsari, ƙabila mai tsari, da kuma waɗanda ba su iya karatu da rubutu ba. Ana kiran Indiya da ƙasar ƙauyuka. Har zuwa yau, sama da kashi 72 cikin 100 na mutane suna zaune ne a yankunan karkara. Duk da haka, yawan birane yana ƙaruwa. Yawan karuwar yawan jama'a a birane ya fi matsakaicin yawan ci gaba a ƙasar. Wannan ya faru ne saboda ƙaura daga yankunan karkara zuwa birane. Akwai birane 35 na manyan birane a Indiya waɗanda ke da yawan jama'a sama da miliyan 10,000. A gefe guda kuma, yawan jinsi a Indiya ba shi da kyau. Mafi yawan mata ga maza dubu ɗaya a Karala (1058) yayin da mafi ƙanƙanta a Haryana (861). Idan muka yi la'akari da Yankin Tarayyar Turai, to mafi ƙarancin rabon jinsi a ƙasar yana cikin Daman da Diu (709). Yawan jinsi yana raguwa a hankali a kowace ƙidayar jama'a a jere, sai dai wani ƙaruwa kaɗan a ƙidayar jama'a ta 1951, 1981 da 2001. Za ku san matsayin rabon jinsi a yankinku ta hanyar gudanar da aikin. Yawan masu karatu da rubutu a Indiya ba shi da yawa (65.38%). Ita ce mafi girma a Kerala inda yawan masu karatu da rubutu ya kai kashi 90.92%, a wani ɓangaren kuma jihar Bihar ce inda karatu da rubutu ya kai kashi 47.53%%. Indiya ƙasa ce mai bambancin zamantakewa. Ita ce gidan mutanen da suka fito daga kabilu daban-daban, harsuna da addinai. Mutanen ƙabilu su ne mafi kusanci da wasu daga cikin kabilun asali. Jadawalin Jadawalin yana haɗuwa da nau'ikan kabilu daban-daban. A cewar ƙidayar jama'a ta 2001, Jadawalin Jadawalin da Kabilun Jadawalin sun ƙunshi kashi 16.00% da 8.20% na jimlar yawan jama'a. Yawan waɗannan al'umma yana samuwa ne a yankunan da ba su da yawa saboda sana'arsu. Yayin da Kabilun Jadawalin gabaɗaya suna zaune a cikin JIGRAPHY mai keɓewa 281

translation.en: Software Requirements Specification for Pharmaceutical System Page 12 2.6 User Documentation Alongside the software being delivered, there will be multiple resources available for the various different parties that will interact in some way with this software. For the pharmacy management and technicians, release notes will be released following each update for the purpose of keeping clients updated on changes occurring in the software. Additionally, an installation manual will be included in order to guide pharmacist staff/technicians with installing the software on both existing systems as well as new ones. For the pharmacists and other pharmacy staff, there will be a user manual available to use. This manual will be an extensive guide on how to effectively use the software to complete their various required tasks (ex. inventory management). Furthermore, video tutorials will be available to provide better clarification on certain aspects/actions of the software. And in the event that the pharmacists, pharmacy technicians, or management require further assistance, a help hotline will be available to help users with issues/questions in real time. For patients, various written and video tutorials as well as a FAQ section will be included. Within these tutorials there will be step-by-step guides on how to use the software to access their records, view prescriptions, etc. 2.7 Assumptions and Dependencies In terms of assumptions, this system assumes that the following remain true, or at least mostly true. In the event that one of these assumptions is false, it could affect the requirements stated in this SRS. 1. Federal medical-related regulations do not change dramatically during the software’s development process. 2. All users have basic computer literacy skills and have used computer user interfaces before. 3. All users have a stable Internet connection in order to communicate with cloud-based services as well as other related applications. 4. Information received from third-parties (other pharmacies, hospitals, the CDC, etc) is correct and up-to-date. In terms of dependencies, the system depends on the following for healthy and proper operations: 1. Dependence on an external database that holds drug-related information (ex. First Databank). 2. Access to information held in software that the pharmacy previously used, if applicable. 3. Access to a patient’s electronic health record (EHR). 4. Access to up-to-date information regarding drug approvals and recalls from licensed federal authorities (ex. FDA Orange Book).
translation.ha: Bayanin Bukatun Software ga Magungunaceutical Tsarin Shafi na 12 2.6 Mai amfaniTakardu Baya ga manhajar da ake bayarwa, za a sami albarkatu da yawa ga ɓangarori daban-daban waɗanda za su yi mu'amala ta wata hanya da wannan manhajar. Ga masu kula da kantin magani da masu fasaha, za a fitar da bayanan sanarwa bayan kowace sabuntawa ta  don ci gaba da sanar da abokan ciniki game da canje-canjen da ke faruwa a cikin manhajar. Bugu da ƙari, za a haɗa da littafin shigarwa don jagorantar ma'aikatan magunguna/masu fasaha game da shigar da manhajar a kan tsarin da ke akwai da kuma sababbi. Ga masu sayar da magunguna da sauran ma'aikatan kantin magani, za a sami littafin mai amfani da za a iya amfani da shi. Wannan littafin zai zama jagora mai zurfi kan yadda za a yi amfani da manhajar yadda ya kamata don kammala ayyukan da ake buƙata daban-daban (misali sarrafa kaya). Bugu da ƙari, za a sami koyaswar bidiyo don samar da ƙarin bayani kan wasu fannoni/ayyukan manhajar. Kuma idan masana magunguna, masu fasaha a fannin magunguna, ko kuma manajoji suna buƙatar ƙarin taimako, za a sami layin taimako don taimaka wa masu amfani da matsaloli/tambayoyi a ainihin lokaci. Ga marasa lafiya, za a haɗa da darussan rubutu da bidiyo daban-daban da kuma ɓangaren Tambayoyi da Amsoshi. A cikin waɗannan koyaswar za a sami jagororin mataki-mataki kan yadda ake amfani da software don samun damar bayanan su, duba magunguna, da sauransu. 2.7 Zato da Dogaro Dangane da zato, wannan tsarin  yana ɗauka cewa waɗannan sun kasance gaskiya, ko aƙalla galibi gaskiya ne. Idan ɗaya daga cikin waɗannan zato ƙarya ne, zai iya shafar buƙatun da aka bayyana a cikin wannan SRS. 1. Dokokin da suka shafi likitanci na tarayya ba sa canzawa sosai a lokacin haɓaka software ɗin. 2. Duk masu amfani suna da ƙwarewar karatu da rubutu a kwamfuta kuma sun yi amfani da hanyoyin sadarwa na kwamfuta mai amfani a da. 3. Duk masu amfani suna da haɗin Intanet mai ƙarfi don sadarwa tare da ayyukan da ke tushen girgije da sauran aikace-aikacen da suka shafi. 4. Bayanan da aka samu daga wasu kamfanoni (wasu shagunan magani, asibitoci, CDC, da sauransu) daidai ne kuma an sabunta su. Dangane da dogaro, tsarin <TECH> ya dogara ne akan waɗannan don aiki mai kyau da lafiya: 1. Dogaro da rumbun adana bayanai na waje na  wanda ke ɗauke da bayanan <TECH> da suka shafi magani (misali. First Databank). 2. Samun damar bayanan da ke cikin software da kantin magani ya yi amfani da su a baya, idan ya dace. 3. Samun damar yin amfani da bayanan lafiyar majiyyaci na lantarki na  (EHR). 4. Samun damar yin amfani da bayanan <TECH> na zamani game da amincewa da magunguna da kuma dawo da su daga hukumomin tarayya masu lasisi (misali. FDA Orange Book).

translation.en: 423 Smruti R. Sarangi will be (1−f )P. This means that the only role that f plays is in determining the slope of the seq seq curve for large P. If f = 0, then the speedup is P times, which is expected when we do not have a seq sequential portion. For all other values of f where we are scaling the parallel part of the problem by a factor of P, seq the slope of the line is given by (1−f ). Even if we are scaling the problem, we need to still limit seq the size of the sequential section because the absolute difference in execution times for different values of f will be significant for large values of P. seq 9.1.5 Design Space of Multiprocessors Michael J. Flynn proposed the famous Flynn’s classification of multiprocessors in 1966. He started out by observing that an ensemble of different processors might either share code, data, or both. There are four possible choices – SISD (single instruction single data), SIMD (single instruction multiple data), MISD (multiple instruction single data), and MIMD (multiple instruction multiple data). Let us describe each of these types of multiprocessors in some more detail. SISD ThisisastandarduniprocessorwithasinglepipelineasdescribedinChapter2. ASISDprocessor can be thought of as a special case in the universe of multiprocessors. SIMD ASIMDprocessorcanprocessmultiplestreamsofdatausingasingleinstruction. Forexample, a SIMD instruction can add 4 sets of numbers with a single instruction. Modern processors incorporateSIMDinstructionsintheirinstructionsetandhavespecialSIMDexecutionunitsalso. Examplesincludex86processorsthatsupporttheSSEandAVXinstructionsets. Vectorprocessors and, to a lesser extent, GPUs are examples of highly successful SIMD processors. MISD MISD systems are very rare in practice. They are mostly used in systems that have very high reliability requirements. For example, large commercial aircraft typically have multiple processors runningdifferentversionsofthesameprogram/algorithm. Thefinaloutcomeisdecidedbyvoting. For example, a plane might have a MIPS processor, an ARM processor, and an x86 processor, each running different versions of the same program such as an autopilot system. Here, we have multiple instruction streams, yet a single source of data. A dedicated voting circuit computes a majorityvoteofthethreeoutputs. Forexample,itispossiblethatbecauseofabugintheprogram or the processor, one of the systems can erroneously take a decision to turn left. However, both of the other systems might take the correct decision to turn right. In this case, the voting circuit will decide to turn right. Since MISD systems are hardly ever used in practice, other than in such specialized situations, we shall not discuss them anymore in this book. MIMD MIMD systems are by far the most prevalent multiprocessor systems today. Here, there are multiple instruction streams and multiple data streams. Multicore processors, and large servers are all MIMD systems. Examples 9 and 10 also showed the example of a program for a MIMD machine. We need to carefully explain the meaning of multiple instruction streams. This means that instructions come from multiple sources. Each source has its unique location and associated program counter. Two important branches of MIMD paradigms have formed over the last few years. The first is SPMD (single program multiple data) and the second is MPMD (multiple program multipledata). MostparallelprogramsarewrittenintheSPMDstyle(Examples9and10). Here, multiple copies of the same program run on different cores or separate processors. However, each individualprocessingunithasaseparateprogramcounterandthusperceivesadifferentinstruction stream. Sometimes SPMD programs are written in such a way that they perform different actions depending on their thread ids. We saw a method in Example 9 on how to achieve this using OpenMP functions. The advantage of SPMD is that we do not have to write multiple programs
translation.ha: 423 Smruti R. Sarangi zai kasance (1−f )P. Wannan yana nufin cewa rawar da f ke takawa kawai ita ce tantance gangaren lanƙwasa na seq seq ga babban P. Idan f = 0, to saurin shine sau P, wanda ake sa ran lokacin da ba mu da sashin jerin jerin. Ga duk sauran ƙimar f inda muke auna ɓangaren layi ɗaya na matsalar ta hanyar factor na P, an ba da jerin gangaren layin ta hanyar (1−f). Ko da muna auna matsalar, muna buƙatar iyakance girman jerin jerin saboda cikakken bambanci a lokutan aiwatarwa don ƙimar f daban-daban zai zama mahimmanci ga manyan ƙimar P. seq 9.1.5 Tsarin Sararin Multipro Michael J. Flynn ya gabatar da sanannen rarrabuwar Flynn na masu sarrafawa da yawa a cikin 1966. Ya fara da lura cewa tarin masu sarrafawa daban-daban na iya raba lambar, Bayanai, ko duka biyun. Akwai zaɓuɓɓuka huɗu masu yiwuwa - SISD (bayanai ɗaya na umarni ɗaya Bayanai), SIMD (bayanai ɗaya na umarni ɗaya Bayanai), MISD (bayanai ɗaya na umarni ɗaya Bayanai), da MIMD (bayanai da yawa na umarni da yawa Bayanai). Bari mu bayyana kowanne daga cikin waɗannan nau'ikan masu sarrafawa da yawa dalla-dalla. SISD Wannan ya zama misali mai sarrafawa ɗaya tare da layin bututu ɗaya kamar yadda aka bayyana a Babi na 2. Ana iya ɗaukar mai sarrafawa ASISD a matsayin wani lamari na musamman a cikin sararin masu sarrafawa da yawa. Mai sarrafawa SIMD ASIMD zai iya aiwatar da kwararar bayanai da yawa ta amfani da umarni ɗaya. Misali, umarnin SIMD zai iya ƙara saiti 4 na lambobi tare da umarni ɗaya. Masu sarrafawa na zamani sun haɗa da Umarnin SIM a cikin umarnin su kuma suna da na'urorin aiwatarwa na musamman na SIM. Misalan sun haɗa da masu sarrafawa x86 waɗanda ke tallafawa saitin umarni na SSE da AVX. Masu sarrafawa na vector kuma, zuwa ƙaramin mataki, GPUs misalai ne na masu sarrafawa na SIMD masu nasara sosai. Tsarin MISD MISD ba kasafai ake amfani da su ba a aikace. Galibi ana amfani da su a tsarin da ke da babban buƙatun aminci. Misali, manyan jiragen sama na kasuwanci galibi suna da na'urori masu sarrafawa da yawa waɗanda ke gudanar da sigar daban-daban, tsarin aiki/algorithm iri ɗaya. Sakamakon ƙarshe shine yanke shawara ta hanyar jefa ƙuri'a. Misali, jirgin sama na iya samun na'urar sarrafawa ta MIPS, na'urar sarrafawa ta ARM, da na'urar sarrafawa ta x86, kowannensu yana gudanar da nau'ikan daban-daban na shirin iri ɗaya kamar tsarin atomatik <TECH>. A nan, muna da kwararar umarni da yawa, amma tushen bayanai guda ɗaya na <TECH>. Da'irar zaɓe ta musamman tana ƙididdige mafi yawan kuri'u daga cikin fitarwa uku. Misali, yana yiwuwa saboda tsarin aiki ko na'urar sarrafawa, ɗayan tsarin zai iya yanke shawara ta hanyar kuskure don juya hagu. Duk da haka, duka sauran tsarin biyu na iya ɗaukar shawarar da ta dace don juya dama. A wannan yanayin, da'irar zaɓe za ta yanke shawarar juya dama. Tunda ba a taɓa amfani da tsarin MISD a aikace ba, banda irin waɗannan yanayi na musamman, ba za mu sake tattauna su a cikin wannan littafin ba. Tsarin MIMD MIMD sune tsarin sarrafawa da yawa da suka fi yawa a yau. A nan, akwai kwararar umarni da yawa da kwararar bayanai na <TECH> da yawa. Masu sarrafawa da yawa, da manyan sabar duk tsarin MIMD ne. Misalan 9 da 10 suma sun nuna misalin shiri na na'urar MIMD. Muna buƙatar yin bayani a hankali game da ma'anar kwararar umarni da yawa. Wannan yana nufin cewa umarni sun fito ne daga tushe da yawa. Kowane tushe yana da wurinsa na musamman da kuma teburin shirye-shirye masu alaƙa. Manyan rassan MIMD guda biyu sun samo asali a cikin 'yan shekarun nan. Na farko shine SPMD (bayanai na shirye-shirye guda ɗaya da yawa <TECH>) kuma na biyu shine MPMD (bayanai na shirye-shirye da yawa). Yawancin shirye-shirye masu kama da juna ana rubuta su a cikin salon SPMD (Misalai 9 da 10). A nan, kwafi da yawa na shirin iri ɗaya suna gudana akan tsakiya daban-daban ko masu sarrafawa daban-daban. Duk da haka, kowane sarrafawa na mutum ɗaya yana aiki akan shirin parate kuma yana fahimta daban-daban kwararar umarni. Wani lokaci ana rubuta shirye-shiryen SPMD ta yadda suke yin ayyuka daban-daban dangane da ID ɗin zaren su. Mun ga wata hanya a Misali na 9 kan yadda za a cimma wannan ta amfani da ayyukan OpenMP. Fa'idar SPMD ita ce ba sai mun rubuta shirye-shirye da yawa ba.

translation.en: - Sting: A projectile that resembles a sting-ray and can be manually controlled by the pilot or locked on to a target by the pilot. 5. Relevant Facts & Assumptions, as applicable. For example, note here any assumptions about hardware, communications, etc. for the Sub-6 here. Make sure that your Assumptions are accurate and up-to-date. (The one exception is that we know much more now about shark species’ behaviors and about endangered whale species, so for the purposes of this project you can choose to go with Clarke’s 1950’s era assumptions in that regard (i.e., not correct any inaccuracies regarding those species). - The Sub-6 will be deployed and retrieved by a crane or some similar device. - The Sub-6 communicates via a radio so it can communicate with anyone on the same frequency that is within its range. - The Sub-6 does not have to tow the predators that it kills. - The Sub-6 and its subsystems should be able to withstand any water temperature and be able to hit the max depth dive of 20 fathoms. - There is a specific person who is trained and employed to maintain the Sub-6 and its subsystems and devices. - We are assuming that we are building the Sub-6 software for an electronic control panel, instead of the physical control panel in the Sub-5. - We are assuming that the sonar and camera systems are the only way that the pilot of the Sub-6 can track objects and navigate (no windows). III. Functional Requirements 6. Scope of the Work (5 pts.) (6b only) Context of the Work: Insert your Context Diagram, corrected and updated as needed to be accurate for the future Sub-6. (Your original Sub-5 Context Diagram was in HW1). Avoid abbreviations and make sure your input/output arrows are clearly labeled such that they will be readily understood by the developers.
translation.ha: - Harbi: Harbi mai kama da sting-ray kuma matukin jirgin zai iya sarrafa shi da hannu ko kuma matukin jirgin ya kulle shi a kan abin da zai kai shi hari. 5. Bayanan da suka dace & Zato, kamar yadda ya dace. Misali, a nan a lura da duk wani zato game da kayan aiki, sadarwa, da sauransu na Sub-6 a nan. Tabbatar cewa Zato naka daidai ne kuma na zamani. (Bangaren da ya bambanta shi ne yanzu mun san abubuwa da yawa game da halayen nau'in shark da kuma game da nau'in kifin whale da ke fuskantar barazanar ɓacewa, don haka don manufar wannan aikin za ku iya zaɓar yin amfani da zato na zamanin Clarke na 1950 game da wannan (watau, ba gyara duk wani rashin daidaito game da waɗannan nau'ikan ba). - Za a tura Sub-6 kuma a dawo da shi ta hanyar crane ko wani na'ura makamancin haka. - Sub-6 yana sadarwa ta rediyo don ya iya sadarwa da kowa a kan mita ɗaya da ke cikin iyakarsa. - Sub-6 ba dole ba ne ya jawo masu farautar da yake kashewa. - Sub-6 da ƙananan tsarinsa ya kamata su iya jure wa kowane zafin ruwa kuma su iya kaiwa zurfin zurfin fathoms 20. - Akwai takamaiman mutum wanda aka horar kuma aka yi masa aiki don kula da Sub-6 da ƙananan tsarinsa da na'urorinsa. - Muna ɗauka cewa muna gina software na Sub-6 don kwamitin sarrafawa na lantarki, maimakon kwamitin sarrafawa na zahiri a cikin Sub-5. - Muna ɗauka cewa Tsarin sonar da kyamara sune kawai hanyar da matukin Sub-6 zai iya bin diddigin abubuwa da kuma kewaya (babu tagogi). III. Bukatun Aiki 6. Faɗin Aikin (maki 5) (6b kawai) Yanayin Aikin: Saka Tsarin Yanayi, an gyara shi kuma an sabunta shi kamar yadda ake buƙata don ya zama daidai ga Sub-6 na gaba. (Asalin Tsarin Yanayi na Sub-5 ɗinku yana cikin HW1). Guji taƙaitattun kalmomi kuma tabbatar da cewa kiban shigarwa/fitarwa ɗinku an yi musu alama a sarari ta yadda masu haɓakawa za su fahimci su cikin sauƙi.

translation.en: Requirements on Crypto Stack AUTOSAR CP Release 4.4.0 4 Functional Overview The Crypto Stack offers a standardized access to cryptographic services for applications and system functions. The cryptographic services are, e.g., the computation of hashes, the verification of asymmetrical signatures, or the symmetrical encryption of data. These services depend on underlying cryptographic primitives and cryptographic schemes. The CSM shall make it possible for different applications to use the same service but using different underlying primitives and/or schemes. E.g., one application might need to use the hash service to compute an SHA2 digest and another might need to compute an SHA1 digest. Or one application might need to verify a signature which has been computed with the RSASSA- PKCS1-V1_5 signature scheme and using SHA1 as an underlying hash primitive, while another application might need to verify a signature computed with a different scheme which uses SHA2 as an underlying hash primitive. The Crypto Stack shall make it possible to configure which services are needed and to create several configurations for each service where schemes and primitives can be chosen. Furthermore, since the computation of many of the cryptographic services is very computation intensive, provisions have to be made for scheduling these long computations. The jobs shall be configurable to be executed synchronously or asynchronously. The Crypto Stack provides services with cryptography functionality, based on software libraries or on hardware modules. Also, mixed setups are possible, for example if a hardware module cannot supply the necessary functionality on its own. In the following, we refer to all instantiations of underlying functionality, be it hardware or software, as "crypto library". 4.1 Supported Algorithms The following cryptographic algorithms or primitives should be supported by the Crypto Stack:  Random Number Generation o Deterministic Random Number Generator (DRNG) o True Random Number Generator (TRNG)  Symmetric Encryption o AES  Key Length: 128 and 256 bits  Modes: ECB, CBC, CTR, GCM, OFB, CFB, XTS o PRESENT  Key Length: 128 bits  Modes: ECB, CBC, CTR, GCM, OFB, CFB, XTS o ChaCha12/ChaCha20  Key Length: 256 bits  Asymmetric Encryption/Decryption and Signature Handling o RSA  Key Length: 1024, 2048, 3072, 4096  Padding: PKCS#1 v2.2 o Curve25519/Ed25519  Hash o SHA-2  Length: 224, 256, 384, 512 8 of 36 Document ID 426: AUTOSAR_SRS_CryptoStack - AUTOSAR -
translation.ha: Bukatu akan Crypto Stack AUTOSAR CP Release 4.4.0 4 Bayani Mai Aiki Crypto Stack yana ba da damar yin amfani da ayyukan cryptographic don aikace-aikace da ayyukan tsarin . Ayyukan cryptographic sune, misali, lissafin hashes, tabbatar da sa hannu marasa daidaituwa, ko ɓoye bayanai masu daidaitawa na <TECH>data. Waɗannan ayyukan sun dogara ne akan tushen asali na cryptographic da tsare-tsaren cryptographic. CSM zai ya ba da damar aikace-aikace daban-daban su yi amfani da sabis iri ɗaya amma suna amfani da asali da/ko tsare-tsare daban-daban. Misali, aikace-aikacen  ɗaya na iya buƙatar amfani da sabis na hash don ƙididdige lissafin SHA2 kuma wani na iya buƙatar ƙididdige lissafin SHA1. Ko kuma wani aikace-aikacen <TECH> zai iya buƙatar tabbatar da sa hannu wanda aka ƙididdige shi da tsarin sa hannu na <TECH>RSASSA- PKCS1-V1_5 kuma yana amfani da SHA1 azaman tushen hash primitive, yayin da wani aikace-aikacen  zai iya buƙatar tabbatar da sa hannu da aka ƙididdige shi da wani tsari daban wanda ke amfani da SHA2 azaman tushen hash primitive. Crypto Stack  zai zai ba da damar saita waɗanne ayyuka ake buƙata da kuma ƙirƙirar </TECH> tsare-tsare da yawa don kowane sabis inda za a iya zaɓar tsare-tsare da farko. Bugu da ƙari, tunda lissafin yawancin ayyukan ɓoye sirri yana da matuƙar mahimmanci na lissafi, dole ne a yi tanadi don tsara waɗannan ƙididdiga masu tsawo. Ayyukan <TECH>za a iya daidaita su don a aiwatar su tare ko a lokaci guda. Crypto Stack yana ba da ayyuka tare da aikin ɓoye sirri, bisa ga ɗakunan karatu na software ko akan kayan aikin hardware. Hakanan, saitunan gauraye suna yiwuwa, misali idan kayan aikin hardware ba zai iya samar da aikin da ake buƙata da kansa ba. A cikin waɗannan, muna kiran duk wani abu da ke nuna ayyukan da ke ƙarƙashinsu, ko hardware ne ko software, a matsayin "ɗakin karatu na crypto". 4.1 Algorithms Masu Tallafawa Ya kamata a tallafa wa waɗannan algorithms na sirri ko na asali <TECH> ta hanyar Crypto Stack:  Samar da Lambobin Bazuwar o Mai Samar da Lambobin Bazuwar Deterministic (DRNG) o Mai Samar da Lambobin Bazuwar Gaskiya (TRNG)  Sirri Sirri o AES  Tsawon Maɓalli: 128 da 256  Yanayi: ECB, CBC, CTR, GCM, OFB, CFB, XTS o GABATARWA  Tsawon Maɓalli: 128 bit  Yanayi: ECB, CBC, CTR, GCM, OFB, CFB, XTS o ChaCha12/ChaCha20  Tsawon Maɓalli: 256 bit  Sirri/Siffantawa mara daidaituwa da Gudanar da Sa hannu o RSA  Tsawon Maɓalli: 1024, 2048, 3072, 4096  Padding: PKCS#1 v2.2 o Lanƙwasa25519/Ed25519  Hash o SHA-2  Tsawon: 224, 256, 384, 512 8 na 36 ID na Takarda 426: AUTOSAR_SRS_CryptoStack - AUTOSAR -

translation.en: MODULE - 2 The Work of Moving Ice, Wind and Sea Waves Changing face of the Earth The most important agent shaping coastal landform is wave action. The important works of waves are the breaking up of the rocks, removal of broken material and laying down of this material in different parts of the coastal areas. These three actions of waves are called erosion, transportation and deposition. Erosion by waves is achieved through the processes of abrasion, attrition, hydraulic action and solution. Erosion by sea waves results in formation of topographical features Notes like sea cliff, sea caves, arches and stacks. Transportation work of waves makes possible seaward movements of the material accumulated on the coast and coastward movement of the material found in the sea. Depositional work of sea waves is responsible for formation of topographical features like bars, spit, beaches and lagoons. TERMINAL QUESTIONS 1. Answer the following questions in brief: (i) What is snowline? (iii) What is a hanging valley? How is it formed? 2. Distinguish between the following: (a) Continental glacier and valley glacier. (b ) V-shaped valley and U-shaped valley. 3. Name the major relief features formed by glacial erosion and deposition and explain the process of formation of each with the help of diagrams. 4. In which region is the work of wind more effective? Why is it so? 5. Explain the three processes which help in the wind erosion. 6. How is a mushroom rock formed? Explain with the help of a diagram. 7. Where is the greatest deposits of loess found? 8. Which topographical features are formed through erosional action of sea waves? Explain the mode of formation of each. 10. How is a beach formed? Name two important beaches of India. 11. Differentiate between: (i) Erosional and depositional work of wind. (ii) Solution action and hydraulic action of sea-waves. (iii) Lagoon and beach. GEOGRAPHY 117
translation.ha: MASU ƊAUKA - 2 Aikin Motsa Kankara, Iska da Raƙuman Ruwa Canza Fuskar Duniya Babban abin da ke tsara yanayin ƙasa a bakin teku shine aikin raƙuman ruwa. Muhimman ayyukan raƙuman ruwa sune wargajewar duwatsu, cire kayan da suka karye da kuma shimfida wannan abu a sassa daban-daban na yankunan bakin teku. Waɗannan ayyuka guda uku na raƙuman ruwa ana kiransu zaizayar ƙasa, sufuri da kuma ajiyewa. Zaizayar ƙasa ta raƙuman ruwa ana samun su ta hanyar hanyoyin gogewa, cirewa, aikin ruwa da kuma mafita. Zaizayar ƙasa ta raƙuman ruwa yana haifar da samuwar siffofin ƙasa Bayanan kula kamar dutsen teku, kogo, baka da tarin abubuwa. Aikin jigilar raƙuman ruwa yana sa motsi a bakin teku na kayan da aka tara a bakin teku da kuma motsi a bakin teku na kayan da ake samu a cikin teku. Aikin adana raƙuman ruwa yana da alhakin ƙirƙirar siffofin ƙasa kamar sanduna, tofa, rairayin bakin teku da tafkuna. TAMBAYOYIN MAGANI 1. Amsa tambayoyin nan a taƙaice: (i) Menene layin dusar ƙanƙara? (iii) Menene kwarin rataye? Ta yaya ake samar da shi? 2. Bambanta tsakanin waɗannan: (a) Glacier na Nahiyar da Glacier na kwari. (b) Kwari mai siffar V da kwarin mai siffar U. 3. Faɗi manyan abubuwan taimako da aka samar ta hanyar zaizayar ƙasa da zubar da ruwa a kan dusar ƙanƙara da kuma zubar da ruwa a kan dusar ƙanƙara, sannan ka bayyana tsarin samuwar kowannensu da taimakon zane-zane. 4. A wane yanki ne aikin iska ya fi tasiri? Me ya sa haka yake? 5. Bayyana hanyoyi uku da ke taimakawa wajen zaizayar ƙasa a iska. 6. Ta yaya ake samar da dutsen namomin kaza? Bayyana da taimakon zane. 7. A ina ake samun mafi girman ma'ajiyar ƙasa? 8. Waɗanne siffofi na ƙasa ne ake samar da su ta hanyar aikin zaizayar ƙasa na raƙuman ruwa? Bayyana yanayin samuwar kowannensu. 10. Ta yaya ake samar da rairayin bakin teku? Faɗi muhimman rairayin bakin teku guda biyu na Indiya. 11. Bambanta tsakanin: (i) Aikin zaizayar ƙasa da zubar da ruwa na iska. (ii) Aikin mafita da aikin ruwa na raƙuman ruwa. (iii) Tafki da bakin teku. GEOGRAPHY 117

translation.en: when the VALIDATION KEY is SHORT PRESS on "Back to ventilation" field, the software must display the VENTILATION MENU SFSYSTSETUP3.3.2 the software must switch to the VENTILATION MENU if there is no key activation until 14 seconds or if a high priority alarm occurs or if the ventilation is launched (one press on ventilation key) SFSYSTSETUP3.4 Waveform Display Once the Waveform Display field has been selected, the software must display in loop "YES" or "OFF" when the UP KEY or DOWN KEY is pressed. If "YES" is validated, the software must display WAVEFORM MENU when the ventilation is running. If "NO" is validated, the software mustn't display WAVEFORM MENU. SFSYSTSETUP3.5 Pediatric circuit The software must allow the user to select a pediatric circuit (yes/no) when once this field is selected. SFSYSTSETUP3.6 Ventilation report when the VALIDATION KEY is SHORT PRESS on the "Ventilation report" field, the software must display the Ventilation Report menu SFSYSTSETUP3.7 Apnea alarm Once the Apnea alarm field has been selected, the software must display in loop "YES" or "OFF" when the UP KEY or DOWN KEY is pressed. If "YES" is validated, the apnea alarm works normally (When a apnea is detect, the apnea alarm is trigged (sound + message + light)). If "OFF" is validated, the apnea alarm can be detected but without sound, message and light. Moreover the action following the alarm should be available. SFSYSTSETUP3.9 Disconnection delay The software must allow the user to set a disconnection delay. translation.en: Description: This use case allows Business Users and Home Users to view detailed analytics and information about their registered devices. By accessing the platform's device analytics feature, users can monitor various aspects of their devices, including energy consumption, scheduled timings, device status, error logs, and other relevant data. This information helps users make informed decisions regarding device usage and identify any issues.

translation.en: Sport Facility Booking System Kirtan Shah  Future Expansion to Smart watches: Although not available at launch, future versions of the app may be extended to support smart watches. This could include basic features such as notifications, booking reminders, and facility availability updates. Fit Critereon for the product:  Mobile Compatibility: The product will be fully operational on mobile devices with the specified versions of Android.  Smart watch Support in the Future: The app should be adaptable for integration with smart watches within 12 months of the decision to move forward with this feature. Consideration for the product:  Mobile-First Approach: At present, the system will prioritize mobile platforms, with no desktop or web versions planned. All user interactions, including booking, notifications, and facility management, will be handled through the mobile app.  Regional Considerations: The app is optimized for users in certain regions, taking into account local currencies, languages, and regulations, with potential plans for expansion depending on market demand. By focusing on mobile platforms for now and planning future expansions, the app remains flexible and poised for growth as user needs evolve. 13d Scalability or Extensibility Requirements This section outlines the scalability and extensibility expectations for the Sports Facility Booking System, ensuring the product can handle increased user and booking volumes as the user base grows. To ensure that the system is designed with future growth in mind, allowing it to scale smoothly as the number of users, facilities, and bookings increases over time.  User Growth: The system is currently expected to support up to 50,000 active users at launch. It should be scalable to accommodate 200,000 active users within three years. The platform must be designed to allow for user growth without compromising performance or user experience.  Booking Volume: At launch, the system must be capable of handling 5,000 bookings per day. Within two years, the system should be able to process 25,000 bookings per day, ensuring 41

Wannan na iya haɗawa da fasaloli na asali kamar sanarwa, tunatarwa game da yin booking, da sabuntawa game da samuwa na kayan aiki <TECH>. La'akari da samfurin:  Hanyar Wayar Salula-First: A halin yanzu, tsarin  zai ba da fifiko ga dandamalin wayar hannu, ba tare da an shirya sigar tebur ko yanar gizo ba. Duk hulɗar mai amfani , gami da yin booking, sanarwa, da gudanar da kayan aiki, za a sarrafa ta ta hanyar manhajar wayar hannu.  Abubuwan da Za A Yi La'akari da su a Yankuna: An inganta manhajar ga masu amfani a wasu yankuna, ana la'akari da kuɗaɗen gida, harsuna, da ƙa'idodi, tare da tsare-tsaren faɗaɗawa dangane da buƙatun kasuwa. Ta hanyar mai da hankali kan dandamalin wayar hannu na yanzu da kuma tsara faɗaɗawa a nan gaba, manhajar ta kasance mai sassauƙa kuma a shirye take don ci gaba yayin da buƙatun mai amfani na TECH ke ƙaruwa. 13d <TECH>Ƙarfin Ƙarfafawa ko Bukatun Ƙarfafawa Wannan sashe yana bayyana ƙarfin Ƙarfafawa da tsammanin faɗaɗawa ga Tsarin Buɗe Wurin Wasanni na <TECH>Tsarin, yana tabbatar da cewa samfurin zai iya ɗaukar ƙarin mai amfani da kuma yawan yin booking yayin da tushen mai amfani ke ƙaruwa. Don tabbatar da cewa an tsara tsarin  da la'akari da ci gaban nan gaba, yana ba shi damar haɓaka cikin sauƙi yayin da adadin masu amfani, kayan aiki, da yin booking ke ƙaruwa akan lokaci.  Mai amfaniƘarfafawa: A halin yanzu ana sa ran tsarin  zai tallafa wa masu amfani har zuwa 50,000 masu aiki a lokacin ƙaddamarwa. Ya kamata a daidaita <TECH>ta yadda zai iya ɗaukar masu amfani 200,000 masu aiki cikin shekaru uku. Dole ne a tsara dandamalin <TECH>ta yadda zai ba da damar ci gaban <TECH>mai amfani ba tare da yin illa ga aikin  ko ƙwarewar <TECH>mai amfani ba.  Yawan yin rajista: A lokacin ƙaddamarwa, tsarin ta dole neta kasance tana iya sarrafa yin rajista 5,000 a kowace rana. Cikin shekaru biyu, tsarin ta dole neta iya sarrafa yin rajista 25,000 a kowace rana, wanda hakan zai tabbatar da cewa mutane 41 ne suka yi rajista.
