translation.en: 645 Smruti R. Sarangi value, then all that we need to do is add the outputs and check if it is equal to the expected value. Symptom Here we check if something went wrong during the execution of a thread. For example, if we do not expect a segmentation fault (illegal memory access), and if there is one it might point towards a bit flip. Let us now look at another axis where we focus on the structure of the checker. Here we can have three different configurations: MultiMaster, SingleSlave, and MultiSlave. In this case, a Master is an independent computing unit that executes the program as it would have executed on a regular system. The Slave on the other hand is a system that is impaired either in terms of hardware resources or performance. It is often used to check for invariants, or check for error symptoms. Note that we did not list the SingleMaster configuration because it simply represents the default implementation, which does not have any in-built checking mechanism. MultiMaster Systems The MultiMaster configuration uses redundant threads. In this case, we have parallel threads either running on the same core or on different cores that perform exactly the same computations. We can then periodically compare the results. If there is a discrepancy, we can infer a soft error. One of the earliest designs in this space was the IBM G5 processor [Slegel et al., 1999] that used two parallel pipelines that executed instructions from the same thread. They compared the values for all the stores and register writes every cycle. If a discrepancy was detected, the pipeline was flushed. It is important to note here that when we have only one redundant checking unit (a parallel pipeline in this case), it is not possible to determine which value is correct. Hence, it is necessary to flush both. Here, the error remains confined to the pipeline, it is not allowed to propagate to the memory system. We are also making the implicit assumption that the memory system is protected with ECC bits, and DUE errors are not an issue. Letusnowanalyzetheproblemsinthescheme. Inthiscase,wehaveastraightforward100%overhead intermsofhardware. Furthermore, non-trivialchangesneedtobemadetoanOOOpipelinetosupport this feature. We need to log every single value that changes the architectural state; these values need to becomparedatcommittime. Tominimizethecommunicationoverhead,wecanrunboththethreadson thesamecore(simultaneousmultithreadedexecution)bypartitioningitsresourcesbetweenthethreads; however, this will halve the computational throughput of the core and result in a significant slowdown. Hence, the other approach is to run the second thread on a different core. In this case, we will solve the issue of the slowdown, but add two more problems. The first is that values need to be communicated at the end of every cycle. This will place a substantial load on the NoC. The second is that it is in general very difficult to run two cores in lockstep in modern multicores with complex NoCs. Hence, we need to occasionally spend additional time and effort to ensure that the cores remain in synchrony. Becauseoftheseissues,laterapproachessuchastheHPNonStop[Bernicketal.,2005]systemsallow errors to propagate to the memory system. Instead of comparing values every cycle, they only compare the values of I/O operations that are visible to the external world. This minimizes the communication overhead, and allows us to utilize the full computational throughput of the cores. Furthermore, the different checking threads can run in separate address spaces (as separate programs) and there is no need for lockstepped execution. This is by far a more practical and efficient setup. Now,inthisconfigurationwehavesomeuniquechallengesandopportunitiesaswell. Thefirstisthat if we detect a discrepancy, then we still cannot find out which core is at fault. This is because we have only two cores, which means we have dual modular redundancy (DMR). If we detect a transient fault, we need to roll back both the threads on the two separate cores to a safe checkpoint. The checkpoint in this case is defined as an earlier point in the execution, which is deemed to be correct; moreover, it is possible to restore the state to that point in the execution. Recall that we have discussed various checkpointing schemes in Section 9.7. Any of them can be used here.
translation.ha: 645 Smruti R. Sarangi ƙima, to abin da kawai za mu yi shi ne ƙara fitarwa da duba ko daidai yake da ƙimar da ake tsammani. Alama A nan muna duba ko akwai wani abu da ya faru ba daidai ba yayin aiwatar da zare. Misali, idan ba mu yi tsammanin matsalar rabawa (shigar da ƙwaƙwalwar ajiya ba bisa ƙa'ida ba), kuma idan akwai ɗaya yana iya nuna ɗan juyawa. Bari mu duba wani axis inda muka mai da hankali kan tsarin mai duba. A nan za mu iya samun tsari uku daban-daban: MultiMaster, SingleSlave, da MultiSlave. A wannan yanayin, Master wani yanki ne na kwamfuta mai zaman kansa wanda ke aiwatar da shirin kamar yadda zai aiwatar a tsarin  na yau da kullun. Slave a gefe guda kuma tsarin <TECH> ne wanda ke da matsala ko dai dangane da albarkatun kayan aiki ko aikin <TECH>. Sau da yawa ana amfani da shi don duba rashin daidaituwa, ko duba alamun kuskure. Lura cewa ba mu lissafa tsarin SingleMaster ba saboda kawai yana wakiltar aiwatarwa ta asali, wanda ba shi da wata hanyar dubawa a ciki. Tsarin MultiMaster Tsarin MultiMaster yana amfani da zare masu sake amfani. A wannan yanayin, muna da zare masu layi daya ko dai suna gudana akan tsakiya ɗaya ko kuma akan tsakiya daban-daban waɗanda ke yin lissafi iri ɗaya. Sannan za mu iya kwatanta sakamakon lokaci-lokaci. Idan akwai rashin jituwa, za mu iya gano kuskure mai laushi. Ɗaya daga cikin ƙira na farko a cikin wannan sarari shine mai sarrafa IBM G5 [Slegel et al., 1999] wanda ya yi amfani da bututun mai layi biyu waɗanda suka aiwatar da umarni daga zaren ɗaya. Sun kwatanta ƙimar duk shagunan kuma rajista yana rubuta kowane zagaye. Idan an gano rashin jituwa, an wanke bututun. Yana da mahimmanci a lura a nan cewa lokacin da muke da na'urar dubawa guda ɗaya kawai (bututun layi daya a wannan yanayin), ba zai yiwu a tantance wace ƙimar take daidai ba. Saboda haka, ya zama dole a wanke duka biyun. A nan, kuskuren ya kasance yana iyakance ga bututun mai, ba a yarda ya yaɗu zuwa tsarin <TECH>ƙwaƙwalwa ba. Muna kuma yin zato na zahiri cewa tsarin <TECH>ƙwaƙwalwa yana da kariya da bits na ECC, kuma kurakuran DUE ba matsala ba ce. Bari mu bincika matsalolin da ke cikin tsarin. A wannan yanayin, muna da hanyar sadarwa ta sama 100%. Bugu da ƙari, canje-canje marasa mahimmanci suna buƙatar a sanya su a kan bututun OOO don tallafawa wannan fasalin. Muna buƙatar yin rijistar kowace ƙima da ke canza yanayin gine-gine; waɗannan ƙima suna buƙatar a kwatanta su a lokacin aiki. Don rage girman sadarwa, za mu iya gudanar da zaren biyu akan ma'aunin iri ɗaya (aikin da aka yi da ma'aunin ... Saboda haka, muna buƙatar mu ɓatar da ƙarin lokaci da ƙoƙari lokaci-lokaci don tabbatar da cewa ƙwayoyin za su kasance cikin haɗin kai. Saboda waɗannan matsalolin, hanyoyin da suka biyo baya kamar tsarin HPNonStop [Bernicketal.,2005] suna ba da damar kurakurai su yaɗu zuwa tsarin ƙwaƙwalwar <TECH>. Maimakon kwatanta dabi'u a kowane zagaye, suna kwatanta ƙimar ayyukan I/O waɗanda ake iya gani a duniyar waje kawai. Wannan yana rage yawan sadarwa, kuma yana ba mu damar amfani da cikakken ƙarfin sarrafa bayanai na ƙwayoyin zaren. Bugu da ƙari, zaren dubawa daban-daban na iya gudana a cikin wurare daban-daban na adireshi (a matsayin shirye-shirye daban-daban) kuma babu buƙatar aiwatarwa ta hanyar kullewa. Wannan ya fi dacewa da inganci. Yanzu, a cikin wannan saitin muna da ƙalubale na musamman da dama. Da farko idan muka gano rashin daidaituwa, to har yanzu ba za mu iya gano wanne ɓangaren zaren yake da laifi ba. Wannan saboda muna da tsakiya biyu kawai, wanda ke nufin muna da madaidaicin motsi guda biyu (DMR). Idan muka gano wata matsala ta wucin gadi, muna buƙatar mayar da zare biyu a kan core biyu daban-daban zuwa wurin duba lafiya. An bayyana wurin duba a wannan yanayin a matsayin wuri na farko a cikin aiwatarwa, wanda ake ganin daidai ne; haka ma, yana yiwuwa a mayar da yanayin zuwa wannan lokacin a cikin aiwatarwa. Ku tuna cewa mun tattauna tsare-tsaren duba daban-daban a Sashe na 9.7. Ana iya amfani da kowanne daga cikinsu a nan.

translation.en: Ocean: Submarine Relief and Water Circulation MODULE - 3 The domain of the rising sea level, the incoming tide towards the land is spoken of as a flow water on the Earth tide or a flood tide. At the time of a falling sea level after a few hours, we speak of the tide water going out or withdrawn, is an ebb tide (low tide). The flood tide is a high tide and the ebb tide is a low tide. Tides are really the largest waves keeping the ocean water restless. Twice a day regularly at constant intervals, a tide flows in and twice a day it ebbs away. Twice a Notes month, flow tides are higher and the ebb tides are lower than the average. Also twice a month flow tides are lower and the ebb tides are higher than the average. However the regular interval between two high tides or between two low tides is 12 hours and 25 minutes and not exactly 12 hours. Each day (in 24 hours) the high tide arrives about 51 minutes later than on the previous day. It is so because each day the rising and setting of the moon also falls behind by 51 minutes. It takes 24 hours and 50 minutes for the rotating earth to bring the same meridian vertically below the moon every day. The timings of the tides at a place on a coast will be clear to you from the following examples. High Tide 06.00 AM Low Tide 12.13 PM High Tide 06.25 PM Low Tide 12.38 AM High Tide 06.51 AM next day The factors responsible for bringing about such a variation in the regulation and the size of tides are: 1. The location of the sun, the moon and the earth in relation to each other which is rarely in a straight line. 2. The distances of the sun and the moon from the earth are not constant. 3. Our globe is not entirely covered with water. 4. The outline or shape of the coast may help or hinder the tides. Still the tides follow each other with a great punctuality at any given coast. What are the forces that generate the tides? The earth attracts and is also attracted by the sun, the moon and by other planetary bodies. It is called the gravitational force and it operates between the sun, moon and the earth. It sets the ocean waters in motion producing a tidal current. Tides are the proof of such a gravitational pull. The moon and the sun both exert their gravitational force on the earth. The Oceans, Submarine Relief And Circulation sun which is bigger in mass than the moon is also at a greater distance from the earth than the moon. Therefore, GEOGRAPHY 147
translation.ha: Teku: Rage Ruwa a ƙarƙashin Ruwa da Tsarin Zagayawa na Ruwa - 3 Yankin matakin teku mai tasowa, ana kiran ruwan da ke shigowa zuwa ƙasa da ruwan da ke kwarara a Duniya ko kuma ambaliyar ruwa. A lokacin da matakin teku ke faɗuwa bayan 'yan awanni, muna magana ne game da ruwan da ke fita ko janyewa, ruwan da ke fitowa ne daga teku (ƙaramin ruwa). Ruwan da ke kwarara yana da babban ruwa kuma ruwan da ke kwarara yana da ƙaramin ruwa. Ruwan da ke kwarara su ne manyan raƙuman ruwa da ke hana ruwan teku hutawa. Sau biyu a rana a kai a kai a kai a lokaci-lokaci, ruwan da ke kwarara yana shiga kuma sau biyu a rana yana faɗuwa. Sau biyu a wata, ruwan da ke kwarara ya fi girma kuma ruwan da ke kwarara yana ƙasa da matsakaici. Haka kuma sau biyu a wata ruwan da ke kwarara yana ƙasa kuma ruwan da ke kwarara ya fi matsakaici. Duk da haka, tazara tsakanin ruwan da ke kwarara biyu ko tsakanin ruwan da ke raguwa biyu yana da sa'o'i 12 da mintuna 25 kuma ba daidai ba ne sa'o'i 12. Kowace rana (a cikin awanni 24) ruwan da ke kwarara yana zuwa bayan kimanin mintuna 51 fiye da na ranar da ta gabata. Hakan ya faru ne saboda kowace rana tashi da faɗuwar wata suma suna raguwa da mintuna 51. Yana ɗaukar awanni 24 da mintuna 50 don duniya mai juyawa ta kawo irin wannan meridian a tsaye a ƙarƙashin wata kowace rana. Lokacin raƙuman ruwa a wani wuri a bakin teku zai bayyana a gare ku daga misalan masu zuwa. Babban Ruwa 06.00 AM Ƙaramin Ruwa 12.13 PM Babban Ruwa 06.25 PM Ƙaramin Ruwa 12.38 AM Babban Ruwa 06.51 AM Washegari Abubuwan da ke haifar da irin wannan bambancin a cikin tsari da girman raƙuman ruwa sune: 1. Wurin da rana, wata da ƙasa suke da alaƙa da juna wanda ba kasafai yake cikin layi madaidaiciya ba. 2. Nisa tsakanin rana da wata daga duniya ba su dawwama. 3. Duniyarmu ba ta cika rufe da ruwa ba. 4. Tsarin ko siffar bakin teku <TECH>na iya taimakawa ko hana raƙuman ruwa. Duk da haka raƙuman ruwa suna bin juna da lokaci mai kyau a kowace gabar teku. Wadanne ƙarfi ne ke haifar da raƙuman ruwa? Duniya tana jan hankali kuma rana, wata da sauran halittun duniya suna jan hankalinsu. Ana kiranta da ƙarfin nauyi kuma tana aiki tsakanin rana, wata da ƙasa. Tana sa ruwan teku ya motsa yana samar da kwararar ruwa. Ruwa shine shaidar irin wannan jan nauyi. Wata da rana duka suna yin ƙarfin nauyi a duniya. Tekuna, Taimakon Ruwa na ƙarƙashin Ruwa da Zagayawa Rana wadda ta fi girma a girma fiye da wata ita ma tana da nisa mafi girma daga duniya fiye da wata. Saboda haka, GEOGRAPHY 147

translation.en: Smruti R. Sarangi 278 Memory access Yes Send mapping TLB hit? to processor No Yes Frame in Populate Send mapping memory? TLB to processor No No (1) Evict a frame Free frame to swap space available? (2) Update its page table Yes Read in the new frame from swap space (if possible), or create a new empty frame Create/update mapping in the page table Populate Send mapping TLB to processor Figure 7.18: Flowchart for memory accesses The basic element of any memory structure is a memory cell that stores 1 bit of information. There are many kinds of memory cells. In this book, we shall mainly use the 6-transistor SRAM cell, and the 10-transistor CAM cell. Let us quickly describe these memory technologies. SRAM Cell Thequestionthatwewishtoanswerishowdowestore1bitofinformation? Wecanalwaysuselatches and flip-flops. However, these are area intensive structures and cannot be used to store thousands of bits. We need a structure that is far smaller. Let us extend the idea of a typical SR latch as shown in Figure 7.19. An SR latch can store a single bit. If we set S to 1 and R to 0, then we store a 1. Conversely, if we set S =0 and R=1, we store a 0. Let us appreciate the basic structure of this circuit. We have a cross-coupled pair of NAND gates.
translation.ha: Smruti R. Sarangi 278 Samun damar ƙwaƙwalwa Ee Aika taswirar TLB ta buga? zuwa ga mai sarrafawa A'a Ee Tsarin a Cika Aika ƙwaƙwalwar taswira? TLB zuwa mai sarrafawa A'a A'a (1) Korar firam Firam kyauta don musanya sarari da ake da shi? (2) Sabuntawa teburin shafinsa Ee Karanta a cikin sabon firam daga sararin musanya (idan zai yiwu), ko ƙirƙiri sabon firam mara komai Ƙirƙiri/sabuntawa taswirar a cikin teburin shafi Cika Aika taswirar TLB zuwa mai sarrafawa Hoto na 7.18: Jadawalin kwarara don samun damar ƙwaƙwalwa Babban abin da ke cikin kowane tsarin ƙwaƙwalwa shine ƙwayar ƙwaƙwalwa wanda ke adana bit 1 na bayanai. Akwai nau'ikan ƙwayoyin ƙwaƙwalwa da yawa. A cikin wannan littafin, za mu galibi muna amfani da ƙwayar SRAM mai transistor 6, da ƙwayar CAM mai transistor 10. Bari mu bayyana waɗannan fasahar ƙwaƙwalwa da sauri. Tantanin SRAM Tambayar da muke so mu amsa taswira taswira1bitofin bayanai? Za mu iya amfani da maƙallan wuta da flip-flops koyaushe. Duk da haka, waɗannan gine-gine ne masu zurfin yanki kuma ba za a iya amfani da su don adana dubban ragowa ba. Muna buƙatar tsarin da ya fi ƙanƙanta. Bari mu faɗaɗa ra'ayin maƙallan wuta na SR kamar yadda aka nuna a Hoto na 7.19. Maƙallan wuta na SR zai iya adana rago ɗaya. Idan muka saita S zuwa 1 da R zuwa 0, to muna adana 1. Akasin haka, idan muka saita S = 0 da R = 1, muna adana 0. Bari mu yaba da tsarin wannan da'irar. Muna da ƙofofin NAND guda biyu masu haɗin gwiwa.

translation.en: Software Requirements Specification for CV Maker Page 4 1 Introduction ❖ This application will help the user prepare a presentable CV for the people who are looking for work and also the people who are looking for people to hire can use it. With this project the user can add certificates, educational informations, skills, interests easily and collects all of this under one file. ❖ In this file reader will find the apps purpose, the advantages, performance requirements, software requirements and security requirements, the technologies thar are used on developing this project and architecture design. Back in the days people were try to prepare a CV by themselves but now with this app both the employer and the employee can use the pool that is created by the users to find qualified people for the job. 1.1 Project Purpose and Scope, and Objectives ❖ Today's business world is very competitive and full of opponents for us. If we are an avaricious person in this world, we must know the first rule: How do we serve ourselves? It is more important than being ourselves when we are on baby steps. ❖ This is one of the main purposes of the application we made. Helping the user for present his / her talents, educations, skills; all the qualifications and requirements for the job. It will be in a simple and effective way for to be noticed. If your resume is not prepared carefully, your important skills may be invisible in a crowd of sentences and the employer may not be able to reach the key questions which they want. Become one of the neglected resumes; it is the biggest danger but don't worry; we developed our application with the awareness of this. ❖ You can download the prepared CV as a PDF or also we send it to your e-mail address. With this resume, you can visit the workplaces individually, but you can lose a lot of time. We can help you if you want to save your time too. You can send it to our contracted workplaces in a few clicks. Thanks to us, your new job interview is just a few clicks away. 1.2 Roles and responsibilities ➢ Barış Baranaslan: 1.0 – 3.1 – 3.2 – 3.3 – 7 He done the research part of requirements very well. He helped translate and order in every articles. ➢ Cem Solak: 2.2.3 – 4.1 – 4.2 – 4.3 – 5.3 He is Mr. Visual Paradigm. He has the programme that’s why he made all schemes. Also, he made Interface sample part with his photoshop skills. ➢ Erencan Oymak: 2.2.3 – 5.2.1 – 5.2.2 – 5.3 – 6.4 ➢ Ulaş Yılmaz: 1.3 – 4.0 – 5.1.1 – 5.1.2 – 6.1 They were heavily helpful in legal sections, codes and explaining some definitions. They are very useful because they are experienced in business. ➢ Kadir Batuhan Demir: 1.1 – 1.4 – 2.1 – 2.2.1 – 6.3 Understanding and managing the project, work-sharing. We have different parts in project. Different members made the main of his own parts. But all of us get together; confirmed and made some addictions and extractions in every parts. Every student has a share in every section.
translation.ha: Bayanin Bukatun Software don CMai Yin V Shafi na 4 1 Gabatarwa ❖ Wannan aikace-aikacen  zai taimaka wa mai amfani da  shirya CV mai kyau ga mutanen da ke neman aiki da kuma mutanen da ke neman mutanen da za su ɗauka aiki za su iya amfani da shi. Tare da wannan aikin mai amfani da  zai iya ƙara takaddun shaida, bayanai na ilimi, ƙwarewa, abubuwan sha'awa cikin sauƙi kuma ya tattara duk waɗannan a ƙarƙashin fayil ɗaya. ❖ A cikin wannan mai karanta fayil ɗin zai sami manufar aikace-aikacen, fa'idodi, buƙatun aikin, buƙatun software da buƙatun tsaro, ana amfani da fasahar don haɓaka wannan aikin da ƙirar gine-gine. A da, mutane suna ƙoƙarin shirya CV da kansu amma yanzu tare da wannan app ɗin, ma'aikaci da ma'aikaci za su iya amfani da wurin da masu amfani suka ƙirƙira don nemo mutanen da suka cancanta don aikin. 1.1 Manufar Aiki da Faɗin Aiki, da Manufofi ❖ Duniyar kasuwanci ta yau tana da gasa sosai kuma cike take da abokan hamayya a gare mu. Idan mu mutum ne mai kwadayi a wannan duniyar, dole ne mu san ƙa'ida ta farko: Ta yaya muke bauta wa kanmu? Ya fi muhimmanci fiye da zama kanmu lokacin da muke kan mataki na farko. ❖ Wannan yana ɗaya daga cikin manyan manufofin aikace-aikacen  da muka yi. Taimaka wa mai amfani da  don gabatar da baiwarsa, iliminsa, ƙwarewarsa; duk cancanta da buƙatun aikin. Zai kasance ta hanya mai sauƙi da inganci don a lura da shi. Idan ba a shirya takardar neman aikin ku da kyau ba, ƙwarewar ku mai mahimmanci  na iya zama ba a gani a cikin jimloli da yawa kuma mai aiki <TECH> na iya ba zai iya cimma manyan tambayoyin da suke so ba. Zama ɗaya daga cikin takardar neman aikin da aka yi watsi da shi; shine babban haɗari amma kada ku damu; mun haɓaka aikace-aikacen  tare da sanin wannan. ❖ Kuna iya sauke CV ɗin da aka shirya a matsayin PDF ko kuma mu aika shi zuwa adireshin imel ɗinku. Tare da wannan takardar neman aikin, zaku iya ziyartar wuraren aiki daban-daban, amma kuna iya rasa lokaci mai yawa. Za mu iya taimaka muku idan kuna son adana lokacinku. Kuna iya aika shi zuwa wuraren aikinmu da aka yi kwangila da su cikin yan dannawa. Godiya gare mu, sabon hirar aikinku yana da ɗan dannawa kaɗan. 1.2 Matsayi da nauyi ➢ Barış Baranaslan: 1.0 – 3.1 – 3.2 – 3.3 – 7 Ya yi binciken ɓangaren buƙatun sosai. Ya taimaka wajen fassara da yin oda a cikin kowane labari. ➢ Cem Solak: 2.2.3 – 4.1 – 4.2 – 4.3 – 5.3 Shi ne Mr. Visual Paradigm. Yana da shirin shi ya sa ya yi duk tsare-tsare. Hakanan, ya sanya samfurin Interface ya zama ɓangare na ƙwarewarsa ta Photoshop. ➢ Erencan Oymak: 2.2.3 – 5.2.1 – 5.2.2 – 5.3 – 6.4 ➢ Ulaş Yılmaz: 1.3 – 4.0 – 5.1.1 – 5.1.2 – 6.1 Sun taimaka sosai a sassan shari'a, lambobi da kuma bayyana wasu ma'anoni. Suna da amfani sosai saboda suna da ƙwarewa a kasuwanci. ➢ Kadir Batuhan Demir: 1.1 – 1.4 – 2.1 – 2.2.1 – 6.3 Fahimtar da kuma gudanar da aikin, raba aiki. Muna da sassa daban-daban a cikin aikin. Membobi daban-daban sun yi babban ɓangaren nasa. Amma dukkanmu mun haɗu; mun tabbatar kuma mun yi wasu jaraba da cirewa a kowane sashe. Kowane ɗalibi yana da rabo a kowane sashe.

translation.en: Land use and Agriculture MODULE - 8 Economic activities were nominal resulting in only 3 per cent annual growth against the target of 5 per and infrastructural cent. development in India During Fifth Plan Period (1974-79) emphasis were given to self-sufficiency in food production and poverty eradication. Stress was laid on the extension of irri- gation, expansion in cultivated area under HYV seeds and grant of loans and subsidies to farmers. Dry farming was propagated. This plan achieved its target successfully with 4.6 per cent growth. Almost all food grains except pulses wit- nessed increase in production. Notes The Sixth Plan (1980-85) imphasized on land reforms, use of HYV seeds, chemi- cal fertilisers and groundwater resources and improving post harvest technology as well as marketing and storage facilities. The annual growth rate was 6 per cent, highest ever during plan periods. The food-grain production reached 152 million tonnes. The highest growth in food-grain, pulses and coarse cereals was recorded during Seventh Plan (1985-90) showing over all annual growth rate of 4 per cent. The areas of Green Revolution were expanded during the period. The Eighth Plan (1992-97) witnessed a tendency of stagnation in foodgrain pro- duction while oilseed registered a rapid growth. The Ninth Plan (1997-02) witnessed a mixed success. There were fluctuations in the foodgrain production. During this plan period National Agricultural Policy, 2000, was framed and several measures were announced including, watershed management, development of horticulture, agricultural credits and insurance scheme for crops. In the Tenth Plan (2002-2007) focus is placed on (i) sustainable management of water and land resources, (ii) development of rural infrastructure to support agri- culture, (iii) dissemination of agriculture technology, (iv) credit flow to agriculture sector, and (v) agricultural marketing reforms. The New Agricultural Policy The Government of India has announced (28th July 2000) a new National Agri- cultural policy, 2000, in the light of changes arising out of economic liberalization and globalization. The main aims of the polict are (i) achieving more than 4 per cent per annum growth rate in agriculture sector, (ii) growth based on efficient use of resources and conservation of soil, water and biodiversity, (iii) growth with equity-in region and among the farmers, (iv) growth that caters to domestic mar- ket and maximizes benefits from exports of agricultural products and (v) techno- logically, environmentally and economically sustainable growth. The main features of this policy are:- (1) privatisation of agriculture and price protection of produce, (2) land leasing and contract farming by private companies, GEOGRAPHY 149
translation.ha: Amfani da ƙasa da Tsarin Noma - 8 Ayyukan tattalin arziki ba su da yawa, wanda ya haifar da kashi 3 cikin ɗari kawai na ci gaban kowace shekara idan aka kwatanta da burin kashi 5 cikin ɗari na ci gaban kayayyakin more rayuwa a Indiya A lokacin Shirin Fasaha na Biyar (1974-79) an mai da hankali kan wadatar kai wajen samar da abinci da kawar da talauci. An ɗora damuwa kan faɗaɗa ban ruwa, faɗaɗa yankunan da aka noma a ƙarƙashin irin HYV da kuma bayar da lamuni da tallafi ga manoma. An yaɗa noman busasshe. Wannan shirin ya cimma burinsa cikin nasara da ci gaban kashi 4.6 cikin ɗari. Kusan dukkan hatsin abinci banda hatsi sun shaida ƙaruwar samarwa. Bayanan kula Tsarin Na Shida (1980-85) ya mayar da hankali kan gyare-gyaren ƙasa, amfani da iri na HYV, takin sinadarai da albarkatun ƙasa na ƙasa da inganta fasahar bayan girbi da kuma wuraren tallatawa da adanawa. Yawan ci gaban kowace shekara ya kai kashi 6 cikin ɗari, mafi girma a kowane lokaci a lokacin shirin. Yawan samar da abinci da hatsi ya kai tan miliyan 152. An sami mafi girman ci gaba a fannin hatsi, hatsi da hatsi masu kauri a lokacin Shirin  na Bakwai (1985-90) wanda ya nuna sama da dukkan ci gaban shekara-shekara na kashi 4 cikin 100. An faɗaɗa yankunan <TECH>Green Revolution a wannan lokacin. Shirin <TECH> na Takwas (1992-97) ya shaida yanayin tsayawa a fannin samar da hatsi a yayin da tsaban mai ya yi rijistar girma cikin sauri. Shirin <TECH> na Takwas (1997-02) ya shaida nasara iri-iri. Akwai sauye-sauye a fannin samar da hatsi a abinci. A wannan lokacin shirin, an tsara Tsarin Noma na Ƙasa na <TECH>, 2000, kuma an sanar da matakai da dama, ciki har da, kula da ruwa, haɓaka noman lambu, lamunin noma da tsarin inshora ga amfanin gona. A cikin Tsarin Goma (2002-2007), an mayar da hankali kan (i) kula da albarkatun ruwa da ƙasa mai ɗorewa, (ii) haɓaka kayayyakin more rayuwa na karkara don tallafawa noma, (iii) yaɗa fasahar noma, (iv) kwararar bashi ga ɓangaren noma, da (v) gyare-gyaren tallan noma. Sabuwar Manufofin Noma Gwamnatin Indiya ta sanar (28 ga Yuli 2000) sabuwar manufar Noma ta Ƙasa, 2000, dangane da canje-canjen da suka taso daga 'yancin tattalin arziki da haɗin kan duniya. Manyan manufofin siyasa sune (i) cimma fiye da kashi 4 cikin 100 a kowace shekara a fannin noma, (ii) ci gaba bisa ingantaccen amfani da albarkatu da kiyaye ƙasa, ruwa da bambancin halittu, (iii) ci gaba tare da daidaito a yankin da tsakanin manoma, (iv) ci gaba wanda ke biyan buƙatun kasuwar cikin gida kuma yana ƙara fa'ida daga fitar da kayayyakin noma da (v) ci gaba mai ɗorewa ta fasaha, muhalli da tattalin arziki. Manyan fasalulluka na wannan manufar sune:- (1) mallakar gonaki da kuma kare farashi na amfanin gona, (2) hayar filaye da kuma kwangilar noma ta kamfanoni masu zaman kansu, GEOGRAPHY 149

translation.en: 191 Smruti R. Sarangi r6 0 r7 L Prologue 1 S L r8 2 I S L r6 Fuse 3 rows 3 into one I S L r7 iteration. 4 I S L I S Epilogue I Figure 5.14: Fusing three iterations into one execution without software pipelining and an execution with software pipelining. They are identical as far as correctness is concerned. Let us now consider some corner cases. If a loop has a lot of iterations, we can unroll it by a factor of 3, and execute it in this fashion. However, there are some instructions that are not a part of this code. Look at the top of Figure 5.14. Instructions L0, S0, and L1 are not a part of the fused loop. They need to be executed before the main loop starts. This piece of code is known as the prologue. Similarly, instructions I3, S4, and I4 are a part of the epilogue that needs to execute separately, and in the correct sequence. In terms of correctness nothing changes; however in terms of overhead this is a minor overhead because we do not get the benefits of software pipelining for these codes. Nevertheless, when the number of iterations is large, this overhead is negligible. There is a rich theory of software pipelining to cater to the general case where we can have all kinds of dependences between instructions. The reader should refer to the work of Bob Rau [Rau, 1994] and Monica Lam [Lam, 1988]. We can do slightly better if we have more registers. There is a dependence between the L and S blocks even between different iterations because they use the same register r5. This precludes us from executingS1 andL2 inparallel. Ifwehaveamulti-issuein-orderpipelinethenwewouldwanttoexecute S1 andL2 simultaneously. Letustrytodosomerenaminginsoftwaretotakecareofsuchissues. Similar to hardware renaming, the natural solution in this case will be to create three versions of r5 (one for each iteration). Let us give ourselves some more room by considering a system that has 32 registers instead of the 16 that we have. For the 0th iteration let us use r20, and for the 1st and 2nd iterations let us use r21 and r22 respectively. The code thus looks as follows. /* First Row */ add r6, r6, 3 /* I0 */ lsl r10, r6, 2 add r4, r0, r11 /* S1 */ st r21, 0[r4]
translation.ha: 191 Smruti R. Sarangi r6 0 r7 L Gabatarwa 1 S L r8 2 I S L r6 Fuse layuka 3 3 zuwa ɗaya I S L r7 maimaitawa. 4 I S L I S Gabatarwa I Hoto na 5.14: Haɗa maimaitawa uku zuwa aiwatarwa ɗaya ba tare da bututun software da aiwatarwa tare da bututun software ba. Suna da iri ɗaya dangane da daidaito. Bari mu yi la'akari da wasu shari'o'in kusurwa. Idan madauki yana da maimaitawa da yawa, za mu iya buɗe shi da kashi 3, kuma mu aiwatar da shi ta wannan hanyar. Duk da haka, akwai wasu umarni waɗanda ba ɓangare na wannan lambar ba ne. Duba saman Hoto na 5.14. Umarnin L0, S0, da L1 ba ɓangare na madaukin da aka haɗa ba ne. Ana buƙatar aiwatar da su kafin babban madauki ya fara. Wannan yanki na lambar an san shi da gabatarwa. Hakazalika, umarni I3, S4, da I4 ɓangare ne na ƙarshen da ke buƙatar aiwatarwa daban, kuma a cikin tsari daidai. Dangane da daidaito babu abin da ke canzawa; duk da haka, dangane da sama da ƙasa, wannan ƙaramin kuɗi ne saboda ba mu samun fa'idodin bututun software don waɗannan lambobin. Duk da haka, idan adadin maimaitawa ya yi yawa, wannan sama da ƙasa ba shi da yawa. Akwai ka'ida mai wadata ta bututun software don biyan buƙatun gabaɗaya inda za mu iya samun nau'ikan dogaro tsakanin umarni. Mai karatu ya kamata ya koma ga aikin Bob Rau [Rau, 1994] da Monica Lam [Lam, 1988]. Za mu iya yin mafi kyau idan muna da ƙarin rajista. Akwai dogaro tsakanin tubalan L da S ko da tsakanin maimaitawa daban-daban saboda suna amfani da rajista iri ɗaya r5. Wannan yana hana mu aiwatar da S1 da L2 ba tare da alaƙa ba. Idan muna da mafita da yawa a cikin tsari bututu, za mu so mu aiwatar da S1 da L2 a lokaci guda. Bari mu gwada yin suna a cikin software don kula da waɗannan batutuwa. Kamar yadda aka sake suna kayan aiki, mafita ta asali a wannan yanayin ita ce ƙirƙirar nau'ikan r5 guda uku (ɗaya ga kowane maimaitawa). Bari mu ba wa kanmu ƙarin sarari ta hanyar la'akari da tsarin <TECH>wanda ke da rajista 32 maimakon 16 da muke da shi. Don maimaitawa ta 0 bari mu yi amfani da r20, kuma don maimaitawa ta 1 da ta 2 bari mu yi amfani da r21 da r22 bi da bi. Don haka lambar tana kama da haka. /* Layi na Farko */ ƙara r6, r6, 3 /* I0 */ lsl r10, r6, 2 ƙara r4, r0, r11 /* S1 */ st r21, 0[r4]

translation.en: 20 ▪ This feature should be visible to the users at the first page of the menu. ▪ By clicking on this button, user should be able to enter to a new page called special orders. ▪ In the special orders page, user will be asked some questions about the food they want to have, such as which flavor do they prefer, what type of food do they consider (burgers, noodles, rice, sea food, and etc) ▪ After answering all questions, the system will provide a filter on the menus and restaurants to provide the best choices for the user. ▪ All the process after the special order page should be the same as before. 4. Non-Functional Requirements/Quality Attributes 4.1 Performance • The response time of the system to user actions (e.g., menu browsing, order placement) should be within 2 seconds under normal load conditions. • The system should handle a minimum of 500 simultaneous transactions during peak hours without degrading performance. 4.2 Scalability • Design the system to accommodate a 20% growth in users and menu items over the next 3 years without a noticeable drop in performance. 4.3 Reliability • The system should have a mean time between failures (MTBF) of at least 2000 hours, ensuring a reliable and consistent user experience. • Scheduled maintenance should occur during non-peak hours, and users must be notified at least 48 hours in advance.

Specific Requirements 9 3.1 External Interface Requirements 9 3.2 Functional Requirements 9 3.2.1 The system shall allow employees to submit timecards. 9 3.2.2 The system shall allow the employees to provide the number of hours worked for a particular workload in the timecard (no more than 8 hours daily for hourly employees). 9 3.2.3 The system shall generate a paycheck for hourly employees every Friday based on hourly rate and their worked hours. 9 3.2.4 The system shall keep track of each timecard start and end date. 9 3.2.5 The system shall allow employees and administrator to log in using their email address and password. 9 3.2.6 The system shall allow performance employees to add purchase orders using the date, purchased products, amount of the sale, customer point of contact and costumer’s billing address. 10 3.2.7 The system shall generate a unique purchase order number for each purchase order that is added in FR 3.2.6 10 3.2.8 The system shall assign a commission rate for each performance employee based on their sales. 10 3.2.9 The system shall calculate the commission amount for the performance employees based on the commission rate and purchase order amount in FR 3.2.8. 10 3.2.10 The system shall generate a paycheck for Salaried employees on the last working day of the month (add commission amount for performance employee). 10 4 | P age

translation.en: 665 Smruti R. Sarangi The RAMP model uses the following values for the constants: a = 78, b = −0.081, X = 0.759eV, Y =−66.8eVK, Z =−8.37×10−4eV/K (eV stands for electron volts). Thermal Cycling The chip goes through many thermal cycles. Some of these represent major events such as powering up or powering down the processor (low frequency cycles), and many of these represent minor events that correspondtovariationsinthetemperaturebecauseofthevariationinthedynamicpowerconsumption (high frequency cycles). The low frequency cycles have a greater effect on the solder joints in the packaging. They alternately expand and contract; this constant thermal cycling causes metal fatigue and the joints fail over time. The resulting MTTF is given by the Coffin-Manson equation [Coffin Jr, 1954,Manson, 1953]. (cid:18) 1 (cid:19)q MTTF ∝ (12.18) tc T −T ambient T is the average temperature of the packaging, T is the ambient temperature, and q is a material ambient dependent parameter (assumed to be 2.35). Again note the polynomial dependence with temperature. 12.6.3 Failure Rate of the Entire System Estimating the failure rate of the entire system is difficult because we need to understand how the failures are distributed over time. In general, we assume that the processor is a series-failure system, which meansthat ifone componentfails the entire processoris deemedto have failed. There areseveral models that have been considered for representing failure rates across time. There are studies that have used the exponentially distributed failure rate model or the log-normal failure rate model. This is a complex function of the technology and the usage pattern. Onereasonwhytheacademiccommunityhasparticularlynotbeenveryinterestedinmodelinghard errors over time is because most failures in an electronic system follow a bath-tub curve as shown in Figure 12.9. This curve has three components. At the outset, the failure rate is high because processors have many manufacturing defects whose effects are further exacerbated during the burn-in phase (see Section12.4.1). Oncethesedefectsaredetected,theprocessorsarediscarded. Thisexplainstheelevated failure rates in the first phase of the processors’ operation, which is basically post-silicon validation. Subsequently, once the processors are released to the market (second phase) they have a period of relativelystableoperation. Duringthistimeharderrorsarenotparticularlyconcerningbecauseinmost cases processors become obsolete before they actually start developing permanent faults. Towards the end (third phase) of the lifetime of a processor – typically 7 to 10 years after it is first put to use – some processors start developing faults, and then they get finally decommissioned. Sadly, most processors become obsolete before they reach this stage; hence, for most customers hard errors are not particularly concerning. 12.6.4 Methods to Reduce or Tolerate Hard Errors The silver bullet for reducing the probability of developing such permanent faults is to reduce the operatingtemperature. Aswehaveseen, mostofthefailureratesareexponentiallydependentonlinear functions of the temperature, and thus any temperature management technique will help reduce the incidence of such hard errors. In addition, there are many solutions at the level of the fabrication process to reduce the effects of failure mechanisms such as electromigration. For example, we can coat copper wires with materials such as TaN (Tantalum nitride). Such protective coatings stop the diffusion of copper atoms to nearby structures.

Kewayen Zafi Chip ɗin yana wucewa ta cikin zagayowar zafi da yawa. Wasu daga cikinsu suna wakiltar manyan abubuwan da suka faru kamar ƙara ƙarfi ko rage ƙarfin na'urar sarrafawa (zagayen ƙarancin mita), kuma da yawa daga cikinsu suna wakiltar ƙananan abubuwan da suka faru waɗanda suka dace da bambance-bambancen zafin jiki saboda canjin amfani da ƙarfin kuzari (zagayen yawan mita). Zagayen ƙarancin mita suna da tasiri mafi girma akan haɗin solder a cikin marufi. Suna faɗaɗawa da ƙunƙuwa a madadin haka; wannan zagayen zafi na yau da kullun yana haifar da gajiyar ƙarfe kuma haɗin gwiwa suna lalacewa akan lokaci. An bayar da MTTF da aka samu ta hanyar lissafin Coffin-Manson [Coffin Jr, 1954, Manson, 1953]. (cid:18) 1 (cid:19)q MTTF ∝ (12.18) tc T −T yanayin T shine matsakaicin zafin jiki na marufi, T shine zafin jiki na yanayi, kuma q sigar ma'auni ce ta yanayin abu (wanda ake ɗauka 2.35). A sake lura da dogaro da polynomial tare da zafin jiki. 12.6.3 Yawan Kasawa na Tsarin  Gabaɗaya Kimanta ƙimar kasawa na tsarin  gaba ɗaya yana da wahala saboda muna buƙatar fahimtar yadda ake rarraba gazawar akan lokaci. Gabaɗaya, muna ɗauka cewa mai sarrafawa tsarin <TECH>gazawa ne na jerin <TECH>, wanda ke nufin cewa idan wani sashi ya gaza dukkan mai sarrafawa ana ɗaukar ya gaza. Akwai samfura da yawa waɗanda aka yi la'akari da su don wakiltar ƙimar kasawa a tsawon lokaci. Akwai nazarin da suka yi amfani da samfurin ƙimar kasawa da aka rarraba ko samfurin ƙimar kasawa na log-normal. Wannan aiki ne mai rikitarwa na fasaha da tsarin amfani. Ɗaya daga cikin dalilan da yasa al'ummar jami'a ba ta da sha'awar yin ƙira kurakurai masu wahala a tsawon lokaci shine saboda yawancin gazawa a cikin tsarin lantarki na <TECH> yana bin lanƙwasa na baho kamar yadda aka nuna a Hoto na 12.9. Wannan lanƙwasa yana da sassa uku. A farko, ƙimar gazawar tana da yawa saboda masu sarrafawa suna da lahani da yawa na masana'antu waɗanda tasirinsu ya ƙara ta'azzara a lokacin ƙonewa (duba Sashe na 12.4.1). Da zarar an gano waɗannan lahani, an jefar da masu sarrafawa. Wannan yana bayyana ƙimar gazawar da ta karu a matakin farko na aikin masu sarrafawa, wanda shine tabbatarwa bayan silicon. Daga baya, da zarar an saki masu sarrafawa zuwa kasuwa (mataki na biyu) suna da lokacin aiki mai sauƙi. A wannan lokacin kurakurai masu ƙarfi ba su da damuwa musamman saboda yawancin lokuta masu sarrafawa suna tsufa kafin su fara haifar da kurakurai na dindindin. Zuwa ƙarshen (mataki na uku) na rayuwar mai sarrafawa - yawanci shekaru 7 zuwa 10 bayan an fara amfani da shi - wasu masu sarrafawa suna fara haifar da kurakurai, sannan a ƙarshe a daina aiki. Abin baƙin ciki, yawancin masu sarrafawa suna tsufa kafin su kai ga wannan matakin; saboda haka, ga yawancin abokan ciniki kurakurai masu wuya ba su da mahimmanci. 12.6.4 Hanyoyi don Rage Ko Jure Kurakurai Masu Tauri Harsashi na azurfa don rage yuwuwar haifar da irin waɗannan kurakurai na dindindin shine rage zafin aiki. Kamar yadda muka gani, yawancin gazawar suna dogara ne akan ayyukan zafin jiki na kan layi, don haka duk wata dabarar sarrafa zafin jiki za ta taimaka wajen rage yawan irin waɗannan kurakurai masu tauri. Bugu da ƙari, akwai mafita da yawa a matakin tsarin ƙera don rage tasirin hanyoyin gazawa kamar ƙaura ta lantarki. Misali, za mu iya shafa wayoyi na jan ƙarfe da kayan aiki kamar TaN (Tantalum nitride). Irin waɗannan rufin kariya suna dakatar da yaɗuwar atom na jan ƙarfe zuwa gine-gine da ke kusa.

translation.en: E-Commerce Management System SRS January 2025 Participants (Lifelines) • Customer (Actor): The person initiating the order process. • E-Commerce Website: The web interface the customer interacts with. • Website Account Server: Handles user authentication and account verification. • Item Database: Stores information about the products. • Orders & Deliveries Information: Manages order processing and delivery de- tails. Messages and Interactions (in chronological order) 1. Login Account: The customer initiates the login process through the E-commerce Website. 2. Verify Account: The E-Commerce Website sends the login credentials to the Website Account Server for verification. 3. Alternative (Conditional Branch - Account Validation): • Valid Account: If the account is valid, the Website Account Server sends a “Valid Account” message back to the E-Commerce Website. – Browse for Items: The customer browses the available items on the E-Commerce Website. – Choose an Item to Order: The customer selects an item they wish to purchase. – ProcessTransaction(RequestItemInformation): TheE-Commerce Website requests item details (likely price, availability, etc.) from the Item Database. – Item Information (Response): TheItemDatabasesendstherequested item information back to the E-Commerce Website. – Confirm the Order: The E-Commerce Website displays the order de- tails and asks the customer for confirmation. – Alternative (Conditional Branch - Order Confirmation): ∗ Yes (Order Confirmed): The customer confirms the order. ∗ Processing Order: The E-Commerce Website begins processing the order (this step might involve more detailed interactions not shown in this diagram). ∗ Order Information: The E-Commerce Website sends the order de- tails to the Orders & Deliveries Information system. ∗ Wait for Delivery Notification: The customer waits for a delivery notification. ∗ No (Order Not Confirmed): The customer cancels the order. ∗ List of Items: The E-Commerce Website displays the list of items again (allowing the customer to continue shopping). Page 22
translation.ha: Gudanar da Kasuwancin E-Commerce Tsarin SRS Janairu 2025 Mahalarta (Lifelines) • Abokin Ciniki (Actor): Mutumin da ke fara aiwatar da oda. • Shafin Yanar Gizo na Kasuwancin E-commerce: Shafin yanar gizo da abokin ciniki ke hulɗa da shi. • Asusun Yanar Gizo Sabar: Yana kula da tantancewa da tabbatar da asusun mai amfani. • Abu Bayanan Bayanai: Yana adana bayanan  game da samfuran. • Umarni & Isarwa Bayani: Yana kula da sarrafa oda da cikakkun bayanai na isarwa. Saƙonni da Hulɗa (a cikin tsari na lokaci-lokaci) 1. Asusun Shiga: Abokin ciniki yana fara aiwatar da shiga ta hanyar Gidan Yanar Gizo na Kasuwancin E-commerce. 2. Tabbatar da Asusun: Gidan Yanar Gizo na Kasuwancin E-commerce yana aika takardun shaidar shiga zuwa Asusun Yanar Gizo Sabar don tabbatarwa. 3. Madadin (Reshen Sharaɗi - Tabbatar da Asusu): • Asusun Inganci: Idan asusun yana da inganci, Asusun Yanar Gizo Server yana aika saƙon "Asusun Inganci" zuwa Shafin Yanar Gizo na Kasuwancin E-Commerce. – Duba Abubuwa: Abokin ciniki yana bincika abubuwan da ake da su akan Shafin Yanar Gizo na Kasuwancin E-Commerce. – Zaɓi Abu don Yin Oda: Abokin ciniki yana zaɓar abu da yake son siya. – ProcessTransaction(RequestItemInformation): Shafin Yanar Gizo na Kasuwancin E-Commerce yana buƙatar cikakkun bayanai game da abu (ƙila farashi, samuwa, da sauransu) daga Abun Basebase. – Abu Bayani (Amsa): TheItemDatabases yana aika bayanai game da abu bayani zuwa Shafin Yanar Gizo na Kasuwancin E-Commerce. – Tabbatar da Oda: Shafin Yanar Gizo na Kasuwancin E-Commerce yana nuna cikakkun bayanai game da oda kuma yana neman abokin ciniki don tabbatarwa. – Madadin (Reshen Sharaɗi - Tabbatar da Oda): ∗ Ee (An Tabbatar da Oda): Abokin ciniki yana tabbatar da oda. ∗ Umarnin Sarrafawa: Shafin Yanar Gizo na Kasuwancin E-commerce ya fara aiwatar da odar (wannan matakin na iya haɗawa da ƙarin hulɗa dalla-dalla waɗanda ba a nuna su a cikin wannan zane ba). ∗ Umarni Bayani: Shafin Yanar Gizo na Kasuwancin E-commerce yana aika bayanan odar zuwa ga Tsarin Umarni & Isarwa Bayani tsarin. ∗ Jira Sanarwar Isarwa: Abokin ciniki yana jiran sanarwar isarwa. ∗ A'a (Ba a Tabbatar da Umarni ba): Abokin ciniki ya soke odar. ∗ Jerin Kayayyaki: Shafin Yanar Gizo na Kasuwancin E-commerce yana sake nuna jerin abubuwan (yana ba abokin ciniki damar ci gaba da siyayya). translation.en: 2. Overall Description 2.1. Product Perspective The AI-Powered Health and Fitness Tracker is a standalone Android application with cloud- based data storage via Firebase Firestore. It integrates with the Edamam Nutrition API for food data and uses AI models (Food101, LLAMA 3, and Facebook Prophet) for meal recognition and recommendations. Future integrations with wearables are planned but excluded from the initial scope. The app aims to reduce manual input compared to competitors by leveraging AI automation. 2.2. Product Functions  User Authentication: Secure registration and login using email and password.  AI Meal Tracking Image-based food recognition and manual meal logging with calorie and nutrient analysis.  AI Workout Recommendations: Personalized workout plans based on user goals and fitness level.  Water Intake Tracking: Smart reminders and daily goal tracking for hydration.  Progress Analytics: Weekly and monthly health trends with AI-driven insights.  Gamification: Streak tracking, badges, and rewards to encourage consistency.  Data Synchronization: Cloud-based synchronizing of user data across sessions. 2.3. User Classes and Characteristics General Users:  Fitness enthusiasts and health-conscious individuals.  Basic smartphone proficiency; prefer minimal manual input.  Access all features (tracking, recommendations, and gamification). Admin Users (Optional, Future Scope):  Manage system settings or analytics.  Require technical expertise for backend access. 2.4. Operating Environment  Mobile Devices: o Android (version 8.0 and above).  Frontend: o Jetpack Compose (Kotlin) for responsive UI.  Backend: o Firebase Firestore for real-time data storage.  AI Models: o Food101 for image-based food recognition. o LLAMA for NLP-based meal suggestions. o Facebook Prophet for trend analysis.  Tools:
translation.ha: 2. Bayani Gabaɗaya 2.1. Ra'ayin Samfura AI-Powered Health and Fitness Tracker aikace-aikacen Android  ne kawai tare da ajiyar bayanai na  ta hanyar Firebase Firestore. Yana haɗawa da Edamam Nutrition API don bayanai na abinci  kuma yana amfani da samfuran AI (Food101, LLAMA 3, da Facebook Prophet) don gane abinci da shawarwari. An tsara haɗin gwiwa na gaba tare da kayan sawa amma an cire su daga farkon. Manhajar tana da nufin rage shigarwar hannu idan aka kwatanta da masu fafatawa ta amfani da atomatik na AI. 2.2. Ayyukan Samfura  Mai amfani Tabbatarwa: Rijista mai aminci da shiga ta amfani da imel da kalmar sirri ta .  Binciken Abinci na AI Gano abinci bisa hoto da yin rikodin abinci da hannu tare da nazarin kalori da sinadaran gina jiki.  Shawarwari kan Aikin AI: Shirye-shiryen motsa jiki na musamman bisa ga manufofin mai amfani da matakin motsa jiki.  Bin diddigin shan ruwa: Tunatarwa mai wayo da bin diddigin burin yau da kullun don ruwa.  Binciken Ci gaba: Yanayin lafiya na mako-mako da na wata-wata tare da fahimtar AI.  Gamification: Bin diddigin streak, lambobi, da lada don ƙarfafa daidaito.  Bayani Daidaitawa: Daidaitawa bisa ga girgije na mai amfani bayanai a duk zaman. 2.3. Darussa da Halaye Mai amfani Masu amfani da yawa:  Masu sha'awar motsa jiki da mutanen da ke da masaniya game da lafiya.  Ƙwarewar wayar salula ta asali; fi son ƙaramin shigarwar hannu.  Samun damar shiga duk fasaloli (bin diddigin, shawarwari, da gamification). Masu amfani da Admin (Zaɓi, Tsarin Nan Gaba):  Sarrafa saitunan tsarin ko nazarin.  Bukatar ƙwarewar fasaha don samun damar baya. 2.4. Muhalli na Aiki  Na'urorin Wayar hannu: o Android (sigar 8.0 da sama).  Gaba: o Jetpack Compose (Kotlin) don amsawa UI.  Bayan Baya: o Firebase Firestore don adana bayanai na ainihin lokaci Bayanai.  Tsarin AI: o Food101 don gane abinci bisa hoto. o LLAMA don shawarwarin abinci bisa NLP. o Facebook Annabi don nazarin yanayin.  Kayan aiki:

translation.en: © MMH Test Plan and Test Cases: Test plan Objective: To verify that the developed software system meets all functional and non-functional requirements, ensuring correctness, reliability, usability, and performance. Scope: This testing covers all major modules of the system, including login, user management, course registration, result processing, notifications, and administrative controls. Testing Types: - Unit Testing – Verifies each function/module in isolation. - Integration Testing – Tests the flow of data between modules. - System Testing – Verifies the complete and integrated system. - Acceptance Testing – Validates the system against user requirements. - Usability Testing – Ensures the system is user-friendly. - Security Testing – Checks for vulnerabilities and unauthorized access. Tools Used: - Selenium (for automated testing) - Postman (for API testing) - JUnit / PyTest / Mocha (depending on development language) - Manual testing (for UI and end-user behavior) Test Environment: - Web Browser: Chrome, Firefox - OS: Windows 10, Linux (Ubuntu) - Server: Apache / Nginx - Database: MySQL / PostgreSQL
translation.ha: © Tsarin Gwaji na MMH da Lambobin Gwaji: Tsarin Gwaji Manufar: Don tabbatar da cewa tsarin  wanda aka haɓaka ya cika duk buƙatun aiki da waɗanda ba na aiki ba, tabbatar da daidaito, <TECH>aminci, amfani, da aiwatarwa. Faɗin: Wannan gwajin ya ƙunshi dukkan manyan sassan tsarin , gami da <TECH>login, gudanarwa na mai amfani, rajistar kwas, sarrafa sakamako, sanarwa, da kuma kula da gudanarwa. Nau'in Gwaji: - Gwajin Raka'a - Yana tabbatar da kowane aiki/module a ware. - Gwajin Haɗaka - Yana gwada kwararar bayanan  tsakanin kayayyaki. - Gwajin Tsarin - Yana tabbatar da cikakken tsarin  da aka haɗa. - Gwajin Karɓa - Yana Tabbatar da tsarin <TECH> akan buƙatun mai amfani. - Gwajin amfani - Yana Tabbatar da cewa tsarin  yana da sauƙin amfani da mai amfani. - Tsaro Gwaji - Duba raunin da kuma damar shiga ba tare da izini ba. Kayan aikin da aka yi amfani da su: - Selenium (don gwaji ta atomatik) - Postman (don gwajin API) - JUnit / PyTest / Mocha (ya danganta da yaren haɓakawa) - Gwaji da hannu (don halayen UI da mai amfani na ƙarshe</TECH>) Muhalli na Gwaji: - Mai Binciken Yanar Gizo: Chrome, Firefox - OS: Windows 10, Linux (Ubuntu) - Sabar: Apache / Nginx - Bayanan Bayanai: MySQL / PostgreSQL

translation.en: Product Functions The System Features section of this document describes the major functions that the HFR will be able to perform in detail. Here is a summary of them: • The system should allow a user to log in. • The system should allow a user to search for a facility • The system should allow a user to view facility statistics/summary. • The system should allow a user to download/export facility details. • The system should allow a user to view details about a facility. • The system should allow a user to see these facility details as visualized on a Google map. • The system should allow an admin to create a new user account. • The system should allow an admin to create user roles. • The system should allow an admin to add/activate/deactivate “lookup values” (explained later). • The system shall allow an authorized user to add/edit/activate/deactivate a new facility. • The system shall authorize a user to approve a facility. • The system shall allow a user to export facility details to an external system via an application programming interface (API). • The system shall allow a user to import facility details from an external system using an API. User Classes and Characteristics HFR Web User The web users will access the HFR open-source web portal (see the Glossary for an explanation of this term) to view and download facility information to guide them in their implementation of activities related to health interventions. HFR Administrative User The administrative user (“admin,” in the software) will use the admin dashboard to control the system settings and conduct user management, which covers user creation, user role management, system resource management, and other related system settings. User Levels Level 0: This category of users shall have the right to create, update, and submit facility deletion requests to list facilities in the HFR. Level 1 (Verify): This category of users shall verify and approve/reject all requests initiated by users at Level 0. Level 2 (Validate): This category of users shall validate and approve/reject all verifications done by users in Level 1. Level 3 (Publish): This category of users shall approve/reject all requests validated by users at Level 2. The final execution of the requested action shall be done by users at Level 3. 10 Implementing Nigeria’s MFL: Software Requirements Specifications

translation.en: Introduction Purpose: This document is the complete structure of online shopping. This document will serve as a guide for developers and the customers Online shopping is one of the most usable app by everyone in the world. It acts as a major part in day to day life. Nowadays people get everything by using internet in their places to buy. Technology was developed to buy medicines, fruits, vegetables, etc in online shopping. Customers to browse through the shop and buy them online without having to visit the shop physically using online shopping buyers and retailers are saving time. Scope: Sellers can deal in a wide range of products. Even small business can increase their sales and grow by selling online. Definition: OS Online shopping SRS Software requirement specification Stakeholder Customer Overview: This system will use for everyone it does not acquire any educational level, experience or technical ethics, People can buy their product in their comfortable places and their free home without going to shop manually. In online shopping (OS) there are more benefits for users like offers, deals, return policy, etc. By using online shopping many of them will get job for packing, delivery, etc.
translation.ha: Manufar Gabatarwa: Wannan takarda ita ce cikakken tsarin siyayya ta yanar gizo. Wannan takarda za ta zama jagora ga masu haɓakawa da abokan ciniki Siyayya ta yanar gizo tana ɗaya daga cikin manhajojin da kowa zai iya amfani da su a duniya. Tana aiki a matsayin babban ɓangare na rayuwar yau da kullun. A zamanin yau mutane suna samun komai ta hanyar amfani da intanet a wuraren da suke siya. An ƙirƙiri fasaha don siyan magunguna, 'ya'yan itatuwa, kayan lambu, da sauransu a siyayya ta yanar gizo. Abokan ciniki don bincika shagon su siya ta yanar gizo ba tare da ziyartar shagon ta hanyar amfani da masu siye da dillalai ta yanar gizo suna adana lokaci ba. Iyaka: Masu siyarwa za su iya yin ciniki a cikin kayayyaki iri-iri. Ko da ƙananan kasuwanci za su iya ƙara tallace-tallace da haɓaka ta hanyar siyarwa ta yanar gizo. Ma'ana: OS Siyayya ta yanar gizo Software SRS buƙata ƙayyadaddun Mai ruwa da tsaki Bayanin Abokin Ciniki: Wannan tsarin  zai yi amfani da shi ga kowa ba tare da samun kowane matakin ilimi, gogewa ko ɗabi'ar fasaha ba, Mutane za su iya siyan samfurin su a wuraren da suke jin daɗi da kuma gidansu kyauta ba tare da zuwa siyayya da hannu ba. A cikin siyayya ta yanar gizo (OS) akwai ƙarin fa'idodi ga masu amfani kamar tayi, tayi, manufofin dawowa, da sauransu. Ta hanyar amfani da siyayya ta yanar gizo da yawa daga cikinsu za su sami aiki don tattarawa, isarwa, da sauransu.

translation.en: LEAK OCCLUSION : Alarm triggering when the leak is not sufficient to prevent rebreathing in leak configuration. LEVEL OF PRIORITY : Way to define the alarms criticism and the corresponding sound and visual aspects. LIMIT SPEED : Maximum turbine speed in case of patient disconnection. LINE CURVE : Linear curve type. LONG PRESS : Key press during more than 3 s. LOOPS : Loop curves Flow=f(Volume) and Pressure=f(Volume) displayed in the WAVEFORM MENU. LOOSE FLASH POINTER FAULT : Alarm triggering when the flash memory pointer is lost (means not able to store logs). LOOSING SETTINGS : Event associated to CHECK SETTINGS alarm when LANGUAGE, SCREEN SAVER or SERIAL PORT RATE setting is lost. LOW BATTERY : LOW BATTERY alarm occurring when the battery autonomy is less than minimum required. LOW BATTERY : Flag from supply management board to inform about the presence of a LOW BATTERY alarm. LOW BUZZER BATTERY : Alarm triggering when the buzzer battery is too low to provide 2 minutes of involuntary stop alarm. LOW FIO2 : Setting and corresponding alarm triggering when the FIO2 is lower than the setting. LOW PIP : Low pressure limit to trigger a DISCONNECTION alarm. LOW PRESSURE LEAK : Alarm triggering in low pressure or patient disconnection conditions. LOW PRIORITY : Low priority alarm level. LOW SUPPLY OFFSET : BATTERY LEVEL lower offset during stand-by LOW VENTILATION SUPPLY OFFSET : BATTERY LEVEL lower offset during ventilation LOW VM : Alarm occurring when the VM does not reach the LOW VM limit. LOW VTE : Alarm occurring when the VTE does not reach the LOW VTE limit. LOW VTI : Alarm occurring when the VTI does not reach the LOW VTI limit. LXxxxxxx : Software version basis. (the xxxxxxx are replaced by numbers according to the software evolutions). LP : Low Priority alarm level. MACHINE HOURS : Ventilation counter of the device displayed in MAINTENANCE MENU. MAINTENANCE MENU : Menu displaying technical information and providing calibration functions. MAP : Mean Airway Pressure : Average pressure during a ventilation cycle. MAX FALL TIME : Maximum delay to reach the set PEEP. MAX FLOW : Maximum Scale value for the flow curve. MAX FLOW SET POINT : Starting flow set point of D RAMP flow control in VOL A/C mode MAX PRESSURE : Maximum Scale value for the pressure curve. MAX SPEED : Maximum turbine speed consign in MAINTENANCE MENU. MAX TIME : Maximum Time scale value for the PRESS + FLOW curves. MAX VT : Maximum Vt scale value for LOOPS curves. MEAN_INSP_VALVE_CURRENT: average current of the exhalation control valve during inspiration MEAN VENTILATION : Average ventilation time per day since the last PATIENT COUNTER reset. MED SUPPLY OFFSET : BATTERY LEVEL medium offset during stand-by MED VENTILATION SUPPLY OFFSET : BATTERY LEVEL medium offset during ventilation MEDIUM PRIORITY : Medium priority alarm level. MEDIUM PRIORITY LED : Medium priority alarm led for low and medium priority alarms. MIN EXH DELAY : Minimum exhalation time before allowing the patient INSPIRATORY TRIGGER COVIDIEN TITLE: DOCUMENT NUMBER REV 6135 Gunbarrel Avenue CPU Software Requirements 10037185 AB Boulder, CO 80301 Specification, PB560 SHEET 9 of 204 PROPRIETARY & FOR This document may not be copied, disclosed, or used in whole or in part without the consent of COVIDIEN. © 2014 COVIDIEN All Rights Reserved.

ƘARARRAR BATIRI: Ƙararrawa ta ƙasa da batir yana faruwa lokacin da ikon mallakar batir ya ƙasa da mafi ƙarancin da ake buƙata. BATARI MAI ƘARAMIN VTE: Ƙararrawa tana faruwa lokacin da VTE bai kai iyakar LOW VTE ba. Ƙaramin VTI: Ƙararrawa tana faruwa lokacin da VTI bai kai iyakar ƙarancin VTI ba. LXxxxxxx: Tushen sigar software. (an maye gurbin xxxxxxxx da lambobi bisa ga juyin halittar software). LP: Ƙaramin Fifiko matakin ƙararrawa. LOKUTTAN INJI: Ana nuna na'urar a cikin MENU NA GYARA. MENU NA GYARA: Menu yana nuna bayanan fasaha na <FASAHA></TECH> da kuma samar da ayyukan daidaitawa. TASWIFI: Matsakaicin Matsi na Iska: Matsakaicin matsin lamba yayin zagayowar iska. MATSAYIN LOKACIN FADA: Matsakaicin jinkiri don isa ga saitin PEEP. MATSAYIN FADA: Matsakaicin ƙimar sikelin don lanƙwasa kwarara. MATSAYIN FADA MAI GYARA: Wurin farawa na sarrafa kwararar D RAMP a cikin yanayin VOL A/C MAFI KYAU MAFI KYAU: Matsakaicin ƙimar sikelin don lanƙwasa matsin lamba. MATSAYIN SAURI MAFI KYAU: Matsakaicin saurin turbine a cikin MENU NA GYARA. MATSAYIN LOKACIN: Matsakaicin ƙimar sikelin lokaci don lanƙwasa PRESS + FLOW. MAX VT: Matsakaicin ƙimar sikelin Vt don lanƙwasa masu lanƙwasa. MEAN_INSP_VALVE_CURRENT: matsakaicin wutar lantarki na bawul ɗin sarrafa shaƙa yayin wahayi MA'ANA SANARWA: Matsakaicin lokacin iska a kowace rana tun lokacin sake saita KIRAN MAI LAFIYA na ƙarshe. MED OFFSET SUPPLY: MATSAYIN BATIR matsakaicin daidaitawa yayin jiran aiki MED EVILATION SUPPLY OFFSET: MATSAYIN BATIR matsakaicin daidaitawa yayin iska FIFIKO: Matsakaicin matakin ƙararrawa fifiko. MATSAKACI FIFIKO LED: Matsakaicin fifiko ƙararrawa don ƙararrawa fifiko ƙasa da matsakaici. translation.en: PTAASS - Software Requirement Specification v1.0 - POST-1. Success: The system saves a new version of the personality test & shows the success message. - POST-2. Fail: The system shows the error message. Main Success Scenario: Step Actor Action System Response 1 In “View personality test” page, actor The system shows 2 options: chooses the personality test. - Edit personality test - View feedback 2 Actor clicks “Edit” button. The system shows a personality test’s form including fields: - Personality test’s name: text input, required, max limit length is 200 - Personality test’s description: text input, max limit length is 500 - Picture: image input, less than 10MB 3 Actor changes fields in the form. [Exception 1] 4 Actor clicks “Add result”. The system shows a personality result’s form including fields: - Personality type’s name: text input, required, max limit length 200 - Picture: image input, less than 10MB - Personality type’s general description: text input, required, minimum limit length 500 - Personality type’s strength & weakness: text input - Personality type’s suggested occupations: multiple choice select, required, options: software engineering, analysts, artist, etc 5 Actor changes fields in the form. [Exception 2, 3, 4] 6 Repeat 3 & 4 7 Actor clicks “Add question” button. The system shows a personality test’s question form including fields: - Question: text input, required - Number of answers that the question requires: number input, required, min value is 1, default is 1 - 4 default answer forms including: + Answer: text input, required, max length 500 06be-BM/PM/HDCV/FSOFT v1/1 58/63

translation.en: 1. Introduction 1.1. Purpose The purpose of the document is to create a detailed description on the various functional and non-functional requirements for the web application. This will enable the people involved understand and explain the features of the web application. In addition, the document presents the purpose of an online web application that manages webinar events online in which the users, especially students, and organizers can use to engage, promote, and participate to. The creation of such web application provides convenience and easiness towards the users to have access and exposure to such events online and provide them with an opportunity to participate to it. Not only that, but it will also enable organizers to promote their online events in a wider audience without the unrelated noise from posts seen in social media platforms. With this document, it will be easier and more convenient to determine and understand the features, functionalities, and requirements needed to develop the web application. 1.2. Intended Audience The intended audience for this system is individuals/teams who are included in the planning and development process of the web application such as project managers, developers, and testers. In addition, the instructors of CMSC 128 lab along with the students who are under the course subject are also the intended audience for this document. 1.3. Intended Use The intended use for this document is to guide and inform the people involved in the development phase of the web application of the features and requirements of the web application. On the other hand, the intended use for the web application is for users, who are students and those who are interested to participate to webinars and online events they’re interested in, to find and participate on those events with convenience and ease. In addition, the intended use for the organizations is to promote and post their online events for it to reach a wider audience and increase their online engagement through the platform. Page | 1
translation.ha: 1. Gabatarwa 1.1. Manufa Manufar takardar ita ce ƙirƙirar cikakken bayani kan buƙatun aiki da waɗanda ba su da amfani ga aikace-aikacen yanar gizo na . Wannan zai ba wa mutanen da abin ya shafa damar fahimta da kuma bayyana fasalulluka na aikace-aikacen yanar gizo na . Bugu da ƙari, takardar ta gabatar da manufar aikace-aikacen yanar gizo na  wanda ke sarrafa abubuwan da suka faru a yanar gizo na yanar gizo inda masu amfani, musamman ɗalibai, da masu shirya za su iya amfani da su don shiga, tallatawa, da shiga ciki. Ƙirƙirar irin wannan aikace-aikacen yanar gizo na  yana ba da sauƙi da sauƙi ga masu amfani don samun damar shiga da fallasa irin waɗannan abubuwan a yanar gizo da kuma ba su damar shiga ciki. Ba wai kawai ba, har ma zai ba masu shirya shirye-shirye damar tallata abubuwan da suka faru a yanar gizo a cikin masu sauraro da yawa ba tare da hayaniya da ba ta da alaƙa daga rubuce-rubucen da aka gani a dandamalin kafofin watsa labarun ba. Tare da wannan takarda, zai fi sauƙi kuma mafi sauƙi don tantancewa da fahimtar fasalulluka, ayyuka, da buƙatun da ake buƙata don haɓaka aikace-aikacen yanar gizo na . 1.2. Masu Sauraro da aka Niyya Masu sauraron wannan tsarin  su ne mutane/ƙungiyoyi waɗanda aka haɗa a cikin tsarin tsarawa da haɓaka aikace-aikacen yanar gizo  kamar manajojin ayyuka, masu haɓakawa, da masu gwaji. Bugu da ƙari, malaman dakin gwaje-gwaje na CMSC 128 tare da ɗaliban da ke ƙarƙashin darasin su ne kuma masu sauraron da aka niyya don wannan takarda. 1.3. Amfani da aka Niyya Amfani da aka niyya don wannan takarda shine don jagorantar da kuma sanar da mutanen da ke cikin matakin haɓaka aikace-aikacen yanar gizo  game da fasaloli da buƙatun aikace-aikacen yanar gizo . A gefe guda kuma, amfani da aka niyya don aikace-aikacen yanar gizo  shine ga masu amfani, waɗanda ɗalibai ne da waɗanda ke da sha'awar shiga cikin shirye-shiryen yanar gizo da abubuwan da ke faruwa akan layi da suke sha'awar, don nemo da shiga cikin waɗannan abubuwan cikin sauƙi da sauƙi. Bugu da ƙari, amfani da aka yi niyya ga ƙungiyoyi shine don tallatawa da buga abubuwan da suka faru akan layi don isa ga masu sauraro da yawa da kuma ƙara yawan hulɗarsu ta yanar gizo ta hanyar dandamali. Supporting Material: -- ⌋( RS_BRF_01768,RS_BRF_01136) 4.1.4.4 Normal Operation 4.1.4.4.1 [SRS_Lin_01582] The bus transceiver driver API shall be synchronous. ⌈ Type: Valid Description: The bus transceiver driver API shall execute the requested action immediately and shall deliver the result state immediately to the caller. This will ease up the implementation of wakeup and sleep concepts within the AUTOSAR BSW stack Rationale: Better usage of transceiver functionality in the complex AUTOSAR BSW environment. Use Case: Atomic transition to other operation mode; easier and better abstraction for upper layers like the ECU state manager or ComManager. Improved testability compared to asynchronous handling. Dependencies: ECU state manager, NM. SPAL in case a transceiver is connected via SPI Supporting Material: -- ⌋( RS_BRF_01768) 4.1.4.4.2 [SRS_Lin_01584] The bus transceiver driver shall support an API to send the addressed transceiver into its Standby mode. ⌈ Type: Valid Description: Many transceivers support the transition to the Sleep mode only via the transition to Standby mode. In addition, some power concepts have the need to set the transceiver to Standby only instead of Sleep mode. Not all transceivers will support such a state. If this is true for a given device, the driver shall confirm the state transition with success Rationale: Implementation of ECU low power modes with wakeup via bus and internal. Use Case: The upper service layers agreed together with other nodes to set the bus into the sleep mode. The transceiver shall be switched now to a state where the wakeup via bus is supported and the power consumption is as low as possible for the current state of the ECU. Dependencies: [SRS_Lin_01585] Supporting Material: -- ⌋( RS_BRF_01768, RS_BRF_01104) 4.1.4.4.3 [SRS_Lin_01585] The bus transceiver driver shall support an API to send the addressed transceiver into its Sleep mode. ⌈ Type: Valid Description: The transition to sleep mode will be requested with this API. Not all transceivers will support such a state. If this is true for a given device, the drive shall confirm the state transition with success Rationale: Implementation of ECU low power modes with wakeup via bus and internal. 25 of 34 Document ID 042: AUTOSAR_SRS_LIN - AUTOSAR -

translation.en: 627 Smruti R. Sarangi Let us next look at the space of decisions that can be taken at a much lower level – at the level of functional units. Clock Gating Clockgatingisasimpletechniquewherewesimplydisabletheclockofafunctionalunit(seeFigure11.8) that is not expected to be used in the near future. Here, we can either follow a deterministic policy or a non-deterministic policy. In the first case, we know for sure that a given functional unit is not going to be used. For example, if we see a divide instruction we can be very sure that the functional unit for subtraction is not going to be used till we execute one more instruction. In this case, we can confidently gate the clock of the subtract unit. However, in some cases we might not be very sure (non-deterministic). In such cases it is necessary to design a predictor, which can predict if a functional unit is expected to be used in the near future or not. If it predicts that a functional unit will remain idle then its clock can be gated. By gating the clock we are not allowing the latches that feed data to the functional unit to change their values. This meansthattherewillbenovoltagetransitionsintheinputsofthefunctionalunitandthustherewillbe no current flow or resultant dynamic power dissipation. Even if the inputs remain the same, then also there is a benefit because the clock is routed to all the latches in a circuit, and we need to periodically charge and discharge the clock inputs of the latches. This is also avoided. Functional unit Clk Clk Clk input gate Figure 11.8: A simple clock gating circuit There are different micro-architectural techniques to find out when a unit is going to be used or not. We can embed a small counter within a unit. If the unit is idle, the counter starts counting down to 0. Once it reaches 0, we can gate the clock of the associated functional unit. We can also find the usage of functional units in the select stage, where we know which execution units are not going to be used. The clocks of the unused functional units can be gated. Similarly, after decoding instructions we know which parts of the rename and dependence check logic will be used. The remaining parts can also be clock-gated. For the caches, we can predict cache activity and clock gate the decoders. The primary problem with clock gating is that it makes the circuit complicated. For example, we need to be very careful with regard to when we gate the clock. If the value of the clock is being set to 0 when its value is 1, we are introducing a clock transition. The rest of the circuit will perceive a negative edge prematurely. No correctness problem should be created by this. Secondly, verifying the design becomes more complex, because it is possible that when an input arrives at a functional unit, its clock is gated. We need to wait till the unit is enabled. This can lead to many unforeseen errors. To avoid such situations many processors only opt for deterministic clock gating where no such delays are introduced.
translation.ha: 627 Smruti R. Sarangi Bari mu sake duba sararin yanke shawara da za a iya ɗauka a matakin ƙasa - a matakin raka'o'in aiki. Ƙofar Agogon ... Ta hanyar yin amfani da agogon da ke ba da damar makullan da ke ciyar da Bayanai zuwa na'urar aiki su canza ƙimarsu. Wannan yana nufin cewa za a sami canjin wutar lantarki a cikin shigarwar, na'urar aiki, don haka babu kwararar wutar lantarki ko raguwar wutar lantarki mai ƙarfi. Ko da shigarwar ta kasance iri ɗaya, to akwai fa'ida saboda ana tura agogon zuwa duk makullan a cikin da'ira, kuma muna buƙatar caji lokaci-lokaci da kuma fitar da shigarwar agogo na makullan. Haka kuma ana guje wa wannan. Na'urar aiki Clk Clk Clk Ƙofar shigarwa Hoto na 11.8: Da'irar gate na agogo mai sauƙi Akwai dabarun gine-gine daban-daban don gano lokacin da za a yi amfani da na'urar ko a'a. Za mu iya saka ƙaramin counter a cikin na'ura. Idan na'urar ba ta aiki, mai ƙidayar yana fara ƙidaya zuwa 0. Da zarar ya kai 0, za mu iya shiga agogon na'urar aiki mai alaƙa. Haka kuma za mu iya samun amfani da na'urorin aiki a matakin da aka zaɓa, inda muka san waɗanne na'urorin aiwatarwa ba za a yi amfani da su ba. Ana iya amfani da agogon na'urorin aiki marasa amfani da aka yi amfani da su a ƙofa. Hakazalika, bayan umarnin dikodi, mun san waɗanne sassa na ma'anar sake suna da kuma binciken dogaro za a yi amfani da su. Sauran sassan kuma za a iya amfani da su a ƙofa. Ga caches, za mu iya annabta ayyukan cache da decoders na ƙofa. Babbar matsalar da ke tattare da ƙofa ita ce tana sa da'irar ta yi rikitarwa. Misali, muna buƙatar yin taka tsantsan game da lokacin da muka ƙofa agogon. Idan ana saita ƙimar agogon zuwa 0 lokacin da ƙimarsa ta kasance 1, muna gabatar da canjin agogo. Sauran da'irar za ta ga gefen mara kyau da wuri. Babu wata matsala ta daidaito bai kamata ta haifar da wannan ba. Na biyu, tabbatar da ƙirar ta zama mafi rikitarwa, saboda yana yiwuwa lokacin da shigarwa ta isa ga na'urar aiki, agogon sa yana da ƙofa. Muna buƙatar jira har sai an kunna na'urar. Wannan na iya haifar da kurakurai da yawa da ba a zata ba. Don guje wa irin waɗannan yanayi, masu sarrafawa da yawa suna zaɓar ƙofa ta agogo mai ƙayyade inda ba a gabatar da irin wannan jinkiri ba.
