translation.en: 11 Power and Temperature In the last two parts of the book we have studied the design of a modern out-of-order processor, on- chip network, and memory system in detail. We started with a simple 5-stage in-order processor, and increased its performance several times by using sophisticated optimizations to enhance all aspects of the design. The natural question that we need to ask now is, “Are there any limits to doing this?” If there were indeed no limits, then we can keep on proposing newer and better optimizations, and keep on increasing the performance. However, nature has its way of applying brakes. For at least the last 15 years, the single largest factor that has kept processors from scaling in terms of additional features and complexity is the issue of high power consumption and consequent temperature rise. Both these issues are connected, and have effectively stymied many design features. Let us motivate the reader by providing some facts that indicate the extent of the problem. While running a floating point application the die temperature of a CPU exceeds 100◦C, which is enough to boil a cup of water, or fry an egg. If the CPU remains at this temperature long enough, then the wires and transistors can get seriously damaged. As we shall see in Chapter 12, the probability of failure is an exponential function of the die temperature. The problem of high temperature not only bedevils large processors that are used in desktops and servers, it is also important for mobile phones. Imaging using a mobile phone that feels like a warm face pack in a hot and humid climate. A consistently high temperature increases the probability of the battery of the mobile phone exploding! Let us now look at energy/power consumption. We all have been in situations, where we just have 3% of the total battery charge left in our phones, and we have to either finish a call, or go back home using Google MapsTM, and there is no charger in sight. In such cases, one would wish that she had a phonethatconsumedverylittleenergysuchthatshecouldfinishallherworkwiththeremainingenergy in the battery. Nobody likes to charge their phones or laptops very frequently. In the case oflarge server processors, wemight bemisled tobelieve thattemperature riseand power consumptionarenotanissuebecausetheserversareisolatedinaserverroomoradatacenter. Sincewe arenotphysicallypresentinthebuilding, temperatureriseisnotanissue, andsincethereisnobattery, energy usage is also not a concern. However, this is not correct. The energy required to maintain the optimal temperature in a large data center is roughly 20-40% of the total energy consumption. For a large corporation such as Facebook(cid:13)R or Google(cid:13)R this can translate to billions of dollars. Even for a much smaller setup, the electricity bill is a large part of the operating expenditure of a data center, and thus reducing the energy consumption by even 10% is significant. Consider the fact that in 2017, data centers in the US consumed 90 billion units (kilowatt-hours) of energy, and globally 3% of the energy 607
translation.ha: 11 Ƙarfi da Zafin Jiki A cikin sassa biyu na ƙarshe na littafin, mun yi nazarin ƙirar na'urar sarrafawa ta zamani da ba ta aiki, hanyar sadarwa ta kan-chip, da tsarin ƙwaƙwalwar ajiya  dalla-dalla. Mun fara da na'urar sarrafawa mai sauƙi mai matakai 5, kuma mun ƙara aikin  sau da yawa ta hanyar amfani da ingantattun gyare-gyare don haɓaka dukkan fannoni na ƙira. Tambayar da muke buƙatar yi yanzu ita ce, "Akwai wasu iyakoki ga yin wannan?" Idan babu iyaka, to za mu iya ci gaba da ba da shawarar sabbin gyare-gyare da mafi kyau, da kuma ci gaba da ƙara aikin . Duk da haka, yanayi yana da hanyarsa ta amfani da birki. Aƙalla shekaru 15 da suka gabata, babban abin da ya hana masu sarrafawa girma dangane da ƙarin fasali da sarkakiya shine batun yawan amfani da wutar lantarki da hauhawar zafin jiki. Duk waɗannan batutuwa biyu suna da alaƙa, kuma sun gurgunta fasalulluka da yawa na ƙira. Bari mu ƙarfafa mai karatu ta hanyar samar da wasu bayanai waɗanda ke nuna girman matsalar. Yayin da ake gudanar da aikace-aikacen aiki zafin jikin CPU ya wuce 100◦C, wanda ya isa ya tafasa kofi ɗaya na ruwa, ko soya ƙwai. Idan CPU ɗin ya daɗe a wannan zafin, to wayoyin da transistors na iya lalacewa sosai. Kamar yadda muka gani a Babi na 12, yuwuwar lalacewa aiki ne mai mahimmanci na zafin jikin. Matsalar zafin jiki mai yawa ba wai kawai bedevils manyan na'urori masu sarrafawa waɗanda ake amfani da su a cikin tebur da sabar ba, har ma yana da mahimmanci ga wayoyin hannu. Hoto ta amfani da wayar hannu wacce ke jin kamar fakitin fuska mai ɗumi a cikin yanayi mai zafi da danshi. Zafin jiki mai yawa akai-akai yana ƙara yiwuwar fashewar batirin wayar hannu! Bari mu kalli amfani da makamashi/ƙarfin lantarki. Duk mun kasance a cikin yanayi, inda muke da kashi 3% na jimlar cajin baturi a wayoyinmu, kuma dole ne mu gama kira, ko mu koma gida ta amfani da Google MapsTM, kuma babu caja a gani. A irin waɗannan yanayi, mutum zai yi fatan samun wayar da ke cinye ƙaramin kuzari wanda zai iya gama aikinta da sauran kuzarin da ke cikin batirin. Babu wanda yake son yin caji akai-akai na wayoyinsa ko kwamfutar tafi-da-gidanka. A cikin manyan na'urori masu sarrafawa na , za mu iya yin imani da cewa hauhawar zafin jiki da amfani da wutar lantarki ba matsala ba ne saboda sabar suna keɓewa a cikin ɗakin uwar garken ko cibiyar bayanai. Tunda ba mu cikin ginin a zahiri, hauhawar zafin jiki ba matsala ba ce, kuma tunda babu batirin, amfani da makamashi shi ma ba abin damuwa ba ne. Duk da haka, wannan ba daidai ba ne. Ƙarfin da ake buƙata don kula da mafi kyawun zafin jiki a cikin babban cibiyar <TECH>data shine kusan kashi 20-40% na jimlar amfani da makamashi. Ga babban kamfani kamar Facebook (cid:13)R ko Google (cid:13)R wannan na iya zama biliyoyin daloli. Ko da ga ƙaramin saiti, kuɗin wutar lantarki babban ɓangare ne na kashe kuɗin aiki na cibiyar Bayanai, don haka rage yawan amfani da makamashi da ko da kashi 10% yana da mahimmanci. Ka yi la'akari da gaskiyar cewa a cikin 2017, cibiyoyin bayanai na <TECH> a Amurka sun cinye raka'a biliyan 90 (awanni kilowatt) na makamashi, kuma a duk duniya kashi 3% na makamashi 607

translation.en: Home Cook The home chefs are passionate cooks with diverse culinary preferences who are both creative and time-conscious. They prioritize health and nutrition, while also being technologically savvy, These individuals actively engage with RMS, utilizing features that allow them to edit, add, and categorize recipes according to their preferences. They also enjoy sharing their culinary creations and engaging with fellow cooking enthusiasts. Chef Professional chefs, distinguished by their culinary expertise, (favored) excel in customizing recipes to meet diverse dietary goals and preferences. They are also responsible for conducting precise nutritional analyses. Their proficiency in recipe customization, nutritional analysis, and dietary alignment makes professional chefs a favored user class, vital in refining and advancing recipe management systems. Food Food bloggers leverage social media and digital platforms to Bloggers seamlessly integrate photos and videos, creating immersive experiences for their audience. They actively engage in recipe sharing to inspire and connect with fellow food enthusiasts. 2.3 Operating Environment OE-1: The RME shall operate with smart phones and tablets running Android OS versions 5.0 and later and iPhones and iPads running iOS versions 9 and later. 2.4 Design and implementation constraints CO-1: The development team must use Git as the version control system for managing codebase changes and collaboration. CO-2: The system must comply with the organization's security policies and standards, including encryption of sensitive data and secure authentication mechanisms. CO-3: The system architecture must be designed to scale horizontally to accommodate increasing user demand and data volume and ensuring smooth performance. 5
translation.ha: Mai Girki a Gida Masu dafa abinci a gida masu sha'awar girke-girke ne masu son abinci iri-iri waɗanda suke da kirkire-kirkire da kuma kula da lokaci. Suna fifita lafiya da abinci mai gina jiki, yayin da suke da ƙwarewa a fasaha. Waɗannan mutane suna hulɗa da RMS sosai, suna amfani da fasaloli waɗanda ke ba su damar gyarawa, ƙarawa, da rarraba girke-girke bisa ga abin da suke so. Hakanan suna jin daɗin raba abubuwan da suka ƙirƙira na dafa abinci da kuma hulɗa da abokan sha'awar dafa abinci. Masu dafa abinci ƙwararru, waɗanda aka bambanta su da ƙwarewar dafa abinci, (sun fi so) sun yi fice wajen keɓance girke-girke don cimma burin abinci da abubuwan da ake so daban-daban. Hakanan suna da alhakin gudanar da ingantaccen nazarin abinci mai gina jiki. Ƙwarewarsu a cikin keɓance girke-girke, nazarin abinci mai gina jiki, da daidaita abinci yana sa ƙwararrun masu dafa abinci su zama aji na mai amfani, mai mahimmanci a cikin tsaftacewa da haɓaka tsarin sarrafa girke-girke. Masu rubutun ra'ayin yanar gizo na Abinci Mai Gina Jiki suna amfani da kafofin watsa labarun zamantakewa da dandamali na dijital don masu rubutun ra'ayin yanar gizo suna haɗa hotuna da bidiyo ba tare da matsala ba, suna ƙirƙirar abubuwan da suka dace ga masu sauraronsu. Suna shiga cikin raba girke-girke don wahayi da haɗi tare da sauran masu sha'awar abinci. 2.3 Muhalli na Aiki OE-1: RME za ta yi aiki da wayoyin komai da ruwanka da allunan hannu da ke aiki da nau'ikan <TECH>Android OS 5.0 da kuma daga baya da iPhones da iPads da ke aiki da nau'ikan iOS 9 da kuma daga baya. 2.4 Takaitawar ƙira da aiwatarwa CO-1: Ƙungiyar haɓakawa za ta yi amfani da Git a matsayin tsarin sarrafa sigar <TECH> don sarrafa canje-canje da haɗin gwiwa a tushen lambar. CO-2: Tsarin  za ta yi aiki da manufofi da ƙa'idodin <TECH>tsaro na ƙungiyar, gami da ɓoye bayanan  masu mahimmanci da hanyoyin tabbatarwa masu aminci. CO-3: Tsarin tsarin za ta yi aiki a kwance don daidaita buƙatun <TECH>mai amfani da ƙarar Bayanai da kuma tabbatar da aiki mai kyau</TECH>. 5

translation.en: The AI-Powered Health and Fitness Tracker is a standalone Android application with cloud- based data storage via Firebase Firestore. It integrates with the Edamam Nutrition API for food data and uses AI models (Food101, LLAMA 3, and Facebook Prophet) for meal recognition and recommendations. Future integrations with wearables are planned but excluded from the initial scope. The app aims to reduce manual input compared to competitors by leveraging AI automation.
translation.ha: AI-Powered Health and Fitness Tracker aikace-aikacen Android  ne kawai tare da ajiyar bayanai na  ta hanyar Firebase Firestore. Yana haɗawa da Edamam Nutrition API don bayanai na abinci  kuma yana amfani da samfuran AI (Food101, LLAMA 3, da Facebook Prophet) don gane abinci da shawarwari. An tsara haɗin gwiwa na gaba tare da kayan sawa amma an cire su daga farkon. Manhajar tana da nufin rage shigarwar hannu idan aka kwatanta da masu fafatawa ta hanyar amfani da atomatik na AI.

translation.en: Smruti R. Sarangi 488 /* address of balance is in r0 the additional amount is in r1 */ .start: ld r2, 0[r0] /* r2 contains the balance */ add r3, r2, r1 /* r3 contains the final balance*/ CAS r4, r3, r2, 0[r0] /* if (r2 == 0[r0]) 0[r0] = r3*/ cmp r4, 0 /* test the result */ beq .start /* retry if the CAS fails */ In this case, we do not use locks. We repeatedly invoke the CAS instruction to set the value of the variable balance. If the CAS fails, then it means that some other thread has succeeded in updating balance, and we try again. In this case starvation is possible; however, this implementation is more efficient. If the lock is free, we need 5 instructions to finish the operation using the lock-free algorithm. Whereas in the implementation using locks, we require 5 instructions for the lock, 3 instructions for the unlock, 3 instructions for updating the balance, and 2 function calls. Wait-free Algorithms Lock-free algorithms are typically much faster than their lock based counterparts for implementing con- current data structures. However, they have the problem of starvation. We can use wait-free algorithms thatadditionallyguaranteethateveryoperationcompletesinfinitetime. Wait-freealgorithmsaremore complicated than their lock-free counterparts, and on an average are slower. They work on the principle of helping. If any thread is not able to complete its operations, then other threads help it complete its operation. This ensures that there is no starvation. Definition 81 • A lock-free algorithm does not use locks. With such algorithms we can have starvation where a given thread may never complete its operation because other threads successfully complete their operations. • Await-freealgorithmprovidesmoreguarantees. Itguaranteesthatagiventhreadwillcomplete its operation within a finite or bounded number of internal steps. Consensus Numbers and the Power of Atomic Operations Definition 82 The consensus problem is as follows. Let us assume that we have n threads. Each thread proposes a value. Ultimately all the threads choose a value that is one among the set of proposed values. The consensus problem is a very basic problem in concurrent systems. Its definition for an n-thread system is as follows. Let each thread propose a value. Eventually, all the threads need to agree on a single value that is one among the proposed values. It can be shown that a lot of real world problems
translation.ha: Smruti R. Sarangi 488 /* adireshin ma'auni yana cikin r0 ƙarin adadin yana cikin r1 */ .start: ld r2, 0[r0] /* r2 ya ƙunshi ma'auni */ ƙara r3, r2, r1 /* r3 ya ƙunshi ma'auni na ƙarshe*/ CAS r4, r3, r2, 0[r0] /* idan (r2 == 0[r0]) 0[r0] = r3*/ cmp r4, 0 /* gwada sakamakon */ beq .start /* sake gwadawa idan CAS ta gaza */ A wannan yanayin, ba ma amfani da makullai. Muna kiran umarnin CAS akai-akai don saita ƙimar ma'aunin canji. Idan CAS ta gaza, to yana nufin cewa wani zaren ya yi nasarar sabunta ma'auni, kuma muna sake gwadawa. A wannan yanayin yunwa tana yiwuwa; duk da haka, wannan aiwatarwa ya fi inganci. Idan makullin kyauta ne, muna buƙatar umarni 5 don kammala aikin ta amfani da algorithm mara kullewa. Yayin da a cikin aiwatarwa ta amfani da makullai, muna buƙatar umarni 5 don makullin, umarni 3 don buɗewa, umarni 3 don sabunta ma'auni, da kuma kiran aiki 2. Algorithms marasa jira Algorithms marasa kulle yawanci suna da sauri fiye da takwarorinsu na tushen makullin don aiwatar da tsarin Bayanai na yau da kullun. Duk da haka, suna da matsalar yunwa. Za mu iya amfani da algorithms marasa jira waɗanda ke tabbatar da cewa kowane aiki yana kammalawa cikin lokaci mara iyaka. Algorithms marasa jira sun fi rikitarwa fiye da takwarorinsu marasa kullewa, kuma a matsakaici suna da jinkiri. Suna aiki akan ƙa'idar taimakawa. Idan wani zaren bai sami damar kammala ayyukansa ba, to sauran zaren suna taimaka masa kammala aikinsa. Wannan yana tabbatar da cewa babu yunwa. Ma'ana 81 • Algorithms marasa kullewa ba ya amfani da makullai. Tare da irin waɗannan algorithms za mu iya samun yunwa inda zaren ba zai iya ba zai taɓa kammala aikinsa ba saboda wasu zaren sun kammala ayyukansu cikin nasara. • Algorithms marasa jira suna ba da garantin ƙari. Yana tabbatar da cewa zaren da aka given zai kammala aikinsa cikin iyaka ko iyaka na matakai na ciki. Lambobin Yarjejeniya da Ƙarfin Ayyukan Atomic Ma'anar 82 Matsalar yarjejeniya ita ce kamar haka. Bari mu ɗauka cewa muna da zaren n. Kowane zaren yana gabatar da ƙima. A ƙarshe duk zaren suna zaɓar ƙima wanda yake ɗaya daga cikin jerin ƙimomin da aka gabatar. Matsalar yarjejeniya matsala ce mai sauƙi a cikin tsarin lokaci guda. Ma'anarta ga tsarin n-tech <TECH> kamar haka. Bari kowane zaren ya gabatar da ƙima. Daga ƙarshe, duk zaren suna buƙatar amincewa akan ƙima ɗaya wacce take ɗaya daga cikin ƙimomin da aka gabatar. Ana iya nuna cewa matsaloli da yawa na gaske na duniya

It describes in detail what will be done, how it will be done, what data will be needed and what data gathering device will be used. • Data analysis: This section describes the method of data analysis. translation.en: Sport Facility Booking System Kirtan Shah facility managers benefit from better organization and improved resource management, making their jobs easier and their venues more profitable. The app is designed to be accessible across different devices and integrates smoothly with popular payment platforms, ensuring a seamless and user-friendly experience for everyone involved. 2 The Purpose of the Project 2a The User Business or Background of the Project Effort With increasing sports clubs & grounds, facilities getting involved in this app will gain more customers by providing easy access to book their games at their own time with the flexibility on their screen remotely. This will help facility managers to manage bookings efficiently on the site and avoid the issue of inefficient resources. It is designed to revolutionize the way athletes, sport enthusiasts and facility managers interact with sport facilities. The primary motivation behind this project is to address the fragmented and inefficient process of booking sports facilities. Traditionally, finding and booking sports facilities was time-consuming and inconvenient, involving either booking offline or via calls or visiting booking website of the sports facilities’ personal website. This application simplifies this problem by providing single integrated solution for real-time booking, easy comparisons, and direct booking options. This project is driven by the need to create more efficient, transparent, and user-friendly approach to manage and book sports facilities. The challenge of finding and booking a sports facility is a pain for lot of users. The users need to go through multiple websites of each sport facility to book their slots. Athletes and sports enthusiasts often find it difficult to locate available facility in their vicinity and budget. The facility managers also struggle with managing bookings and management tasks. By simplifying the booking solution and providing management tools, the application not only provides user friendliness but also support facility managers to increase their revenue and optimize operations. This need for the solution justifies the importance and relevance of the project. 2
translation.ha: Yin Rajistar Kayan Wasanni Tsarin Manajan Kayan Kirtan Shah suna amfana daga ingantaccen tsari da ingantaccen sarrafa albarkatu, wanda ke sauƙaƙa ayyukansu da kuma wuraren da suke zama masu riba. An tsara manhajar don ta kasance mai sauƙin shiga a cikin na'urori daban-daban kuma tana haɗuwa cikin sauƙi tare da shahararrun dandamali na biyan kuɗi, yana tabbatar da ƙwarewar mai amfani da fasahar zamani mai sauƙi ga duk wanda abin ya shafa. 2 Manufar Aikin 2a Kasuwancin Mai amfani Kasuwanci ko Tarihin Ƙoƙarin Aikin Tare da ƙaruwar ƙungiyoyin wasanni da filaye, wuraren da ke shiga cikin wannan manhajar za su sami ƙarin abokan ciniki ta hanyar samar da sauƙin samun damar yin rajistar wasanninsu a lokacinsu tare da sassauci akan allon su daga nesa. Wannan zai taimaka wa manajan kayan aiki su sarrafa yin rajista yadda ya kamata a shafin kuma su guji matsalar albarkatun da ba su da inganci. An tsara shi ne don kawo sauyi kan yadda 'yan wasa, masu sha'awar wasanni da manajan kayan aiki ke mu'amala da wuraren wasanni. Babban abin da ke haifar da wannan aikin shine magance tsarin da ba shi da inganci da rashin inganci na yin rajistar wuraren wasanni. A al'ada, nemo da yin rajistar wuraren wasanni yana ɗaukar lokaci da rashin dacewa, wanda ya haɗa da yin rajista a layi ko ta hanyar kira ko ziyartar gidan yanar gizon yin rajistar gidajen yanar gizo na wuraren wasanni. Wannan aikace-aikacen  yana sauƙaƙa wannan matsala ta hanyar samar da mafita guda ɗaya don yin rajista a ainihin lokaci, kwatantawa mai sauƙi, da zaɓuɓɓukan yin rajista kai tsaye. Wannan aikin yana faruwa ne saboda buƙatar ƙirƙirar ingantacciyar hanya, bayyananne, kuma mai sauƙin amfani da  don sarrafawa da yin rajistar wuraren wasanni. Kalubalen nemo da yin rajistar wuraren wasanni abin damuwa ne ga masu amfani da yawa. Masu amfani suna buƙatar duba gidajen yanar gizo da yawa na kowane wurin wasanni don yin rajistar wuraren wasanni. 'Yan wasa da masu sha'awar wasanni galibi suna samun wahalar samun wurin da ake da shi a kusa da su da kasafin kuɗinsu. Manajan wuraren kuma suna fama da sarrafa rajista da ayyukan gudanarwa. Ta hanyar sauƙaƙe mafita ta yin rajista da samar da kayan aikin gudanarwa, aikace-aikacen <TECH> ba wai kawai yana ba da abokantaka ga masu amfani da <TECH> ba, har ma yana tallafawa manajojin wurare don ƙara yawan kuɗin shiga da inganta ayyukan su. Wannan buƙatar mafita tana tabbatar da mahimmanci da mahimmancin aikin. 2

translation.en: Software RequirementsSpecificationforStudentAssistant Page35 4.4 View Time Table 4.4.1 Description and Priority Description: The "View Time Table" feature allows users to access and display their class schedules and events in a user-friendly format. Users can view their timetable for the day, week, or month, making it convenient to plan their activities. Priority: Medium 4.4.2 Stimulus/Response Sequences Stimulus/Response Sequence 1: Daily Timetable Stimulus: The user selects the "View Daily Timetable" option. Response: The system displays the user's class schedule for the current day, including class names, times, and locations. Stimulus/Response Sequence 2: Weekly Timetable Stimulus: The user chooses the "View Weekly Timetable" option. Response: The system presents a weekly overview of the user's classes, allowing them to plan their activities for the upcoming week. 4.4.3 Functional Requirements VT-1: Timetable Display The system shall provide options for users to view their timetable for the day, week, and month. Users shall be able to select specific date ranges for viewing their timetable. VT-2: Class Information

translation.en: Biosphere MODULE - 5 The domain of Life Therefore, if our earth has become a green house, then there are certain gases on the Earth which act like the glass panels of a green house allowing the sun’s rays to pass through but preventing the heat from escaping into the outer space and there by warming the atmosphere. This is happening due to deforestation and industrialization. These gases are carbon dioxide (CO), methane (CH ) nitrous oxides (NO ) and 2 4 x Notes chlorofluorocarbon (CFC) and hence known as green house gases. Out of these four gases, carbon dioxide contributes about 55%, chlorofluorocarbon contributes about 24%, methane (about 15%) and nitrous oxide (about 6%) towards heating of the atmosphere. Do you know the sources of these gases? Burning of fossil fuels and fire woods, large fleet of automobiles and number of factories emit carbon dioxides. Growing paddies, livestock, waste dumps and coal mining are the major source of methane. The use of aerosols as coolants in refrigerators and air conditioning devices release chlorofluorocarbons into the atmosphere Nitrous oxide is mainly emitted from chemical industries, and due to deforestation and certain agricultural practices. Construction of green houses in temperate region helps the plant protection and ecological balances whereas concentration of green house gases on the earth’s atmosphere upsets the earth’s biological system. Consequences of green house effect 1. It is estimated that if the present rate of increase in CO level continues, it will 2 result in rise of atmospheric temperature by 20C to 30C by end of 21st century. This will result in receding many glaciers; melting of icecaps in the polar regions and disappearance of deposits of ice on the other parts of world in large scale. According to an estimate, if all the ice on the earth would melt, about 60M of water would be added to surface of all oceans and low lying coastal areas. A rise in sea-level of only 50-100 cm caused by global warming would flood low lying areas of the world such as Bangladesh, West Bengal as well as densely populated coastal cities from Shanghai to San-Fancisco. 2. Because of increased concentration of CO and due to much warmer tropical 2 oceans, there may occur more cyclones and hurricanes. Early snow melt in mountains will cause more floods during monsoon. According to United Nations Environment Programme (UNEP), within about three decades, rising levels of seas will be able to and flood coastal cities like Bombay, Boston, Chittgang and Manila. 3. A slight increase in global temperature can adversely affect the world food GEOGRAPHY 259
translation.ha: MASU ƊAUKAR BIYA - 5 YANKIN RAYUWA Saboda haka, idan duniyarmu ta zama gidan kore, to akwai wasu iskar gas a Duniya waɗanda ke aiki kamar allon gilashin gidan kore da ke barin hasken rana ya ratsa ta amma suna hana zafi ya shiga sararin samaniya ta waje kuma a can ta hanyar dumama yanayi. Wannan yana faruwa ne saboda sare dazuzzuka da masana'antu. Waɗannan iskar gas sune carbon dioxide (CO), methane (CH) nitrous oxides (NO) da 2 4 x Notes chlorofluorocarbon (CFC) don haka ana kiransu da iskar gas na kore. Daga cikin waɗannan iskar gas guda huɗu, carbon dioxide yana ba da gudummawa kusan kashi 55%, chlorofluorocarbon yana ba da gudummawa kusan kashi 24%, methane (kimanin kashi 15%) da nitrous oxide (kimanin kashi 6%) don dumama yanayi. Shin kun san tushen waɗannan iskar gas? Konewar mai da kuma dazuzzukan wuta, manyan motocin da yawan masana'antu suna fitar da carbon dioxide. Noman gonaki, dabbobi, sharar gida da hakar kwal sune babban tushen methane. Amfani da aerosols a matsayin masu sanyaya iska a cikin firiji da na'urorin sanyaya iska yana fitar da chlorofluorocarbons zuwa sararin samaniya. Nitrous oxide galibi ana fitar da shi ne daga masana'antun sinadarai, kuma saboda sare dazuzzuka da wasu ayyukan noma. Gina gidajen kore a yankin da ke da yanayi mai kyau yana taimakawa wajen kare tsirrai da daidaita muhalli yayin da yawan iskar gas a sararin duniya ke dagula tsarin halittu na duniya. Sakamakon tasirin gidajen kore 1. An kiyasta cewa idan yawan karuwar matakin CO2 ya ci gaba, zai haifar da hauhawar zafin yanayi da 20C zuwa 30C a ƙarshen ƙarni na 21. Wannan zai haifar da raguwar ƙanƙara da yawa; narkewar kankara a yankunan da ke kewaye da teku da kuma ɓacewar tarin kankara a wasu sassan duniya a babban girma. A cewar wani kiyasi, idan duk kankara a duniya ta narke, za a ƙara kimanin ruwa miliyan 60 a saman dukkan tekuna da yankunan bakin teku masu ƙasƙanci. Karin matakin teku na santimita 50-100 kacal wanda ɗumamar yanayi ke haifarwa zai mamaye yankunan duniya masu ƙasƙanci kamar Bangladesh, West Bengal da kuma biranen bakin teku masu cunkoso daga Shanghai zuwa San-Fancisco. 2. Saboda ƙaruwar yawan CO2 da kuma saboda ɗumamar teku mai zafi, akwai yiwuwar samun ƙarin guguwa da guguwa. Narkewar dusar ƙanƙara da wuri a tsaunuka zai haifar da ƙarin ambaliya a lokacin damina. A cewar Shirin Muhalli na Majalisar Ɗinkin Duniya (UNEP), cikin kimanin shekaru talatin, hauhawar matakan teku za su iya mamaye biranen bakin teku kamar Bombay, Boston, Chittgang da Manila. 3. Ƙarancin zafin duniya zai iya yin mummunan tasiri ga abincin duniya. GEOGRAPHY 259

translation.en: Biomes MODULE - 5 The domain of Life for the growth of grass. The natural vegetation of these regions on the Earth comprises treeless grasslands. Trees appear only on slopes of mountains where precipitation is more. The height of grass varies from place to place according to the amount of precipitation and fertility of the soil. Steppes in particular are known for short and nutritious grass. The appearance of these grasses on these lands varies with the seasons. In Notes springs, the grass beings to appear green, fresh and blooming with small and colourfull flowers. In summers, due to the scorching heat and evapouration, the green grass turns yellow and then brown. Towards autumn, the grass withers and dies, but, the roots remain alive and lie dormant throughout the cold winter season. When spring comes, the whole cycle is repeated. These grasslands are natural habitat of a variety of animals. Note worthy among them are antelopes, wild asses, horses, wolves, kangaroo, emu, and dingo or wild dog. (iii) Human Response No other biomes has ever undergone so many changes as the temperate grassland biomes. This has happened due to the human activities. (i) Majority of the grasslands have been converted into agricultural lands which have now become famous ‘granaries of the world’ (ii) The second crucial factor responsible for alteration of this virgin grasslands is pastoralism or domesticated of animals. Today virgin grass lands are very rare sight (iii) Large scale hunting of animals has resulted into phenomenal decrease of the population of some animals and disappearance and extinction of some animals. For example many species of animals such as antelope, Zebra, lions, leopards, hayenas have disappeared from the African Veldts by the mass hunting of animals by the European immigrants. (iv) The introduction of new animal and plant species has altogether changed the composition of native vegetation. For example introduction of sheep by the European settlers in Australia have changed the composition of vegetation community which was originally suited to the native marsupial animals. Like this introduction of few leguminous plants in Australian temperate grasslands suppressed several species of native perennial grasses. INTEXT QUESTION 15.2 1. Fill in the blanks by selecting appropriate words from those given in the bracket: (granaries, interior, low, more, less) GEOGRAPHY 277
translation.ha: BAYANIN HALITTA - 5 Fannin Rayuwa don girman ciyawa. Tsire-tsire na waɗannan yankuna a Duniya sun ƙunshi ciyayi marasa bishiyoyi. Bishiyoyi suna bayyana ne kawai a kan gangaren duwatsu inda ruwan sama ya fi yawa. Tsawon ciyawa ya bambanta daga wuri zuwa wuri dangane da yawan ruwan sama da kuma yawan amfanin ƙasa. Matakipes musamman an san su da gajerun ciyawa masu gina jiki. Bayyanar waɗannan ciyawa a waɗannan ƙasashe ya bambanta da yanayi. A cikin maɓuɓɓugan ruwa na Notes, halittun ciyawa suna bayyana kore, sabo kuma suna fure tare da ƙananan furanni masu launuka iri-iri. A lokacin rani, saboda zafi mai zafi da ƙaiƙayi, ciyawar kore tana juyawa zuwa rawaya sannan ta yi launin ruwan kasa. Zuwa lokacin kaka, ciyawar tana bushewa ta mutu, amma, saiwoyin suna rayuwa kuma suna kwance a cikin lokacin sanyi na hunturu. Lokacin da bazara ta zo, ana maimaita zagayowar gaba ɗaya. Waɗannan ciyayi mazaunin dabbobi ne na halitta. Abin lura daga cikinsu akwai barewa, jakunan daji, dawaki, kerkeci, kangaroo, emu, da kuma dingo ko kare na daji. (iii) Martanin Dan Adam Babu wani nau'in halittu da ya taɓa fuskantar canje-canje da yawa kamar na halittun ciyawa masu zafi. Wannan ya faru ne saboda ayyukan ɗan adam. (i) Yawancin filayen ciyawa an mayar da su zuwa filayen noma waɗanda yanzu suka zama sanannun 'ma'ajiyar ƙasa ta duniya' (ii) Abu na biyu mai mahimmanci da ke da alhakin sauya wannan ciyawar budurwa shine kiwo ko kuma kiwon dabbobi. A yau filayen ciyawa marasa galihu ba kasafai ake ganin su ba (iii) Babban farautar dabbobi ya haifar da raguwar yawan wasu dabbobi da ɓacewa da kuma ɓacewar wasu dabbobi. Misali nau'ikan dabbobi da yawa kamar barewa, aljanu, zakuna, damisa, hayena sun ɓace daga dabbobin Afirka ta hanyar farautar dabbobi da baƙi na Turai suka yi. (iv) Gabatar da sabbin nau'ikan dabbobi da tsire-tsire ya canza yanayin ciyayi na asali gaba ɗaya. Misali gabatar da tumaki da mazaunan <TECH>Turai suka yi a Ostiraliya sun canza tsarin al'ummar ciyayi wanda ya dace da dabbobin marsupial na asali. Kamar wannan gabatarwar wasu tsirarun tsire-tsire masu 'ya'yan itace a cikin ciyayi masu yanayin zafi na Australiya sun danne nau'ikan ciyawar da ke dawwama a asali da yawa. TAMBAYAR BAYANI 15.2 1. Cika guraben ta hanyar zaɓar kalmomi masu dacewa daga waɗanda aka bayar a cikin maƙallin: (ma'ajiyar ƙasa, ciki, ƙasa, ƙari, ƙasa) GIDAN JIKI 277

translation.en: Major Landforms and their Economic Significance MODULE - 2 Changing face of the  The plateau which are bordering or are enclosed within high mountain Earth ranges are called intermontane plateau.  The plateaus formed by the uplift of large areas or by the gradual spread and acumulation of basic lava sheets are called continental plateau.  The plateaus which are situated at the foot of mountains and are Notes bounded by a plain or an ocean on the other side are called piedmont plateaus. 7.6 ECONOMIC SIGNIFICANCE OF PLATEAUS Due to continuous erosion of their surface, we observe the prevalence of a patchy or the slow development of agriculture and building of roads on the plateaus. This factor also explains why the plateaus are sparsely populated. Nevertheless plateaus are extremely useful to mankind in the following ways: (1) Storehouse of Minerals Most of the minerals in the world are found in the plateaus. Besides, the extraction of minerals is relatively easier on plateaus. These minerals are indispensable as raw material for our industries. We get gold from the Plateau of Western Australia; copper, diamonds and gold from the Plateaus of Africa and coal, iron, manganese and mica from the Chota Nagpur Plateau in India. (2) Generation of Hydel-power Rivers falling down the edges of plateaus form water-falls. These water- falls provide ideal sites for generating hydel-power. (3) Cool Climate. The higher parts of the plateaus even in tropical and sub-tropical regions have cool climate. Hence they have attracted Europeans to settle there and develop their economy e.g. South and East Africa. (4) Useful for Animal-rearing and Agriculture Plateaus have large grassland areas suitable for animal-rearing specially sheep, goat and cattle. They provide a veriety of products such as wool, milk, meat and hides and skin. The lava plateaus as compared to all other plateau are richer in agriculture since their soil is very fertile.  Plateaus are useful because of the presence and easier way of ex- tracting minerals and favouring generation of hydro-power. Their suitable climate and sometimes fertile soils are helpful for develop- ing animal-rearing and agriculture. INTEXT QUESTIONS 7.2 GEOGRAPHY 129
translation.ha: Manyan Filaye da Muhimmancin Tattalin Arzikinsu - 2 Canjin fuskar  <FASAHA>Tsarin duniya wanda ke da iyaka ko kuma aka kewaye shi a cikin manyan tsaunuka Ana kiransa da plateau na intermontane.  Filayen da aka samar ta hanyar ɗaga manyan yankuna ko kuma ta hanyar yaɗuwa a hankali da tarin lava na asali ana kiransa da plateau na nahiyar.  Filayen da ke ƙasan duwatsu kuma suna da alaƙa da fili ko teku a ɗayan gefen ana kiransu plateaus na piedmont. 7.6 MUHIMMANCIYAR TATTALIN ARZIKI Saboda ci gaba da zaizayar saman su, muna lura da yawaitar wani yanki ko raguwar ci gaban noma da gina hanyoyi a kan plateaus. Wannan lamarin kuma ya bayyana dalilin da yasa plateaus ba su da yawan jama'a. Duk da haka, plateaus suna da matuƙar amfani ga ɗan adam ta hanyoyi masu zuwa: (1) Ma'ajiyar Ma'adanai Yawancin ma'adanai a duniya ana samun su a cikin plateaus. Bugu da ƙari, haƙo ma'adanai ya fi sauƙi a kan plateaus. Waɗannan ma'adanai ba makawa ne a matsayin kayan aiki ga masana'antunmu. Muna samun zinare daga Plateau ta Yammacin Ostiraliya; jan ƙarfe, lu'u-lu'u da zinariya daga Plateau ta Afirka da kwal, ƙarfe, manganese da mica daga Plateau ta Chota Nagpur a Indiya. (2) Samar da kogunan Hydel masu ƙarfi waɗanda ke faɗuwa a gefunan plateaus suna samar da magudanar ruwa. Waɗannan magudanar ruwa suna ba da wurare masu kyau don samar da wutar lantarki ta hydel. (3) Yanayi Mai Sanyi. Manyan sassan plateaus har ma a yankunan zafi da na wurare masu zafi suna da yanayi mai sanyi. Saboda haka sun jawo hankalin Turawan Turai su zauna a can su kuma haɓaka tattalin arzikinsu misali Kudu da Gabashin Afirka. (4) Masu Amfani ga kiwon dabbobi da Noma Plateau suna da manyan wuraren ciyayi da suka dace da kiwon dabbobi musamman tumaki, akuya da shanu. Suna samar da kayayyaki iri-iri kamar ulu, madara, nama da fata. Plateau na lava idan aka kwatanta da duk sauran plateaus suna da wadata a noma saboda ƙasarsu tana da wadata sosai.  Plateau suna da amfani saboda kasancewar da kuma hanyar da ta fi sauƙi ta haƙo ma'adanai da kuma samar da wutar lantarki ta ruwa. Yanayin da ya dace da su da kuma wani lokacin ƙasa mai albarka suna da amfani wajen haɓaka kiwon dabbobi da noma. TAMBAYOYIN JIRGIN RAYUWA 7.2 GIDAN JIRGIN RAYUWA 129

translation.en: India - Physical Features MODULE - 6 The physical setting of the country receives lesser amount of insolation and has cold climate unlike the of India southern parts. Secondly, the difference between the length of day and right in southern most part of India is much less only about 45 minutes as they are situated near the equator, This difference between day and night in the northern parts of India steadily goes on increasing till it becomes as much as 5 hours. Notes The Tropic of Cancer passes almost halfway through the country. Thus half of the country to the south of the Tropic of Cancer is situated in the Tropical or Torrid zone and the other half lying north of the Tropic of Cancer falls in the Sub-tropical zone. The earth takes 24 hours to complete one rotation on its axis. The Sun rises first in the east and then in the west because the earth rotates from west to east. The earth’s longitudinal expanse of 360° is thus covered in 24 hours, at the pace of 15° per hour. As the longitudinal extent of India is nearly 29°, the real time difference in India between its eastern and western extremities is roughly of two hours. While at the eastern extremity of India the day may have just broken out, the western extremity would take nearly another two full hours to do so. To iron out this big chunk of time difference, India, like all other countries of the world, follows the local time of its relatively central meridian as the standard time for the whole country. For the convenience of all, each country chooses its stan- dard meridian in a multiple of 7°30'. Accordingly, the standard meridian of India has been chosen to be 82°30' E. The north-central part of India is broad while the southern part tapers down to- wards the Indian Ocean in the south. Thus, the northern part of the Indian Ocean has been divided into two, by the sheer presence of Indian Peninsula. The western part of northern Indian Ocean is called the Arabian Sea while the eastern part is called the Bay of Bengal. The total length of the coastline of India including the island groups is about 7,516.6 km. The Palk Strait separates Indian mainland from Sri Lanka. Structurally, Sri Lanka is an extension of the peninsular block of India. 16.2 SIZE India accounts for 2.42 per cent of the world’s total land area; whereas it sustains 16 per cent of the world population. You will know more about it in lesson No. 26 on population of India. The land frontiers of India measure 15,200 km. Pakistan, Afghanistan, China, Nepal, Myanmar and Bangladesh share common boundaries with India. The kingdom of Bhutan is situated in the Eastern Himalaya. It is a small country and the responsibility of its defence rests with India. Most of our bound- ary with Pakistan and Bangladesh is almost man-made. There is no mountain range or river to form a natural boundary. The international boundary of India passes through a variety of landforms - barren desert lands, lush green agricultural fields, gushing rivers, snow clad mountains as well as densely forested mountain ranges. The defence of such an international boundary passing through various GEOGRAPHY 3
translation.ha: Indiya - Siffofin Jiki MASU KYAU - 6 Yanayin zahiri na ƙasar yana samun ƙarancin adadin insolation kuma yana da yanayin sanyi ba kamar na kudancin Indiya ba. Na biyu, bambancin da ke tsakanin tsawon yini da dama a kudancin mafi yawan Indiya bai wuce mintuna 45 ba saboda suna kusa da equator. Wannan bambancin da ke tsakanin rana da dare a arewacin Indiya yana ci gaba da ƙaruwa har sai ya zama kamar awanni 5. Bayani Labarin Ciwon daji na T yana ratsa kusan rabin ƙasar. Don haka rabin ƙasar da ke kudu da Tropic of Cancer tana cikin yankin Tropic ko Torrid kuma ɗayan rabin da ke arewacin Tropic of Cancer yana faɗuwa a yankin Sub-na wurare masu zafi. Duniya tana ɗaukar awanni 24 don kammala juyawa ɗaya a kan axis ɗinta. Rana tana fitowa da farko a gabas sannan kuma a yamma saboda duniya tana juyawa daga yamma zuwa gabas. Faɗin tsayi na duniya na 360° an rufe shi cikin awanni 24, a saurin 15° a kowace awa. Ganin cewa tsawon lokacin Indiya ya kusan 29°, bambancin lokaci na ainihi a Indiya tsakanin gabas da yamma yana kusan awanni biyu. Yayin da a gabashin Indiya ranar da aka fara samun bambancin lokaci, yankin yamma zai ɗauki kusan awanni biyu kafin a yi hakan. Don warware wannan babban bambancin lokaci, Indiya, kamar sauran ƙasashe na duniya, tana bin lokacin yankin tsakiyar tsakiyarta a matsayin lokacin daidaitacce ga dukkan ƙasar. Don saukaka wa kowa, kowace ƙasa tana zaɓar matsakaicin matsakaicinta a cikin ninki na 7°30'. Saboda haka, an zaɓi matsakaicin matsakaicinta na daidaitacce na Indiya don zama 82°30' E. Yankin arewa-tsakiya na Indiya yana da faɗi yayin da yankin kudu ke raguwa zuwa Tekun Indiya a kudu. Don haka, an raba yankin arewacin Tekun Indiya zuwa biyu, ta hanyar kasancewar yankin Indiya. Yammacin Tekun arewacin Indiya ana kiransa Tekun Arabiyya yayin da gabashin kuma ana kiransa da Tekun Bengal. Jimillar tsawon gabar tekun Indiya, gami da rukunin tsibirin, ya kai kimanin kilomita 7,516.6. Mashigin Palk ya raba babban yankin Indiya na TECH daga Sri Lanka. A tsarinsa, Sri Lanka wani yanki ne na yankin teku na Indiya. 16.2 GIRMA Indiya ta kai kashi 2.42 cikin 100 na jimlar yankin duniya; yayin da take kula da kashi 16 cikin 100 na yawan jama'ar duniya. Za ku ƙara sani game da shi a darasi na 26 game da yawan jama'ar Indiya. Iyakokin ƙasar Indiya sun kai kilomita 15,200. Pakistan, Afghanistan, China, Nepal, Myanmar da Bangladesh suna da iyaka da Indiya. Masarautar Bhutan tana cikin Gabashin Himalaya. Ƙaramar ƙasa ce kuma alhakin tsaronta yana kan Indiya. Yawancin iyakokinmu da Pakistan da Bangladesh kusan an yi su ne da mutane. Babu wani yanki na tsaunuka ko kogi da zai samar da iyaka ta halitta. Iyakar ƙasashen duniya ta Indiya tana ratsawa ta cikin nau'ikan filaye iri-iri - hamada mara hayaniya, filayen noma masu kore, koguna masu ɓuɓɓuga, tsaunuka masu dusar ƙanƙara da kuma tsaunuka masu dazuzzuka masu yawa. Kare irin wannan iyaka ta duniya da ke ratsawa ta cikin GEOGRAPHY daban-daban 3

translation.en: 461 Smruti R. Sarangi in Figure 9.34. The standard method of annotating a state transition is to create an event-action pair separated with the ‘|’ symbol. For example, the notation “Evict|−” means that whenever we need to evict a block, we just evict it and do not do anything else. However, if we need to read a cache line, when it is in the invalid state (block not present in the cache), we send a read miss message (RdX) on the bus. Once the block arrives, we transition to the shared state. The action in this case always means that a message is sent on the bus, which every sister cache can read. Rd | - Rd | RdX I S Evict | - Figure 9.34: State transitions in the write-update protocol: S and I states Note the transitions from the shared state. If we need to read a line that is already in the shared state, then we can just go ahead and read it. There is no need to send a message to any sister cache. This transition is shown as “Rd|−” in Figure 9.34. Next, consider evictions from the cache when the line is in the S state. The S state basically means that we have not written to the block. We are only reading it. Since the current cache has not modified the block, it can seamlessly evict the block. We will not lose any data. Writes Let us now consider the tricky case of writes. Assume that we have a write miss. This means that the block is not present in the cache. We need to first request the rest of the sister caches for a copy of the block, and the write can be effected only after we get a copy of the block (like regular caches). This is similar to the case of a read miss. We send a write miss message WrX to the rest of the caches. If we do not get a reply within a specific period of time, or we get a negative response from the sister caches, then it means that the block must be fetched from the lower level. This part is exactly similar to the case of a read miss. Once we get a copy of the block, we transition to the modified (M) state. This is shown in Figure 9.35. Note that till this point we have not performed any read or write yet, we are merely requesting a copy of the block from other caches. Once, we have made the I → M transition after receiving a copy of the block, we can then proceed with the read or write operation. Rd | - Wr | WrX I M Evict | Wb Figure 9.35: The I →M and M →I transitions (writes in the M state are not shown) Once, the block is in the M state, reads are seamless. This is indicated by Rd | − in Figure 9.35, whichmeansthatnomessageneedstobesentonthebus. Wecangoaheadandreadacopyoftheblock. However, if we evict the block we need to write a copy to the lower level, because we have modified its contents. If we do not write back a copy to the lower level, then it is possible that we might lose our updates because no other sister cache may have a copy of the block. Hence, to be on the safer side, every time we evict a block in the M state, we should write back the block to the lower level such that updates are not lost. We use the term Wb in Figure 9.35 to denote a write back. We can thus conclude that unlike the S state, in the M state, evictions are more expensive.
translation.ha: 461 Smruti R. Sarangi a Hoto na 9.34. Hanyar ma'auni ta yin bayanin sauyin yanayi ita ce ƙirƙirar wani nau'in aikin taron da aka raba da alamar '|'. Misali, alamar "Korar|−" tana nufin cewa duk lokacin da muke buƙatar korar wani toshe, kawai muna korar sa kuma ba ma yin wani abu. Duk da haka, idan muna buƙatar karanta layin cache, lokacin da yake cikin yanayin da ba shi da kyau (toshe ba ya cikin cache), muna aika saƙon kuskure na karanta (RdX) a kan bas. Da zarar toshe ya iso, za mu canza zuwa yanayin da aka raba. Aikin a wannan yanayin koyaushe yana nufin cewa ana aika saƙo a kan bas, wanda kowace cache 'yar'uwa za ta iya karanta. Rd | - Rd | RdX I S Korar | - Hoto na 9.34: Canjin yanayi a cikin yarjejeniyar write-sabuntawa: S da I sunaye Lura da canje-canje daga yanayin da aka raba. Idan muna buƙatar karanta layin da ya riga ya kasance a cikin yanayin raba, to za mu iya ci gaba da karanta shi kawai mu kuma karanta shi. Babu buƙatar aika saƙo zuwa ga kowace ma'ajiyar 'yar'uwa. An nuna wannan canjin a matsayin "Rd|−" a cikin Hoto na 9.34. Na gaba, yi la'akari da korar da aka yi daga ma'ajiyar lokacin da layin yake cikin yanayin S. Yanayin S yana nufin cewa ba mu rubuta zuwa ma'ajiyar ba. Muna karanta shi kawai. Tunda ma'ajiyar da ke yanzu ba ta gyara ma'ajiyar ba, zai iya fitar da ma'ajiyar ba tare da matsala ba. Ba za mu rasa duk wani bayani na "TECH" ba. Rubuta Bari mu yi la'akari da yanayin rubutu mai rikitarwa. A ɗauka cewa muna da kuskuren rubutu. Wannan yana nufin cewa toshewar ba ta cikin ma'ajiyar ba. Muna buƙatar da farko mu nemi sauran ma'ajiyar 'yar'uwa don kwafin toshewar, kuma rubutun za a iya yin sa ne kawai bayan mun sami kwafin toshewar (kamar ma'ajiyar yau da kullun). Wannan yayi kama da batun kuskuren "TECH" karanta</TECH". Muna aika saƙon kuskuren rubutu WrX zuwa sauran ma'ajiyar. Idan ba mu sami amsa a cikin wani takamaiman lokaci ba, ko kuma muka sami amsa mara kyau daga cache ɗin 'yar'uwa, to yana nufin dole ne a ɗauko toshen  daga matakin ƙasa. Wannan ɓangaren yayi daidai da yanayin kuskuren <TECH>karanta. Da zarar mun sami kwafin toshen, za mu koma yanayin da aka gyara (M). Wannan an nuna shi a Hoto na 9.35. Lura cewa har zuwa wannan lokacin ba mu yi wani karanta ko rubutu ba tukuna, kawai muna neman kwafin toshen ne daga wasu cache. Da zarar mun yi canjin I → M bayan mun sami kwafin toshen, za mu iya ci gaba da aikin karanta ko rubutu. Rd | - Wr | WrX I M Evict | Wb Hoto na 9.35: Canjin I →M da M →I (ba a nuna rubutu a cikin yanayin M ba) Da zarar toshen yana cikin yanayin M, karantawa ba su da matsala. Wannan an nuna shi ta Rd | − a cikin Hoto na 9.35, wanda ke nufin cewa ba za a iya cire toshe ba. Za mu iya yin gaba da kuma karanta kwafin toshe. Duk da haka, idan muka kori toshe, muna buƙatar rubuta kwafi zuwa ƙananan matakin, domin mun gyara abubuwan da ke ciki. Idan ba mu sake rubuta kwafi zuwa ƙananan matakin ba, to yana yiwuwa mu rasa sabuntawarmu saboda babu wata 'yar'uwa cache za ta iya da kwafin toshe. Saboda haka, don kasancewa a gefen aminci, duk lokacin da muka kori toshe a cikin jihar M, ya kamata mu <TECH> ya rubuta toshe zuwa ƙananan matakin don kada a rasa sabuntawa. Muna amfani da kalmar Wb a cikin Hoto na 9.35 don nuna rubutawa. Don haka za mu iya kammala cewa ba kamar jihar S ba, a cikin jihar M, korar ta fi tsada.

translation.en: The confidentiality of data in software is important as it consists of all important information regarding students, their profile, grades, certificates etc. It is very important to provide security measures to avoid unauthorized access/ hacks in the system. 5.3 Security Requirements In this system, the authentication of the user is an important factor. In this system, user authentication will be done by login by user name and password and classified by user type. Users will get access to the system as permissions are classified for that type of user. 5.4 Software Quality Attributes There are a number of attributes of software that can serve as requirements. It is important that required attributes by specified so that their achievement can be objectively verified. The following items provide a partial list of examples. The input system will allow for inputting numbers, operands, special symbols and letters of the alphabet. 5.5 Business Rules The rules as mentioned earlier, ADMINISTRATOR: Responsible of maintaining the software at back end and front end as well. STAFF: Staff are allowed to insert/modify the metrics of students in the software. STUDENTS: Are restricted to only view information and modify their profile. Appendix A: Glossary 1. SRS: Software Requirements Specification. 2. GUI: Graphical User Interface. 3. LAN: Local Area Network Appendix B: Analysis Models Appendix C: To Be Determined List Page | 20

translation.en: Software Requirements Specification for VIRS Page 6 3.2 Hardware Interfaces Since neither the application nor the officers’ devices have any designated hardware, it does not have any direct hardware interfaces. The GPS connection for the software will be provided by GPS feature of the handheld devices or computers and the connection to the database server is managed by the underlying operating system on the devices, computers and the web server. 3.3 Software Interfaces The application communicates with the GPS application in order to get geographical information about where the traffic events are being occurred. Also, the application communicates with the database to create, read, update, and delete the information about vehicles and their owners. In order to manage and optimize the use of data in the application, a DBMS software is used to ensure the ACID properties of the database. 3.4 Communications Interfaces The front-end and back-end of the application are connected by using the HTTPS protocol and REST architectural style is used to provide a fast and reliable connection to the servers. To record traffic events, police officers need to know the exact date and time and the application uses the NTP protocol to achieve this necessity.
translation.ha: Bayanin Bukatun Software don VIRS Shafi na 6 3.2 Haɗin Kayan Aiki na Hardware Tunda aikace-aikacen  ko na'urorin jami'ai ba su da wani kayan aiki da aka keɓe, ba shi da wani haɗin kai tsaye na hardware. Haɗin GPS na software ɗin za a samar da shi ta hanyar fasalin GPS na na'urorin hannu ko kwamfutoci kuma haɗin zuwa uwar garken   ana sarrafa shi ta hanyar tsarin aiki na asali na TECH</TECH> akan na'urori, kwamfutoci da uwar garken yanar gizo na TECH</TECH>. 3.3 Haɗin Software Aikace-aikacen  yana sadarwa da aikace-aikacen GPS  domin samun bayanan  na yanki game da inda abubuwan da suka faru na zirga-zirga suka faru. Haka kuma, aikace-aikacen  yana sadarwa da Ma’ajiya ta bayanai don ƙirƙira, karanta, sabuntawa, da share bayanin <TECH> game da motoci da masu su. Domin sarrafawa da inganta amfani da <TECH>data a cikin aikace-aikacen , ana amfani da manhajar DBMS don tabbatar da kaddarorin ACID na Ma’ajiya ta bayanai. 3.4 Hanyoyin Sadarwa Ana haɗa aikace-aikacen gaba da baya ta hanyar amfani da yarjejeniyar HTTPS kuma ana amfani da salon gine-gine na REST don samar da haɗi mai sauri da aminci ga sabar. Don <TECH>rikodin abubuwan da suka faru na zirga-zirga, jami'an 'yan sanda suna buƙatar sanin ainihin kwanan wata da lokaci kuma aikace-aikacen <TECH> yana amfani da yarjejeniyar NTP don cimma wannan buƙatar.

translation.en: The software must deliver a VIM two seconds after the ventilation has started (starting at the end of the turbine test) if no inspiratory trigger is detected during this period. The SIMV period (60/rate) then starts from the beginning of this VIM. SFSYST9.7 The software must deliver a PIM if an inspiratory trigger is detected during two seconds after the ventilation has started (starting at the end of the turbine test). The SIMV period (60/rate) then starts from the beginning of this PIM. SFSYST9.8 The software must deliver a PS breath if an inspiratory trigger is detected before a period of INSP TIME from the end of the SIMV period. SFSYST9.9 The software must deliver a VIM after a period of 60/Rate since the beginning of the latest VIM. The following cases are exceptions to this rule : - if a PS inspiration is in progress - if the duration of the exhalation phase in progress is less then twice the inhalation time See SFSYST9.14 and SFSYST9.16 for the exception cases. SFSYST9.10 The software must deliver a PIM if a trigger is detected during a period of INSP TIME before the end of the latest SIMV period. SFSYST9.11 If no breath (either VIM, PIM or PS) is delivered in a period equal to APNEA TIME (if Apnea alarm is equal to YES or OFF in preferences menu), the software must start an apnea ventilation with Vol AC breaths at Backup Rate. SFSYST9.12 The software must deliver PS (Pressure Support) breathes like in PSV mode breath with default settings defined in the setting section. SFSYST9.13 The software must deliver PIMs (Patient initiated Mandatory breath) and the VIMs (Ventilator Initiated Mandatory breath) with square flow controlled like in Vol AC mode. SFSYST9.14 a VIM must be delivered after the end of the PS breath exhalation (2*Ti minimum) if it cannot be delivered at the end of the SIMV period unless a PIM is triggered during PS exhalation. If a PIM is triggered after the end of the previous SIMV period, the next SIMV period will start form the beginning of this PIM. SFSYST9.16 If a VIM or a PIM is delivered after the SIMV period (60/rate) ends, the following period is delayed and starts from the beginning of this VIM or PIM. In case of a PIM triggered before the end of the SIMV period the following period is not delayed and starts at the end of the previous period. translation.ha: Dole ne manhajar ta isar da VIM daƙiƙa biyu bayan fara samun iska (tana farawa daga ƙarshen gwajin injin turbine) idan ba a gano abin da ke haifar da numfashi ba a wannan lokacin. Lokacin SIMV (60/ƙimar) zai fara daga farkon wannan VIM. SFSYST9.7 Dole ne manhajar <TECH>ta isar da PIM idan an gano abin da ke haifar da numfashi a cikin daƙiƙa biyu bayan fara samun iska (tana farawa daga ƙarshen gwajin injin turbine). Lokacin SIMV (60/ƙimar) zai fara daga farkon wannan PIM. SFSYST9.8 Dole ne manhajar <TECH>ta isar da numfashin PS idan an gano abin da ke haifar da numfashi kafin lokacin INSP TIME daga ƙarshen lokacin SIMV. SFSYST9.9 Dole ne manhajar <TECH>ta isar da VIM bayan lokacin 60/ƙimar tun farkon sabon VIM. Waɗannan sharuɗɗan banbance-banbance ne ga wannan ƙa'ida: - idan ana ci gaba da samun wahayi daga PS - idan tsawon lokacin fitar da iska ya yi ƙasa da sau biyu lokacin shaƙa Duba SFSYST9.14 da SFSYST9.16 don shari'o'in banbance. SFSYST9.10 Software ɗin <TECH>dole ne ya samar da PIM idan an gano abin kunna wuta a cikin lokacin INSP TIME kafin ƙarshen sabuwar lokacin SIMV. SFSYST9.11 Idan babu numfashi (ko dai VIM, PIM ko PS) an isar da shi a cikin lokacin da ya yi daidai da TIME na APNEA (idan ƙararrawar Apnea ta yi daidai da EES ko KASHE a cikin menu na fifiko), software ɗin dole ne ya fara samun iska ta apnea tare da numfashin Vol AC a Matsakaicin Ajiyewa. SFSYST9.12 Software ɗin dole ne ya samar da PS (Tallafin Matsi) yana numfashi kamar a cikin yanayin PSV numfashi tare da saitunan tsoho da aka ayyana a cikin sashin saiti. SFSYST9.13 Manhajar <TECH>dole ne ta isar da PIMs (Majiyyaci ya fara numfashin dole) da kuma VIMs (Ventilator ya fara numfashin dole) tare da sarrafa kwararar murabba'i kamar yadda yake a yanayin Vol AC. SFSYST9.14 dole ne a isar da VIM <TECH> bayan ƙarshen fitar numfashin PS (mafi ƙarancin Ti 2) idan ba za a iya isar da shi a ƙarshen lokacin SIMV ba sai dai idan an kunna PIM yayin fitar PS. Idan an kunna PIM bayan ƙarshen lokacin SIMV da ya gabata, lokacin SIMV na gaba zai fara daga farkon wannan PIM. SFSYST9.16 Idan an isar da VIM ko PIM bayan lokacin SIMV (60/ƙimar) ya ƙare, za a jinkirta lokacin mai zuwa kuma ya fara daga farkon wannan VIM ko PIM. Idan PIM ya fara aiki kafin ƙarshen lokacin SIMV, ba za a jinkirta lokacin mai zuwa ba kuma yana farawa a ƙarshen lokacin da ya gabata. translation.en: 283 Smruti R. Sarangi sure that the voltage difference between the bit lines is not arising because of transient effects such as picking up random electric fields. We should be sure that the difference in voltages is because one bit line is moving towards logical 1 and the other towards logical 0. At this point, we can confidently declare the value contained in the memory cell. We do not have to wait for the voltages to reach their final values. This is thus a much faster process. The lower we set ∆, faster is our circuit. We are limited by the amount of noise. NotethatthereisonehiddenadvantageofSRAMarrays. BothBLandBLarespacedclosetogether. Given their spatial proximity, the effects of noise will be similar, and thus if we consider the difference in voltages, we shall see that the effects of electromagnetic or crosstalk noise will mostly get canceled out. This is known as common mode rejection and works in our favor. If we had a single bit line, this would not have happened. In our SRAM array (shown in Figure 7.22) we enable the entire row of cells. However, we might not be interested in all of this data. For example, if the entire row contains 64 bytes of data, and we are only interested in 16 bytes, then we need to choose the component of the row that we are interested in. This is done using the column multiplexers that read in only those columns that are we are interested in. The column address is the input to these column multiplexers. For example, in this case since there are four 16 byte chunks in a 64 byte row, there are four possible choices for the set of columns. We thus need 2 bits to encode this set of choices. Hence, the column address is 2 bits wide. Column Multiplexers B B B B 1 1 2 2 S S S S 0 0 1 1 Sense amplifer Output of the sense amplifier Figure 7.23: A column multiplexer Let us look at the design of the column multiplexers. Figure 7.23 shows a simple example. We have two pairs of bit lines: (B ,B ) and (B ,B ). We need to choose one of the pairs, and connect each wire 1 1 2 2 to an NMOS transistor, which is known as a pass transistor. If the input at its gate is a logical 1, then the transistor conducts, and the voltage at the drain is reflected at the source. However, if the voltage at the gate is a logical 0, then the transistor behaves as an open circuit. Inthiscase,weneedasinglecolumnaddressbitbecausetherearetwochoices. Wesendthisbittoa decoder and derive two outputs: S and S . Only one of them can be true. Depending upon the output 0 1
translation.ha: 283 Smruti R. Sarangi ya tabbatar da cewa bambancin ƙarfin lantarki tsakanin layukan bit ɗin ba ya tasowa saboda tasirin wucin gadi kamar ɗaukar filayen lantarki bazuwar. Ya kamata mu mu tabbata cewa bambancin ƙarfin lantarki shine saboda layin bit ɗaya yana tafiya zuwa ma'ana 1 ɗayan kuma zuwa ma'ana 0. A wannan lokacin, za mu iya bayyana ƙimar da ke cikin ƙwayar ƙwaƙwalwar ajiya da tabbaci. Ba sai mun jira ƙarfin lantarki ya kai ƙimar ƙarshe ba. Don haka wannan tsari ne mai sauri. Mafi ƙarancin da muka saita ∆, mafi sauri shine da'irarmu. Muna da iyaka da adadin hayaniya. Lura cewa akwai ɓoyayyen fa'idar SRAMarrays. Dukansu BLandBL suna kusa da juna. Idan aka yi la'akari da kusancinsu na sarari, tasirin hayaniya zai yi kama da juna, don haka idan muka yi la'akari da bambancin ƙarfin lantarki, za mu za mu ga cewa tasirin hayaniyar lantarki ko ta hanyar magana za a soke su galibi. Wannan an san shi da ƙin yarda da yanayin gama gari kuma yana aiki a madadinmu. Da muna da layin bit ɗaya, da wannan ba zai faru ba. A cikin jerin SRAM ɗinmu (wanda aka nuna a Hoto na 7.22) muna kunna dukkan layukan ƙwayoyin halitta. Duk da haka, ƙila ba za mu sha'awar duk waɗannan bayanan  ba. Misali, idan dukkan layin ya ƙunshi baiti 64 na Bayanai, kuma muna sha'awar baiti 16 kawai, to muna buƙatar zaɓar ɓangaren  na layin da muke sha'awar. Ana yin wannan ta amfani da masu yawan ginshiƙai waɗanda ke karantawa a cikin waɗannan ginshiƙai waɗanda muke sha'awar kawai. Adireshin ginshiƙi shine shigarwar waɗannan masu yawan ginshiƙai. Misali, a wannan yanayin tunda akwai guntu huɗu na baiti 16 a cikin layin baiti 64, akwai zaɓuɓɓuka huɗu masu yiwuwa don saitin ginshiƙai. Don haka muna buƙatar biti 2 don ɓoye wannan saitin zaɓuɓɓuka. Saboda haka, adireshin ginshiƙi yana da faɗi na biti 2. Masu Amfani da Ginshiƙi Mai Sauƙi B B B B 1 1 2 2 S S S S 0 0 1 1 Mai Amfani da Ginshiƙi Fitowar Mai Amfani da Ginshiƙi Hoto na 7.23: Mai Amfani da Ginshiƙi Mai Sauƙi Bari mu kalli ƙirar masu amfani da ginshiƙi mai yawa. Hoto na 7.23 ya nuna misali mai sauƙi. Muna da nau'i biyu na layukan bit: (B,B) da (B,B). Muna buƙatar zaɓar ɗaya daga cikin nau'i biyu, kuma mu haɗa kowace waya 1 1 2 2 zuwa transistor na NMOS, wanda aka sani da transistor mai wucewa. Idan shigarwar da ke ƙofar ta kasance mai ma'ana 1, to transistor ɗin yana gudanarwa, kuma ƙarfin lantarki a magudanar ruwa yana nunawa a tushen. Koyaya, idan ƙarfin lantarki a ƙofar 0 ne mai ma'ana, to transistor ɗin yana aiki azaman da'irar buɗewa. A wannan yanayin, mun yi amfani da adireshin ginshiƙi ɗaya saboda akwai zaɓuɓɓuka biyu. Mun yi amfani da mai fassara kuma mun samo fitarwa biyu: S da S. Ɗaya daga cikinsu ne kawai zai iya zama gaskiya. Dangane da fitarwa 0 1

translation.en: MODULE - 8 Development of Mineral and Energy Resources Economic activities and Infrastructural (b) Industry development in India (c) Transport (d) None of them (2) Which one of the following forms of energy is non-conventional? Notes (a) Thermal energy (b) Hydel power (c) Solar energy (d) Nuclear power (3) Which one of the following has the highest share in the total energy production? (a) Hydel power (b) Thermal power (c) Nuclear power (d) Wind energy 23.10 THERMAL POWER SOURCES In thermal power, the major source of energy are coal, diesel and natural gas that are used for generation of electricity. It is the largest source of power supply in the country. The installed capacity of thermal power stations is about three times the installed capacity of the hydel power. During 2004-05 share of thermal power was about 80,903MW out of 1,18,419MW of electricity produced in the country. This is approximately 68% of the total electricity produced in India. Share of thermal electricity increased very rapidly after creation of the National Thermal Power Corporation (NTPC) in 180 GEOGRAPHY

Bayani (a) Makamashin zafi (b) Ƙarfin Hydel (c) Makamashin hasken rana (d) Ƙarfin nukiliya (3) Wanne daga cikin waɗannan ne ke da mafi girman kaso a cikin jimlar samar da makamashi? (a) Ƙarfin Hydel (b) Ƙarfin zafi (c) Ƙarfin nukiliya (d) Ƙarfin iska 23.10 MAGANIN WUTAR DUHU A cikin wutar lantarki, babban tushen makamashi shine kwal, dizal da iskar gas waɗanda ake amfani da su don samar da wutar lantarki. Ita ce babbar hanyar samar da wutar lantarki a ƙasar. Ƙarfin da aka sanya na tashoshin wutar lantarki na zafi ya ninka ƙarfin da aka shigar na wutar lantarki ta hydel sau uku. A lokacin 2004-05 rabon wutar lantarki na zafi ya kai kusan 80,903MW daga cikin 1,18,419MW da aka samar a ƙasar. Wannan shine kusan kashi 68% na jimlar wutar lantarki da aka samar a Indiya. Rabon wutar lantarki mai zafi ya ƙaru da sauri bayan ƙirƙirar National Thermal Power Corporation (NTPC) a cikin 180 GEOGRAPHY

translation.en: Chapter 2 2 Overall Descriptions 2.1 Product perspective There are many resources planning system all around the world. But many of them are in English language and implemented cost is very high. By using this application can do a better resource planning system relates to the procurement management in Sinhala language. System interfaces will be very familiar with users and it is very useful and by going through these can do better resource plan. This web application is a cloud base web application. So it is very useful to keep relation with other details which are related to procurement management such as financial details. So user can easily access other relevant details also. 2.1.1 System interfaces To use web interface of Openbravo 3 any modern office system would work. Since Openbravo is a web application it can be used on any device that is capable of running current web browser. As with most web based applications, a faster CPU and more RAM makes the GUI snappier and more pleasant to use. Larger displays also make users more productive using wide grids, forms and multiple tabs. For the system interface it is essential to have some system interface such as  Operating System.  PostgreSQL server 9.5.x  Apache Tomcat 7  Ant server  Java development Kit (JDK) 2.1.2 User interfaces All interfaces are user friendly, very useful and easy to use. Personal sable Workspace and Widgets Enjoy an easily customizable portal-style home page from which users can directly access all recently visited windows and documents, and administer the available widgets. Widgets are user interface elements that can be either placed in any users' workspace tab or be part of a generated window. They can be used to display a wide range of different information ranging from static content, dynamic database data in list form, custom html content, or complete external URL's. 9

translation.en: USE-2: The RMS shall allow users to retrieve the saved recipes and customize them according to their interests with a single interaction. USE-3: The RMS shall remember past searches and saved recipes and recommend suggestions based on those searches and saved recipes on the interface. 6.2 Performance PER-1: The system shall display search results within 2 seconds of the user entering the information about a certain search. PER-2: All the web pages should load within 4 seconds from the time the user requests the page with over a 25Mbps or faster internet connection. PER-3: The system shall display the confirmation message to the user within an average of 3 seconds and a maximum of 7 seconds after the user submits information about a recipe or adds ingredients to the shopping list in the system. 6.3 Scalability SCA-1: The system shall accommodate a total of 10,000 users and a maximum of 8000 concurrent users during the peak usage time (Meal time) and 10,000 concurrent users during the local time without any degradation in performance. SCA-2: The RMS should handle large amounts of data including thousands of recipes, user profiles, and saved preferences without any data loss or breakdown of the system. SCA-3: The system should maintain quick and fast access times, and efficient querying as the amounts of recipes and user interaction grows. 9

PER-2: Duk shafukan yanar gizo ya kamata su loda cikin daƙiƙa 4 daga lokacin da mai amfani zai ya nemi shafin da ke da haɗin intanet sama da 25Mbps ko sauri. PER-3: Tsarin   zai  ya nuna saƙon tabbatarwa ga mai amfani da  a cikin matsakaicin daƙiƙa 3 da matsakaicin daƙiƙa 7 bayan mai amfani da  ya gabatar da <TECH>bayani game da girke-girke ko ya ƙara sinadaran zuwa jerin siyayya a cikin tsarin . 6.3 Scability SCA-1: Tsarin   zai ya ɗauki jimillar masu amfani 10,000 da matsakaicin masu amfani da su 8000 a lokaci guda a lokacin amfani mafi girma (Lokacin Abinci) da kuma masu amfani da su 10,000 a lokaci guda a lokacin gida ba tare da wani raguwa a cikin aikin  ba. SCA-2: RMS ya kamata ta kula da adadi mai yawa na Bayanai gami da dubban girke-girke, bayanan martaba na mai amfani, da kuma abubuwan da aka adana ba tare da asarar Bayanai ko rushe tsarin  ba. translation.en: NOV,3,2022 B.TECH E-Commerce CVV The security number behind the credit card . Introduction : Background : An ecommerce website caters to the exchange of goods and services for electronic transaction of money as well as Cash-On-Delivery (COD). Trading has been practiced for a long time serving to the demand and supply chain. Ecommerce website, unlike the traditional websites, helps in purchasing the products that are displayed in the product lists. People can visit the website, choose the products they like, enter the required details, make payment (or choose to pay later), and purchase goods and services in a jiffy. Ecommerce website facilitates online transactions with the use of data and fund transfer. Earlier ecommerce was managed partially using phone calls and emails. However, today, all the processes can be done with a single website Purpose : An ecommerce website implies a virtual store where visitors come to the store, pick the products of choice, and become customers by purchasing them An ecommerce website helps in reaching such remote customers which otherwise would not even know the existence of your physical store. You can say the world becomes your audience with an ecommerce website Intended Audience : The document addresses all IT and Business stakeholders for bank, as well as SWQ Academy architecture, development and testing teams. Product Scope : The purchasing and selling of product or administration over electronic frameworks E Commerce website allows user to select any desired item, added to his cart, make purchase then select the payment method by COD or banking method like credit cards.
translation.ha: NOV,3,2022 B.TECH E-Commerce CVV Lambar tsaro ta  a bayan katin kiredit. Gabatarwa: Bayani: Shafin yanar gizo na e-commerce yana kula da musayar kaya da ayyuka don mu'amala ta lantarki ta kuɗi da kuma Cash-On-Delivery (COD). An daɗe ana yin ciniki a cikin tsarin buƙata da wadata. Shafin yanar gizo na E<TECH>commerce, ba kamar gidajen yanar gizo na gargajiya ba, yana taimakawa wajen siyan samfuran da aka nuna a cikin jerin samfuran. Mutane za su iya ziyartar gidan yanar gizon, zaɓar samfuran da suke so, shigar da bayanan da ake buƙata, yin biyan kuɗi (ko zaɓi biyan kuɗi daga baya), da siyan kayayyaki da ayyuka cikin ɗan lokaci. Gidan yanar gizon Ecommerce yana sauƙaƙe ma'amaloli ta kan layi tare da amfani da Bayanai da canja wurin kuɗi. An gudanar da kasuwancin e-commerce na baya ta amfani da kiran waya da imel. Duk da haka, a yau, ana iya yin dukkan hanyoyin da gidan yanar gizo guda ɗaya. Manufar: Gidan yanar gizon ecommerce yana nufin shagon kama-da-wane inda baƙi ke zuwa shagon, suna zaɓar samfuran da suka zaɓa, kuma suna zama abokan ciniki ta hanyar siyan su. Gidan yanar gizon ecommerce yana taimakawa wajen isa ga irin waɗannan abokan ciniki na nesa waɗanda in ba haka ba ba za su ma san wanzuwar shagon ku na zahiri ba. Kuna iya cewa duniya ta zama masu sauraron ku tare da gidan yanar gizon ecommerce. Masu Sauraro: Takardar tana magana da duk masu ruwa da tsaki na IT da Kasuwanci don banki, da kuma gine-ginen SWQ Academy, ci gaba da ƙungiyoyin gwaji. Faɗin Samfura: Siyan da sayar da samfura ko gudanarwa ta hanyar tsarin lantarki. Gidan yanar gizon E Commerce yana ba wa mai amfani <TECH> damar zaɓar duk wani abu da ake so, ƙara shi a cikin keken sa, yin siyayya sannan zaɓi hanyar biyan kuɗi ta hanyar COD ko hanyar banki kamar katunan kuɗi.

translation.en: The following factors affect the inland water ways in India. (i) Diversion of water of rivers for irrigation. (ii) Silting of river beds reduces the depth of river water. (iii) Seasonal ftuctuations in the water level of the rivers. (iv) Presence of bridges, water falls and cataracts in the course of rivers. (v) An unequal competition with railways and road ways. India’s inland water ways have not been developed as they can not compete with the railways and roads. INTEXT QUESTIONS 25.3 Answer the following questions briefly: (1) Name two main commodities which are usually carried by pipe line transport. (i) __________________________(ii)_________________________ (2) Which gas pipe line in India is the longest? ________________________________________________________ (3) Which port in India handles the largest cargo traffic? ________________________________________________________ (4) Name two main navigable rivers of India. (i) __________________________(ii)_________________________ 25.7 AIR TRANSPORT Air transport is the fastest and highly convenient mode of transport, although it is more costly than other modes. One can cover a journey between Delhi and Bangalore in about two and a half hours by an aeroplane while this distance is covered in about 42 hours by a railway express train. Air transport becomes very important in the regions where surface means of tranport are difficult to develop. These regions may have dense forests, marshy land, hilly terrain and high mountains. India is favourably situated on a busy international air route, connecting North America, Europe and South-west Asia on the one hand and East and South-east Asia together with Australia on the other.
translation.ha: Abubuwan da ke tafe suna shafar hanyoyin ruwa na cikin gida a Indiya. (i) Rage ruwan koguna don ban ruwa. (ii) Rage ruwan koguna yana rage zurfin ruwan kogi. (iii) Rage ruwan koguna a lokacin da ake shawagi a matakin ruwan koguna. (iv) Kasancewar gadoji, magudanar ruwa da kuma katangar ruwa a cikin koguna. (v) Gasar da ba ta daidaita ba da layin dogo da hanyoyin hanya. Ba a haɓaka hanyoyin ruwa na cikin gida na Indiya ba saboda ba za su iya yin gogayya da layin dogo da hanyoyi ba. TAMBAYOYIN RUBUTU 25.3 Amsa tambayoyin masu zuwa a taƙaice: (1) Faɗi manyan kayayyaki guda biyu waɗanda galibi ake ɗauka ta hanyar jigilar bututu. (i) __________________________(ii)__________________________________________ (2) Wace hanyar bututun iskar gas ce a Indiya ta fi tsayi? _____________________________________________________ (3) Wace tashar jiragen ruwa a Indiya ke kula da zirga-zirgar kaya mafi girma? _____________________________________________________ (4) Faɗi manyan koguna guda biyu masu tafiya a Indiya. (i) __________________________(ii)____________________________ 25.7 SUFURIN JIRGIN SAMA Sufurin sama shine hanya mafi sauri kuma mafi dacewa ta sufuri, kodayake yana da tsada fiye da sauran hanyoyi. Mutum zai iya tafiya tsakanin Delhi da Bangalore cikin kimanin awanni biyu da rabi ta jirgin sama yayin da wannan nisan zai kasance cikin kimanin awanni 42 ta jirgin ƙasa mai sauri. Sufurin sama yana da matuƙar muhimmanci a yankunan da hanyoyin sufuri na saman ƙasa ke da wahalar haɓaka. Waɗannan yankuna na iya suna da dazuzzuka masu yawa, ƙasa mai dausayi, ƙasa mai tuddai da tsaunuka masu tsayi. Indiya tana da kyau a kan hanyar jiragen sama ta duniya mai cike da cunkoso, tana haɗa Arewacin Amurka, Turai da Kudu maso Yammacin Asiya a gefe guda da Gabas da Kudu maso Gabashin Asiya tare da Ostiraliya a ɗayan gefen.
