translation.en: E-Commerce Management System SRS January 2025 • Product Browsing and Purchase: Browsing products, adding to cart, viewing cart, checkout, payment. • Order Management: Tracking orders, canceling orders. • Administrative Functions: Managing orders, viewing reports, managing cus- tomer accounts, managing the product catalog, and updating inventory. Objectives The diagram aims to: • Identify Actors: The diagram identifies the key actors interacting with the sys- tem, namely ”user” (general customer), ”admin,” and potentially other specialized actors (e.g., ”Actor1,” ”Actor2”). • Define Use Cases: The diagram defines the functionalities or services the system offers as use cases. These include: – User-related: login, register, logout, browse products, add products to cart, view cart, checkout and make payment, set address, track orders, cancel order. – Admin-related: manageorders,viewreports,managecustomeraccounts,man- age product catalog, update inventory levels. • Show Interactions: The diagram shows the interactions between actors and use cases using connecting lines. This clarifies which actor(s) can initiate which func- tionalities. • Illustrate Relationships between Use Cases: The diagram uses notations like include and extend to show relationships between use cases: – Include: The ”view cart” use case is included in the ”checkout and make payment” use case, indicating that viewing the cart is a mandatory step in the checkout process. – Extend: The ”checkout and make payment” use case extends the ”set ad- dress” use case, meaning setting the address is an optional or conditional step during checkout. • Provide a High-Level System Overview: The diagram offers a simplified overview of the system’s functionalities and how users interact with it. • Facilitate Communication: It serves as a communication tool between stake- holders(users,developers,analysts)todiscussandunderstandsystemrequirements. • Support Requirements Analysis: The diagram helps in gathering and organiz- ing user requirements and identifying the system’s functional scope. Explanation of Use Case Diagram This use case diagram depicts the functionalities of an E-commerce management system from the perspective of different actors (users). Let’s break it down descriptively: Page 10
translation.ha: Gudanar da Kasuwancin E-Commerce Tsarin SRS Janairu 2025 • Binciken Kayayyaki da Siyayya: Duba kayayyaki, ƙarawa a cikin keken siyayya, duba keken siyayya, biyan kuɗi, biyan kuɗi. • Gudanar da Oda: Bin diddigin oda, soke oda. • Ayyukan Gudanarwa: Gudanar da oda, duba rahotanni, sarrafa asusun abokin ciniki, sarrafa kundin samfurin, da sabunta kaya. Manufofi Tsarin yana nufin: • Gano 'Yan Wasan Kwaikwayo: Tsarin yana gano manyan 'yan wasan da ke hulɗa da tsarin, wato "mai amfani" (abokin ciniki na gaba ɗaya), "admin," da wataƙila wasu ƙwararrun 'yan wasan kwaikwayo (misali, "Actor1," "Actor2"). • Bayyana Lambobin Amfani: Tsarin yana bayyana ayyuka ko ayyukan da tsarin  ke bayarwa azaman lokutan amfani. Waɗannan sun haɗa da: - Mai amfani -mai alaƙa: <TECH>shiga, yi rijista, fita, bincika samfura, ƙara samfura zuwa keken siyayya, duba keken siyayya, biya da yin biyan kuɗi, saita adireshi, bibiyar oda, soke oda. – Mai alaƙa da Admin: manajaroda,duba rahotanni,sarrafa asusun abokan ciniki,sarrafa kundin samfura,sabuntawamatakan kaya. • Nuna Hulɗa: Zane yana nuna hulɗar da ke tsakanin 'yan wasan kwaikwayo da shari'o'in amfani ta amfani da layukan haɗi. Wannan yana fayyace waɗanne 'yan wasan kwaikwayo za su iya fara waɗanne ayyuka. • Bayyana Alaƙa tsakanin Shari'o'in Amfani: Zane yana amfani da alamun rubutu kamar haɗawa da faɗaɗa don nuna alaƙar da ke tsakanin shari'o'in amfani: – Haɗa: An haɗa shari'ar amfani da "duba keken siyayya" a cikin shari'ar amfani da "duba keken siyayya", yana nuna cewa kallon keken mataki ne na tilas a cikin tsarin biyan kuɗi. – Faɗaɗa: Shari'ar amfani da "biya da yin biyan kuɗi" tana faɗaɗa shari'ar amfani da "adireshin da aka saita", ma'ana saita adireshin mataki ne na zaɓi ko na sharaɗi yayin biyan kuɗi. • Bayar da Babban Bayani na Tsarin: Zane yana ba da taƙaitaccen bayani mai sauƙi game da ayyukan tsarin da yadda masu amfani ke hulɗa da shi. • Sauƙaƙa Sadarwa: Yana aiki a matsayin kayan aiki na sadarwa tsakanin masu ruwa da tsaki (masu amfani, masu haɓakawa, masu nazari) don tattaunawa da fahimtar buƙatun tsarin. • Binciken Bukatun Tallafi: Tsarin yana taimakawa wajen tattarawa da tsara buƙatun mai amfani da kuma gano iyakokin aikin tsarin. Bayani game da Tsarin Shari'a na Amfani Wannan zane na amfani yana nuna ayyukan tsarin gudanarwa na kasuwancin e-commerce <TECH> daga mahangar masu amfani daban-daban (masu amfani). The schedulers can receive up to 6 micro-ops per cycle (the dispatch width is 6). There are four ALU schedulers, one AGU (for loads and stores) scheduler, and one FP (floating point) scheduler. The AGU scheduler is connected to two load AGUs (address generation units) and one store AGU. EachsuchAGUcanprocessoneµOPpercycle. Thefloatingpoint(FP)schedulerissimilarlyconnected totwoFPmultiplyandtwoFPaddunits. EachFPmultiplyunitcanalsoprocesstheFMAinstruction (fused multiply and add). The SIMD data path is 256 bits in the Zen 2 core. This means that if we have packed single precision floating point numbers, then we can operate on 8 pairs of such numbers in parallel. Onceaninstructionisscheduled,itreadsthevaluesfromthecorrespondingregisterfileandproceeds towards the execution units. The Zen2 core has an elaborate load-store unit that contains an LSQ that can forward values from earlier stores to later loads, track in-flight cache misses, and support x86’s complex addressing modes. TheZen2corehasan180-entrygeneralpurposephysicalregisterfileforstoringintegersandmemory addresses, and an 160-entry vector register file in the floating point unit. The four integer ALUs and

Masu tsara jadawalin na iya karɓar har zuwa ƙananan ayyuka 6 a kowane zagaye (faɗin aikawa shine 6). Akwai masu tsara jadawalin ALU guda huɗu, mai tsara jadawalin AGU guda ɗaya (don kaya da shaguna), da mai tsara jadawalin FP guda ɗaya (mai iyo). Mai tsara jadawalin AGU yana da alaƙa da AGU guda biyu (raka'o'in samar da adireshi) da AGU ɗaya a shago. KowannensuAGU zai iya aiwatarwa µOpercycle. Jadawalin floatingpoint (FP) yana da alaƙa iri ɗaya da FP guda biyu da ƙari biyu na FP. Kowane FP multiply unit kuma yana iya aiwatar da umarnin FMA (haɗa ninkawa da ƙarawa). Hanyar bayanai ta SIMD  ragowa 256 ne a cikin zuciyar Zen 2. Wannan yana nufin cewa idan mun tattara lambobin maki masu iyo daidai gwargwado guda ɗaya, to za mu iya aiki akan nau'i-nau'i 8 na irin waɗannan lambobi a layi ɗaya. Da zarar an tsara umarni, yana karanta ƙimar daga fayil ɗin rajista mai dacewa kuma yana ci gaba zuwa ga sassan aiwatarwa. Core Zen2 yana da wani ingantaccen sashin adana kaya wanda ya ƙunshi LSQ wanda zai iya tura ƙima daga shagunan da suka gabata zuwa lodi na baya, bin diddigin kuskuren cache a cikin jirgin, da tallafawa hanyoyin magancewa masu rikitarwa na x86. Zen2corehasan180-shigarwa manufa gabaɗaya fayil ɗin fisiksi don adana integers da adiresoshin ƙwaƙwalwa, da fayil ɗin rajista na vector mai shigarwa 160 a cikin sashin maki mai iyo. translation.en: Requirements on LIN AUTOSAR CP Release 4.4.0 Rationale: -- Use Case: If there are more than one LIN channels, than there exist more than one LDF-files. Dependencies: -- Supporting Material: Comparing with the ISO 17987 specifications’ APIs, the LIN Interface init will do both work of l_ifc_init and l_sys_init ⌋( RS_BRF_01768, RS_BRF_01136,RS_BRF_01096) 4.1.2.2.2 [SRS_Lin_01570] The LIN Interface shall support dynamic selection of configuration sets. ⌈ Type: Valid Description: The LIN Interface shall support the dynamic selection of at least one static configuration set by a parameter passed via the initialization interface. The selection of the appropriate configuration set itself as well as the way to incorporate the configuration sets into the ECU (Post-Build, Pre- Compile) is not affected by this requirement. Rationale: Support of different configurations during runtime Use Case: -- Dependencies: -- Supporting Material: -- ⌋( RS_BRF_01768,RS_BRF_01136) 4.1.2.3 Normal Operation 4.1.2.3.1 [SRS_Lin_01564] A Schedule Table Manager shall be available for LIN master nodes. ⌈ Type: Valid Description: This requirement is only applicable to LIN master nodes. The schedule table manager will keep schedule table to execute. The schedule table manager shall:  Be able to receive requests from an upper layer which schedule table to execute  Keep a list of schedule table  Execute a schedule table once or continuously One or more modules from an upper layer will create a sequence of schedule tables and request the schedule table manager to execute specific schedule tables. Priority handling is not handled inside LinStack. The schedule table manager will only coordinate the running schedule table and schedule table requests. There exist one memory space for the "continuously execution schedule table", it will be overwritten by a newer request. Rationale: In the ISO 17987 specifications, the application interfaces directly to the LIN API. In AUTOSAR above modules shall be able to independently request a schedule table to be executed. Therefore the schedule table manager is a necessarily extension to the schedule table handler. Use Case: Example system start: a) "Run"- schedule table (execution continuously, low priority 1 ) b) "Wakeup"- schedule table (execution one time, high priority 10) c) "Node-01-init"- schedule table (execution one time, high priority 9) d) "Node-02-init"- schedule table (execution one time, high priority 8) 14 of 34 Document ID 042: AUTOSAR_SRS_LIN - AUTOSAR -
translation.ha: Bukatu akan LIN AUTOSAR CP Release 4.4.0 Dalili: -- Amfani da Lamba: Idan akwai tashoshin LIN sama da ɗaya, to akwai fayilolin LDF sama da ɗaya. Mai sarrafa teburin jadawalin zai ajiye teburin jadawalin don aiwatarwa. Manajan teburin jadawalin zai:  Zai iya karɓar buƙatu daga babban Layer wanda ke tsara jadawalin don aiwatarwa  Ajiye jerin teburin jadawalin  Aiwatar da teburin jadawalin sau ɗaya ko ci gaba Ɗaya ko fiye daga babban Layer zai ƙirƙira jerin teburin jadawalin kuma ya nemi mai sarrafa teburin jadawalin don aiwatar da takamaiman teburin jadawalin. Ba a kula da kula da fifiko a cikin LinStack ba. Manajan teburin jadawalin zai daidaita buƙatun teburin jadawalin aiki da teburin jadawalin kawai. Akwai sarari ɗaya na ƙwaƙwalwar ajiya don "teburin jadawalin aiwatarwa akai-akai", sabon buƙata zai sake rubuta shi. Dalili: A cikin ƙayyadaddun bayanai na ISO 17987, aikace-aikacen  yana haɗuwa kai tsaye zuwa LIN API. A cikin AUTOSAR da ke sama, za su za su iya neman teburin jadawalin da kansu don aiwatarwa. Saboda haka, manajan teburin jadawalin dole ne tsawaitawa ga mai sarrafa teburin jadawalin. Amfani da Lakabi: Misali tsarin fara: a) "Gudu"- jadawalin jadawalin (aiwatarwa akai-akai, ƙaramin fifiko 1) b) "Tashi"- teburin jadawalin (aiwatarwa sau ɗaya, babban fifiko 10) c) "Node-01-init"- teburin jadawalin (aiwatarwa sau ɗaya, babban fifiko 9) d) "Node-02-init"- teburin jadawalin (aiwatarwa sau ɗaya, babban fifiko 8) 14 na 34 ID na Takarda 042: AUTOSAR_SRS_LIN - AUTOSAR -

translation.en: Software Requirements Specification for Pharmaceutical System Page 24 3.5.2 Functional Requirements REQ-41: The system shall monitor the stock levels of the medication inventory to ensure that a medication does not drop below 50% of its max capacity. [H] [“Pharmacy Medical Inventory System”] REQ-41.1: The system shall notify the pharmacist if a medication’s supply drops below 50% capacity. REQ-42: The system shall notify pharmacy staff of medication that must be disposed of because it is mislabeled. [H] [“Pharmacy Medical Inventory System”] REQ-42.1: Mislabeled medication refers to medication whose national drug code, brand name, generic name, form, dosage strength, total amount, lot number, expiration date, medication instructions, manufacturer date, distribution source, or barcode is incorrect when compared to its entry in DailyMed. REQ-43: The system shall notify pharmacy staff of medication which is set to expire within the next two months. [H] [“Pharmacy Medical Inventory System”] REQ-44: The system shall track a medication’s location, from the supplier’s warehouse to sale in the pharmacy. [H] [“Pharmacy Medical Inventory System”] REQ-45: The system shall allow the creation of user roles for different staff members, with different permissions associated. [H] [“Pharmacy Medical Inventory System”] REQ-46: The system shall notify suppliers of any failed delivery, after its inspection. [H] [“Pharmacy Medical Inventory System”] REQ-46.1: Failed deliveries occur when a delivery does not include the entire shipment of ordered medication, has been tampered, or does not include accurate medication instructions and information. REQ-46.2: The system shall allow pharmacy staff to submit return requests to their suppliers following a failed delivery. REQ-47: The system shall update the stock levels following a successful delivery
translation.ha: Bayanin Bukatun Software don Pharmaceutical Tsarin Shafi na 24 3.5.2 Bukatun Aiki REQ-41: Tsarin zai sa ido kan matakan ajiyar magunguna don tabbatar da cewa magani bai faɗi ƙasa da kashi 50% na matsakaicin ƙarfinsa ba. [H] ["Kayan Magungunan Magunguna Tsarin"] REQ-41.1: Tsarin zai sanar da mai sayar da magani idan wadatar magani ta faɗi ƙasa da kashi 50%. REQ-42: Tsarin zai sanar da ma'aikatan kantin magani game da magungunan da dole ne a zubar da su  saboda ba a sanya musu suna ba daidai. [H] [“Kayan Magungunan Magunguna <TECH>Tsarin”] REQ-42.1: Maganin da aka yi wa lakabi da ba daidai ba yana nufin maganin da lambar magungunan ƙasa, sunan alama, sunan gabaɗaya, siffar, ƙarfin allura, jimillar adadin, lambar wurin da aka yi amfani da shi, ranar ƙarewa, umarnin magani, ranar da aka ƙera, tushen rarrabawa, ko lambar barcode ba daidai ba ne idan aka kwatanta da shigarsa a cikin DailyMed. REQ-43: Tsarin   zai sanar da ma'aikatan kantin magani game da maganin da aka saita zai ƙare cikin watanni biyu masu zuwa. [H] [“Kayan Magungunan Magunguna <TECH>Tsarin”] REQ-44: Tsarin   zai bi diddigin wurin da magani yake, daga ma'ajiyar mai kaya zuwa siyarwa a cikin kantin magani. [H] [“Kayan Magungunan Magunguna <TECH>Tsarin”] REQ-45: Tsarin   zai ba da damar ƙirƙirar matsayin <TECH>mai amfani ga ma'aikata daban-daban, tare da izini daban-daban da ke da alaƙa. [H] [“Kayan Magungunan Magunguna Tsarin”] REQ-46: Tsarin  zai sanar da masu samar da kayayyaki game da duk wani isar da kaya da ya gaza, bayan an duba shi. [H] [“Kayan Magungunan Magunguna Tsarin”] REQ-46.1: Isasshen da ya gaza yana faruwa ne lokacin da isarwa ba ta haɗa da jigilar maganin da aka yi oda gaba ɗaya ba, an yi masa ɓarna, ko kuma bai haɗa da umarnin magunguna daidai da bayanai na Tsarin ba. REQ-46.2: Tsarin   zai ba ma'aikatan kantin magani damar gabatar da buƙatun dawowa ga masu samar da kayayyaki bayan isarwa da ya gaza. REQ-47: Tsarin <TECH>  zai sabuntawa matakan hannun jari bayan isarwa da ya yi nasara

translation.en: Development of Mineral and Energy Resources MODULE - 8 Economic activities and  Bauxite is the ore from which aluminium metal is extracted. Infrastructural development in  Bauxite is used for manufacturing white colour cement and certain India chemicals.  Major reserves occur in Jharkhand, Maharashtra, Madhya Pradesh, Chhatisgarh, Gujarat, Karnataka, Tamil Nadu, Goa and Uttar Pradesh. (B) Non-metallic Minerals Notes A large number of non-metallic minerals are found in India but only a few of these are commercially important. They are limestone, dolomite, mica, kyanite, sillimanite, gypsum and phosphate. These minerals are used in a variety of industries such as cement, fertilizers, refractories and electrical goods. In this lesson we will be studying about mica and limestone. (i) Mica India is the leading producer in sheet mica. It was one of the indispensable minerals used in electrical and electronic industries till recently. However its synthetic substitute has reduced our exports as well as production considerably. Distribution Although mica is widely distributed but workable deposits occur in three principle belts. They are in the states of Andhra Pradesh, Jharkhand, Bihar and Rajasthan. Bihar and Jharkhand produces the high-quality ruby mica. The mica belt in Bihar and Jharkhand extends from Gaya district in the west through Hazaribagh and Munger district to Bhagalpur district in the east. Outside this main belt, mica occurs in Dhanbad, Palamau, Ranchi and Singhbhum district. The state supplies more than 80% of the india’s output. In Andhra Pradesh mica is found in a belt in Nellore district. Rajasthan is the third largest mica producing state. The mica, bearning zone, covers the districts of Jaipur, Udaipur, Bhilwara, Ajmer and Kishangarh. The quality of mica is inferior. Besides these three belts, some deposits occur in Kerala, Tamil Nadu and Madhya Pradesh. Mica mining in India was mainly done for export. The principal importing country was the U.S.A. which took about 50 percent of the exports. (ii) Limestone Limestone is used in a wide range of industries. 76 percent of the country’s total consumption is used in cement industry, 16 percent in iron and steel industry and 4 percent in chemical industries. The remaining 4 percent is GEOGRAPHY 173
translation.ha: Ci gaban Albarkatun Ma'adinai da Makamashi MASU KYAU - 8 Ayyukan tattalin arziki da  Bauxite shine ma'adinin da ake fitar da ƙarfen aluminum daga ciki. Ci gaban ababen more rayuwa a  Ana amfani da Bauxite don kera siminti mai launin fari da wasu sinadarai na Indiya.  Manyan ajiyayyun suna faruwa a Jharkhand, Maharashtra, Madhya Pradesh, Chhatisgarh, Gujarat, Karnataka, Tamil Nadu, Goa da Uttar Pradesh. (B) Ma'adanai marasa ƙarfe Bayani dalla-dalla Ana samun adadi mai yawa na ma'adanai marasa ƙarfe a Indiya amma kaɗan ne kawai daga cikinsu suna da mahimmanci a kasuwanci. Su ne dutse mai laushi, dolomite, mica, kyanite, sillimanite, gypsum da phosphate. Ana amfani da waɗannan ma'adanai a masana'antu daban-daban kamar siminti, takin zamani, abubuwan da ba su da amfani da kayan lantarki. A cikin wannan darasin za mu yi nazari game da mica da dutse mai laushi. (i) Mica India ita ce babbar mai samar da takarda mica. Yana ɗaya daga cikin ma'adanai masu mahimmanci da ake amfani da su a masana'antar lantarki da lantarki har zuwa kwanan nan. Duk da haka, madadinsa na roba ya rage fitar da kayayyaki da kuma samarwa sosai. Rarrabawa Duk da cewa mica tana yaɗuwa sosai amma tana aiki a cikin bel guda uku masu mahimmanci. Suna cikin jihohin Andhra Pradesh, Jharkhand, Bihar da Rajasthan. Bihar da Jharkhand suna samar da mica mai inganci mai ruby. Bel ɗin mica a Bihar da Jharkhand ya tashi daga gundumar Gaya a yamma ta hanyar gundumar Hazaribagh da Munger zuwa gundumar Bhagalpur a gabas. A wajen wannan babban bel ɗin, mica tana faruwa a gundumar Dhanbad, Palamau, Ranchi da Singhbhum. Jihar tana samar da fiye da kashi 80% na yawan amfanin Indiya. A Andhra Pradesh, ana samun mica a cikin bel a gundumar Nellore. Rajasthan ita ce jiha ta uku mafi girma da ke samar da mica. Yankin mica, wanda ke ɗauke da bearning, ya mamaye gundumomin Jaipur, Udaipur, Bhilwara, Ajmer da Kishangarh. Ingancin mica bai kai haka ba. Bayan waɗannan bel guda uku, wasu ma'adanai suna faruwa a Kerala, Tamil Nadu da Madhya Pradesh. Ana haƙar Mica a Indiya galibi don fitarwa. Babban ƙasar da ke shigo da kaya ita ce Amurka wadda ta ɗauki kusan kashi 50 cikin 100 na fitar da kaya. (ii) Ana amfani da dutsen Limestone a fannoni daban-daban. Kashi 76 cikin 100 na jimillar amfani da ake yi a ƙasar ana amfani da shi ne a masana'antar siminti, kashi 16 cikin 100 a masana'antar ƙarfe da ƙarfe, da kuma kashi 4 cikin 100 a masana'antar sinadarai. Sauran kashi 4 cikin 100 shine GEOGRAPHY 173

translation.en: On many occasions we buy jewelry, but we are often in a mess and in a hurry to choose the right and the best. Also, often we do not have enough time to shop and buy as it should. In addition, in many cases, we may need a specific piece and we do not know which markets are providing it. So, we look forward to create an electronic market for gold that makes it easier for users to shop and buy easily and quickly. Reducing effort and trouble, with distinctive quality and high reliability.
translation.ha: A lokuta da yawa muna siyan kayan ado, amma sau da yawa muna cikin rikici kuma muna cikin gaggawa don zaɓar abin da ya dace da mafi kyau. Haka kuma, sau da yawa ba mu da isasshen lokaci don siyayya da siyayya kamar yadda ya kamata . Bugu da ƙari, a lokuta da yawa, muna iya buƙatar takamaiman yanki kuma ba mu san waɗanne kasuwanni ne ke ba da shi ba. Don haka, muna fatan <TECH>ƙirƙirar kasuwar lantarki don zinare wanda ke sauƙaƙa wa masu amfani su siyayya da siyayya cikin sauƙi da sauri. Rage ƙoƙari da wahala, tare da inganci na musamman da babban aminci</TECH>.

translation.en: Sport Facility Booking System Kirtan Shah 2. Development & Implementation  Develop features and functionalities (e.g., user registration, booking, payment)  Write code for frontend and backend, including integration with Razorpay for payments  Conduct peer code reviews for quality assurance 3. Testing  Perform unit and integration testing for new features  Conduct user acceptance testing (UAT) with stakeholders  Address defects and improvements from testing feedback 4. Integration & Deployment  Integrate developed features into the main codebase  Deploy the updated application to a staging or testing environment for review  Implement security measures and ensure data integrity 5. Review & Retrospective  Review sprint outcomes and gather feedback from stakeholders  Conduct retrospective with the development team to identify improvements  Document lessons learned and adjustments for the next sprint 6. Release Increment  Release completed features to the production environment  Ensure that the release includes stable and well-tested functionality  Update documentation and release notes for users and stakeholders Time and Resource Estimates (for each Sprint)  Sprint Planning: 1 day, product owner and development team  Development & Implementation: 7-10 days, 4 developers  Testing: 3-4 days, 2 testers  Integration & Deployment: 1-2 days, 1 DevOps engineer  Review & Retrospective: 1 day, development team and stakeholders  Release Increment: 1 day, product owner and release manager 95

translation.en: 719 Smruti R. Sarangi becomes, n(cid:46)k(cid:107)(cid:46)c(cid:107)(cid:46)h(cid:46)w(cid:46) r(cid:46)s (14.13) The steps are as follows (keep referring to Figure 14.6). In Figure 14.6, there are no connections betweentheverticalandhorizontalwires. Notethattherearenoconnectionsymbols(filleddarkcircles) at their intersections. For systolic transfer between the PEs, the vertical links are used. Note that the arrows between PEs (denoting systolic transfer) are conceptual: they are only showing the direction of the flow of data. Phase I First for a given (k,c) pair we need to load the filter weights in the PEs. Each PE can issue reads to the GB via the NoC. We arrange the filters as follows. Each row of the 2D-array corresponds to one channel (c ...c ), and each column of this array corresponds to a given ofmap 1 4 (total of K (=4) such ofmaps). We thus have C rows and K columns. Phase II For each channel, we send a block of values from the corresponding ifmap along the rows. We have a choice here, either we can send data byte by byte, pixel by pixel, or as a tile of pixels. Normally the last approach (a tile of pixels) is preferred. In this case, we send a tile of pixels for each channel. The important point to note is that all the tiles have the same coordinates (same h and w values). Phase III Each PE computes the convolutions between the input data and the filter data. Phase IV Note that all the partial sums computed in each column need to be added to get the value of the corresponding output pixels. We need to sum up the values column-wise. This can be done in two ways. We can either have a tree of adders at the end of each column. All the values can be sent to the adder tree via the NoC. This is known as parallel reduction. The other option is to opt for a systolic transfer. A PE in the highest row transfers its partial sums to the PE below it (in thesamecolumn). ThisPEaddsthereceivedpartialsumswiththepartialsumsithascomputed, and transfers the result to the PE below. This process continues, and finally the result leaves the PE array via the last row of PEs (bottom row in Figure 14.6). Input Stationary Architecture We derived the following mapping in Section 14.2.2. n(cid:46)h(cid:48)(cid:107)w(cid:48)(cid:107)k(cid:46)r(cid:46)s(cid:46) c(cid:46)h(cid:48)(cid:48)(cid:46)w(cid:48)(cid:48) The aim was to map C input tiles with the same coordinates to a PE. We just need to stream all the filters and the PE can compute all the K outputs. These outputs can then be streamed out via the vertical links. This is shown in Figure 14.7. Note that we are running the PEs independently in this case. We can do better. We can parallelize thecomputationsdifferently. Considerthefollowingmappingwherewesplitthechannelsforeachifmap tile across the rows. n(cid:46)h(cid:48)(cid:107)w(cid:48)(cid:107)(cid:46)c(cid:107)k(cid:46)r(cid:46)s(cid:46) h(cid:48)(cid:48)(cid:46)w(cid:48)(cid:48) (14.14) ThecorrespondingdataflowisshowninFigure14.8. Ineachcolumnwestoretheinputsforthesame ofmap tile: oneifmap tileperchannel. Thenwesendthefilterweightsdowntherows. Forchannelcand ofmap k, we send F[k][c][...] on the row corresponding to channel c. The PEs compute a convolution between the filter weights and the stored input tile to get a set of partial sums. Note that all the PEs in each column compute partial sums for the same ofmap tile; hence, all that we have to do is send the partial sums down the column. Each PE adds its computed partial sums to the values it receives from its neighbor above it. It passes the result to the PE below it. This is an example of a systolic transfer.
translation.ha: 719 Smruti R. Sarangi ya zama, n(cid:46)k(cid:107)(cid:46)c(cid:107)(cid:46)h(cid:46)w(cid:46)r(cid:46)s (14.13) Matakan sune kamar haka (ci gaba da komawa zuwa Hoto na 14.6). A cikin Hoto na 14.6, babu wata alaƙa tsakanin theverticaldahorizontalwires. Lura cewa babu alamun haɗin kai (cike da da'irori masu duhu) a mahadar su. Don canja wurin systolic tsakanin PEs, ana amfani da hanyoyin haɗin tsaye. Lura cewa kiban da ke tsakanin PEs (wanda ke nuna canja wurin systolic) ra'ayi ne kawai: suna nuna alkiblar kwararar bayanai na  ne kawai. Mataki na I na Farko don nau'in (k,c) da aka bayar muna buƙatar ɗora nauyin matattara a cikin PEs. Kowane PE zai iya fitar da karantawa zuwa GB ta hanyar NoC. Mun shirya matatun kamar haka. Kowane layi na jerin 2D ya yi daidai da tasha ɗaya (c ...c), kuma kowane ginshiƙi na wannan jeri ya yi daidai da taswirar da aka bayar 1 4 (jimillar taswirorin K (=4)). Don haka muna da layukan C da ginshiƙan K. Mataki na II Ga kowane tasha, muna aika wani toshiyar ƙima daga taswirar ifmap mai dacewa tare da layuka. Muna da zaɓi a nan, ko dai za mu iya aika byte bayanai ta hanyar byte, pixel ta hanyar pixel, ko kuma a matsayin tayal na pixels. Yawanci hanyar ƙarshe (tayil na pixels) an fi so. A wannan yanayin, muna aika tayal na pixels ga kowane tasha. Muhimmin abin lura shi ne cewa duk tayal ɗin suna da daidaito iri ɗaya (ƙimar h da w iri ɗaya). Mataki na III Kowane PE yana ƙididdige haɗuwa tsakanin shigarwar bayanai da tace bayanai. Mataki na IV Lura cewa duk jimillar da aka ƙididdige a cikin kowane ginshiƙi yana buƙatar a ƙara su don samun ƙimar pixels ɗin fitarwa masu dacewa. Muna buƙatar taƙaita ƙimar ta hanyar ginshiƙi. Ana iya yin wannan ta hanyoyi biyu. Ko dai mu sami bishiyar masu ƙara a ƙarshen kowane ginshiƙi. Ana iya aika duk ƙimar zuwa bishiyar mai ƙara ta hanyar NoC. Wannan an san shi da raguwar layi ɗaya. Sauran zaɓin shine a zaɓi canja wurin systolic. PE a cikin mafi girman layi yana canja wurin jimlar sa zuwa PE da ke ƙasa da shi (a cikin ginshiƙi ɗaya). Wannan PE yana ƙara adadin da aka karɓa tare da adadin masu ƙara a cikin sumsithas an lissafta, kuma yana canja wurin sakamakon zuwa PE da ke ƙasa. Wannan tsari yana ci gaba, kuma a ƙarshe sakamakon ya bar jerin PE ta layin ƙarshe na PEs (layin ƙasa a Hoto na 14.6). Tsarin Shigarwa Na Tsare-tsare Mun samo taswirar mai zuwa a Sashe na 14.2.2. n(cid:46)h(cid:48)(cid:107)w(cid:48)(cid:107)k(cid:46)r(cid:46)s(cid:46)c(cid:46)h(cid:48)(cid:48)(cid:46)w(cid:48)(cid:48)Manufar ita ce a tsara faifan shigarwar C tare da daidaitawa iri ɗaya zuwa PE. Kawai muna buƙatar yawo duk matattara kuma PE na iya ƙididdige duk fitowar K. Ana iya yawo waɗannan fitarwa ta hanyar hanyoyin haɗin tsaye. Wannan an nuna shi a Hoto na 14.7. Lura cewa muna gudanar da PEs daban-daban a wannan yanayin. Za mu iya yin mafi kyau. Za mu iya daidaita lissafin ta hanyoyi daban-daban. Yi la'akari da taswirar mai zuwainda muka raba tashoshi don yawo a cikin taswirar taswirar a cikin layuka. n(cid:46)h(cid:48)(cid:107)w(cid:48)(cid:107)w(cid:48)(cid:107)(cid:46)c(cid:107)k(cid:46)r(cid:46)s(cid:46)h(cid:48)(cid:48)(cid:46)w(cid:48)(cid:48)(cid:48)(cid:46)w(cid:48)(cid:48) (14.14) Bayanan da suka dace suna nuna hoto na 14.8. Ajiyar bayanai don tayal ɗin taswira iri ɗaya: tayal ɗin taswira ɗaya. Sannan a aika da nauyin tacewa ƙasa layuka. Don tashar tashar k, muna aika F[k][c][...] akan layin da ya dace da tashar c. PEs suna ƙididdige haɗuwa tsakanin nauyin tacewa da tayal ɗin shigarwa da aka adana don samun saitin jimillar jimilla. Lura cewa duk PEs a cikin kowane ginshiƙi suna ƙididdige jimillar jimilla don tayal ɗin taswira iri ɗaya; Saboda haka, abin da kawai za mu yi shi ne aika jimlar da aka ƙididdige zuwa ginshiƙi. Kowane PE yana ƙara jimlar da aka ƙididdige ta zuwa ƙimar da ya karɓa daga maƙwabcinsa da ke sama da shi. Yana aika sakamakon zuwa PE da ke ƙasa da shi. Wannan misali ne na canja wurin systolic.

User Feedback Integration:  Example: Feedback from initial user testing was not gathered until late in the development cycle, resulting in the late identification of usability issues that required significant rework.  Consideration: We must determine whether our approach to gathering user feedback was flawed or if we simply did not prioritize user involvement throughout the development process. Establishing regular check-ins with users for feedback could enhance future projects. By analysing these considerations, we can better understand the complexities behind the challenges faced during the project. This reflection will guide us in refining our methodologies and practices for future projects, ultimately leading to more effective project outcomes. 115

translation.en: MODULE - 4 Weather and Climate The domain of Air on the Earth correct statements and false against wrong ones. 1. Higher the latitude lower is the temperature. 2. Higher the altitude lower is the temperature. Notes 3. Nearer the sea coast lower is the range of temperature. 4. Interiors of the continent have lower range of temperature. 5. Cold ocean currents lower the temperature of the coast. 13.3 CLASSIFICATION OF CLIMATE The varied effect of the major weather elements in different parts of the world and also the varied nature of the earth’s surface give every location a distinct climate. Hence, the number of different climate is large. In order to easily understand and comprehend this large variety, the climate of the world have been classified into a few major groups, each having certain common important characteristics. Although several attempts have been made by scholars to classify the climate of the world for the proper understanding of major climate types no single classification is perfect, as climate stands for the generalized and composite weather conditions. However, the Greeks, perhaps, made the first attempt to classify the world climates on the basis of the distribution of temperature and insolation. They divided the world into five latitudinal thermal zones, The boundary of these zones are fixed on the basis of the angle at which the sun’s rays strike the earth. The following are the five thermal zones. Fig. 13.1 Thermal Zone 242 GEOGRAPHY
translation.ha: MASU KYAU - 4 Yanayi da Yanayi Yankin Iska a Duniya ya dace da kalamai kuma karya ne akan waɗanda ba daidai ba. 1. Mafi girma daga latitude ƙasa da yanayin zafi. 2. Mafi girma daga tsayi ƙasa da yanayin zafi. Bayani 3. Kusa da gabar teku ƙasa da yanayin zafin. 4. Cikin nahiyar yana da ƙarancin yanayin zafi. 5. Ruwan teku mai sanyi yana rage zafin bakin teku. 13.3 RANGWAMEN YANAYI Tasirin manyan abubuwan yanayi a sassa daban-daban na duniya da kuma bambancin yanayin saman duniya yana ba wa kowane wuri yanayi na musamman. Saboda haka, adadin yanayi daban-daban yana da girma. Domin a fahimci da fahimtar wannan babban nau'in, an rarraba yanayin duniya zuwa wasu manyan rukuni, kowannensu yana da wasu halaye masu mahimmanci iri ɗaya. Duk da cewa masana sun yi ƙoƙari da yawa don rarraba yanayin duniya don fahimtar manyan nau'ikan yanayi, babu rarrabuwa ɗaya da ta dace, kamar yadda yanayi ke wakiltar yanayin yanayi na gabaɗaya da na haɗaka. Duk da haka, wataƙila Girkawa sun yi ƙoƙarin farko na rarraba yanayin duniya bisa ga rarrabawar zafin jiki da kuma rufewa. Sun raba duniya zuwa yankuna biyar na zafi na latitudinal, Iyakar waɗannan yankuna an saita su bisa ga kusurwar da hasken rana ke bugi duniya. Ga waɗannan yankuna biyar na zafi. Proceed to step . When the indicator is flashing slowly The speaker is searching for BLUETOOTH connections. To pair the speaker with a second or subsequent BLUETOOTH device (when the speaker has pairing information of other BLUETOOTH devices), proceed to step . To reconnect the speaker with one of the BLUETOOTH devices that have been paired with the speaker before, proceed to step . Depending on the BLUETOOTH device, the speaker may be reconnected with the device right after it is turned on. For details, refer to the operating instructions supplied with your BLUETOOTH device. When the indicator stays lit The speaker is already connected with one of the BLUETOOTH devices. Dangane da na'urar BLUETOOTH, lasifikar na iya sake haɗawa da na'urar bayan an kunna ta. Don ƙarin bayani, duba umarnin aiki da aka bayar tare da na'urar BL<TECH>UETOOTH. translation.en: MODULE - 4 Insolation and Temperature The domain of Air on the Earth (II) Horizontal Distribution of Temperature in July During this period the sun shines vertically overhead near the Tropic of Cancer. Hence, high temperatures are found in the entire northern hemisphere. Isotherm of 30°C passes between 10° N and 40° N latitudes. The regions having this temperature include South Western USA, the Sahara, the Arabia, Notes Iraq, Iran, Afghanistan, desert region of India and China. However, lowest temperature of 0°C is also noticed in the Northern Hemisphere during summer in the central part of Greenland (see fig. 10.7) During summer in the northern hemisphere, isotherms bend equatorward while crossing oceans and polewards while crossing landmasses. In southern Hemisphere the position of isotherms is just opposite. Fig. 10.7 Horizontal Distribution of Temperature (July) lsotherms are wide spaced over oceans while they are closely spaced over landmasses. A comparison between the January and July isotherm maps reveals the following important characteristics. The latitudinal shifting of highest temperature as a result of migration of the vertical rays of the sun. The occurance of highest values in the low latitudes and the lowest value in the high latitudes is due to the decreasing insolation from equator to the poles. In northern hemisphere the isotherms on leaving the land usually bend rather sharply towards poles in winter and towards the equator in the summer. This behaviour of the isotherms is due to the differential heating and cooling of landmasses. The continents are hotter in the summer and colder in the winter than the oceans. 186 GEOGRAPHY
translation.ha: MA'AUNI - 4 Insolation da Zafin Jiki Yankin Iska a Duniya (II) Rarraba Zafin Jiki a Kwance a watan Yuli A wannan lokacin rana tana haskakawa a tsaye kusa da Tropic of Cancer. Saboda haka, ana samun yanayin zafi mai yawa a duk yankin arewacin duniya. Isotherm na 30°C yana ratsa tsakanin 10° N da 40° N latitudes. Yankunan da ke da wannan yanayin zafi sun haɗa da Kudancin Yammacin Amurka, Sahara, Arabiya, Bayanan kula Iraq, Iran, Afghanistan, yankin hamada na Indiya da China. Duk da haka, mafi ƙarancin zafin jiki na 0°C kuma ana lura da shi a Arewacin Duniya a lokacin bazara a tsakiyar Greenland (duba hoto na 10.7) A lokacin bazara a yankin arewacin duniya, isotherms suna lanƙwasa zuwa ga equator yayin da suke ratsa tekuna da sanduna yayin da suke ratsa ƙasa. A kudancin duniya, matsayin isotherms yana akasin haka. Hoto na 10.7 Rarraba Zafin Jiki a Kwance (Yuli) ltherms suna da faɗi a kan tekuna yayin da suke da nisa kusa da ƙasa. Kwatanta tsakanin taswirar isotherm na Janairu da Yuli ya bayyana waɗannan muhimman halaye. Canjin yanayin zafi mafi girma a latitudinal sakamakon ƙaura daga hasken rana a tsaye. Kasancewar mafi girman ƙima a cikin ƙananan latitudes da mafi ƙarancin ƙima a cikin manyan latitudes ya faru ne saboda raguwar insolation daga equator zuwa sandunan. A arewacin hemisphere, isotherms idan aka bar ƙasa yawanci suna lanƙwasawa sosai zuwa sandunan a lokacin hunturu da kuma zuwa equator a lokacin rani. Wannan halayyar isotherms ta faru ne saboda bambancin dumama da sanyaya ƙasa. Nahiyoyi sun fi zafi a lokacin rani kuma sun fi sanyi a lokacin hunturu fiye da tekuna. 186 GEOGRAPHY

translation.en: Smruti R. Sarangi 464 Term Meaning States I Invalid state. This means that the block is not present in the cache. S Shared state. The block can be read and evicted seamlessly. However, we cannot write to the block. M Modified state. We can read or write to the block. Cache actions and events Rd Read request Wr Write request Evict Eviction request for a block. Wb Write back data to the lower level. Update Updatethecopyoftheblockwithvaluessentonthe bus. Messages on the bus RdX Read miss WrX Write miss Broadcast Broadcast a write on the bus. Send Send a copy of the block to the requesting cache. Table 9.3: Glossary of terms used while describing coherence protocols traffic and power utilization significantly. 2. Wheneverawriteisbroadcastonthebus,everycacheneedstocheckwhetheritcontainsthecache block or not. If it does, it needs to update its contents. This increases the contention at every cache and also increases the power utilization significantly. Before proceeding to discuss more efficient protocols, let us conclude this section by providing a glossarythatdefinesallthetermsusedforthestatesandtransitions. Weshallusethesameterminology later as well. Refer to Table 9.3. 9.4.2 Write-Invalidate Protocol using a Bus Themaindrawbackofthewrite-updateprotocolisthatweneedtosendamessageoneverywrite. This increases the power utilization and the bus occupancy significantly. The write-invalidate protocol does not suffer from this problem. To keep matters simple, let us keep the model of the system the same: all the caches are connected to each other using a shared bus. Since every cache can snoop on the bus, this is another example of a snoopy protocol. This protocol has the same three states albeit with different connotations. Basic Insights The insights for this protocol are as follows. The reason that we need to broadcast writes to the rest of the caches is because the rest of the caches need to be kept up to date. Hence, their state needs to be kept updated all the time. The cost of ensuring this is significant, and it encumbers every single write operation. To solve this problem, we need to constrain the process of reading and writing to copies of the same block. Let us thus propose the following set of rules. Single Writer At any point of time, we can at the most have only a single writer for each block and no readers.
translation.ha: Smruti R. Sarangi 464 Ma'anar Kalma Jihohi I Yanayin da Ba shi da inganci. Wannan yana nufin cewa toshe ba ya nan a cikin cache. Yanayin da aka raba. Ana iya karanta toshe  kuma a fitar da shi ba tare da wata matsala ba. Duk da haka, ba za mu iya rubutawa zuwa toshe ba. M Yanayin da aka gyara. Za mu iya karanta ko rubutawa zuwa toshe. Ayyukan cache da abubuwan da suka faru Rd Karanta buƙatar Wr Rubuta buƙatar Korar Korar Buƙatar toshewa. Wb Rubuta mayar da bayanai zuwa ƙasan matakin. Sabuntawa Sabunta kwafin toshewa tare da ƙimar bas ɗin. Saƙonni akan bas RdX Karanta kuskuren WrX Rubuta kuskuren Watsawa Watsawa rubutawa akan bas. Aika Aika kwafin toshewa zuwa cache mai buƙata. Tebur 9.3: Kalmomin kalmomin da aka yi amfani da su yayin da suke bayyana ka'idojin haɗin kai zirga-zirga da amfani da wutar lantarki sosai. 2. Duk lokacin da aka rubuta a kan bas, kowane cache yana buƙatar duba ko yana ɗauke da toshe cache ko a'a. Idan ya yi, yana buƙatar sabuntawa abubuwan da ke ciki. Wannan yana ƙara jayayya a kowane cache kuma yana ƙara yawan amfani da wutar lantarki sosai. Kafin mu ci gaba da tattauna ƙa'idodi mafi inganci, bari mu kammala wannan sashe ta hanyar samar da ƙamus wanda ke bayyana duk kalmomin da ake amfani da su don jihohi da sauye-sauye. Za mu yi amfani da ma'aunin mita daga baya. Duba Tebur 9.3. 9.4.2 Rubuta-Invalid Protocol ta amfani da Bas Babban koma-baya na rubuta-sabuntawa protocolisthatawana buƙatar a rubuta sunan kowane rubutu. Wannan yana ƙara yawan amfani da wutar lantarki da kuma yawan zama a bas ɗin sosai. Tsarin rubuta-invalid ba ya fama da wannan matsalar. Don sauƙaƙa al'amura, bari mu ci gaba da kasancewa iri ɗaya da tsarin <TECH>: duk cache ɗin suna da alaƙa da juna ta amfani da bas ɗin da aka raba. Tunda kowane cache zai iya yin leƙen asiri a cikin bas, wannan wani misali ne na tsarin snoopy. Wannan tsari yana da yanayi uku iri ɗaya duk da cewa yana da ma'anoni daban-daban. Fahimta ta Asali Fahimta ta wannan tsari kamar haka ne. Dalilin da ya sa muke buƙatar watsa rubuce-rubuce ga sauran cache shine saboda sauran cache ɗin suna buƙatar a ci gaba da sabunta su. Saboda haka, yanayin su yana buƙatar a ci gaba da sabunta su koyaushe. Kudin tabbatar da wannan yana da mahimmanci, kuma yana ɗaukar nauyin kowane aikin rubutu. Don magance wannan matsalar, muna buƙatar iyakance tsarin karatu da rubutu zuwa kwafin toshe ɗaya. Don haka bari mu gabatar da waɗannan ƙa'idodi. Marubuci Guda Ɗaya A kowane lokaci, za mu iya samun marubuci ɗaya kawai ga kowane toshe kuma babu masu karatu.

translation.en: 10.Legal and Compliance Professionals: Characteristics: Individuals responsible for ensuring that the · software complies with legal and regulatory standards, particularly regarding patient data and privacy. 11. UX Designers: Characteristics: Design professionals focusing on creating a · user-friendly and accessible interface for patients, doctors, and other users. 2.4 Operating Environment The system will look like an app can be installed from play store or apple store and the application requires network connection it can be installed and used by any phone and computer or laptop. 2.5 Design and Implementation Constraints 1. Technology Stack Limitations: The software must adhere to the designated technology stack, limiting choices in programming languages, frameworks, and libraries. 2. Compatibility with Existing Systems: Design and implementation must ensure compatibility with existing healthcare systems, necessitating adherence to interoperability standards. 3. Budgetary Constraints: Development activities must operate within the allocated budget, influencing technology choices, feature prioritization, and project timelines. 4. Time Constraints: Strict project deadlines may limit the extent of features or refinement in the initial release, requiring a phased development approach. 11

translation.en: Operating Environment The system is to be developed using PHP and JavaScript programming languages with MySQL as the back- end (see the Glossary for explanations of these terms). The system shall be hosted on a Linux operating system running Apache web server and shall be accessible from any web browser. The system is to be designed following the MVC (Model View Controller) framework pattern using the Laravel PHP development framework. Implementing Nigeria’s MFL: Software Requirements Specifications 11

Tsarin   za a za a yi amfani da shi a kan tsarin Linux mai aiki  wanda ke gudana uwar garken yanar gizo Apache da  za a iya samun damar su daga kowace burauzar yanar gizo. Tsarin <TECH> za a tsara shi ne bisa ga tsarin tsarin MVC (Model View Controller) ta amfani da tsarin ci gaban Laravel PHP. Aiwatar da MFL na Najeriya: Bayanan Bukatun Software 11

translation.en: needs to be reordered. • One exception is if the manager has already specified a stop-order for this book. • Every book must either have stop-order enabled or disabled • Allow manager to update stock quantities • Allow manager to change any book's price • Allow manager to view transaction logs • Allow manager to create promotions • A promotion is a percentage discount that can be applied to an entire order • Promotions may only be used by member customers • A promotion has an expiration date specified by the manager When a promotion is created, it is emailed to all member customers via the email address on record 2.3 User Characteristics The typical BECS user is simply anyone that has access to the Internet and a web browser in the computer science department at Michigan State University. It is assumed that the user is familiar enough with a computer to operate the browser, keyboard and mouse and is capable of browsing to, from and within simple websites [1]. 2.4 Constraints As stated by the customer, security is not a concern for this system. The database may store passwords in plain text and there doesn't need to be a password recovery feature nor lockout after numerous invalid login attempts. As such, the system may not work correctly in cases when security is a concern. These cases include those listed above in addition to lack of an encrypted connection when sending credit card information and forcing users to use “strong” passwords. A strong password is a password that meets a number of conditions that are set in place so that user's passwords cannot be easily guessed by an attacker. Generally, these rules include ensuring that the password contains a sufficient number of characters and contains not only lowercase letters but also capitals, numbers, and in some cases, symbols. The system may not behave correctly when used with Internet browsers other than Firefox and Internet Explorer. SCR "Software Cost Reduction (SCR) is a set of techniques for designing software systems developed by David Parnas and researchers from the U.S. Naval Research Laboratory beginning in the late 1970s." [7] Mode Class "A mode class is a finite state machine, with states called system modes" [8] System State The current state or mode that the system is in. The system must be in exactly one state at any moment in time. Event An event is any action that can trigger an action within the software system. Examples include but are not limited to changing values of variables or user-triggered events. Ana ɗauka cewa mai amfani  ya saba da kwamfuta don sarrafa burauzar, madannai da linzamin kwamfuta kuma yana iya bincikawa, daga ciki da cikin gidajen yanar gizo masu sauƙi [1]. 2.4 Takura Kamar yadda abokin ciniki ya bayyana, tsaron ba abin damuwa ba ne ga wannan tsarin <TECH>. Ma’ajiya ta bayanai na iya adana kalmomin shiga a cikin rubutu mai sauƙi kuma ba lallai ne a sami fasalin dawo da kalmar sirri ta  ba ko kuma kullewa bayan yunƙurin shiga <TECH> marasa inganci da yawa. Waɗannan lamuran sun haɗa da waɗanda aka lissafa a sama ban da rashin haɗin da aka ɓoye lokacin aika bayanan katin kiredit <TECH> da kuma tilasta wa masu amfani su yi amfani da kalmomin shiga masu ƙarfi. Kalmar sirri mai ƙarfi  kalmar sirri ce ta  wadda ta cika sharuɗɗa da dama da aka saita don kada mai hari ya iya gane kalmomin shiga na <TECH>mai amfani cikin sauƙi. translation.en: Software Requirements Specification | 4 Introduction Purpose The project aims to introduce an online interactive smart room to provide an effective and modern means of communication. The project will create a learning platform in ways that will save time and make education more attractive. The project will help in engaging more people to the learning process. Objective The project will help in improving the classrooms, training sessions, short courses and workshops. Also, the project can be of use for any group of individuals who wants a unified channel of communication. The project will ease the process of brainstorming and scheduling future meetings, offer smart ways for group generations, and different activities to allow for more engagement among users. The goal is to qualify the application as a good option for corporates and education institutions to reduce the complexity of traditional work and increase productivity and quality of work. Impact The project will enhance and enrich the education by providing a better communication between teachers and students. Also, the project will provide better results in business meetings and workshops through managing the meeting before, during and after. Furthermore, people can be engaged in activities that will get them involved in a more interactive atmosphere. The project will be used by teachers, students, trainers, managers and employees.
translation.ha: Bayanin Bukatun Software | 4 Manufar Gabatarwa Aikin yana da nufin gabatar da ɗaki mai wayo na hulɗa ta yanar gizo don samar da ingantacciyar hanyar sadarwa ta zamani. Aikin zai ƙirƙirar dandamalin koyo ta hanyoyin da za su adana lokaci da kuma sa ilimi ya zama mai kyau. Aikin zai taimaka wajen jawo hankalin mutane da yawa zuwa ga tsarin koyo. Manufa Aikin zai taimaka wajen inganta azuzuwan, zaman horo, gajerun darussa da bita. Haka kuma, aikin zai iya zama da amfani ga kowace ƙungiyar mutane da ke son hanyar sadarwa mai haɗin kai. Aikin zai sauƙaƙa tsarin tunani da tsara tarurruka na gaba, yana ba da hanyoyi masu wayo ga tsararraki na rukuni, da ayyuka daban-daban don ba da damar ƙarin hulɗa tsakanin masu amfani. Manufar ita ce a cancanci aikace-aikacen  a matsayin kyakkyawan zaɓi ga kamfanoni da cibiyoyin ilimi don rage sarkakiyar ayyukan gargajiya da ƙara yawan aiki da ingancin aiki. Tasiri Aikin zai haɓaka da wadatar da ilimi ta hanyar samar da ingantacciyar sadarwa tsakanin malamai da ɗalibai. Hakanan, aikin zai samar da sakamako mafi kyau a tarurrukan kasuwanci da bita ta hanyar gudanar da taron kafin, lokacin da kuma bayan. Bugu da ƙari, mutane za su iya shiga cikin ayyukan da za su sa su shiga cikin yanayi mai hulɗa. Malamai, ɗalibai, masu horarwa, manajoji da ma'aikata za su yi amfani da wannan aikin.

translation.en: P age | 9 ii. Update Policies 1. The administrator shall be able to update policies. This should only be permitted when an update has already been approved through the voting process. 2. The administrator shall be able to alter the category/categories of a policy during updating. Categories are words that define where a policy will be located when viewing/searching policies. 3. The administrator shall be able to alter the tag(s) during updating. Tags are words that serve to connect policies together through a relational database. 4. The administrator shall be able to add and remove supporting documents during updating. 5. The system shall notify relevant users whenever a policy is updated. Relevant users in this case are users who are in the category that the policy pertains to. 6. The system shall record all previous versions of the policy when updated. iii. Manage Policies 1. The administrator shall be able to manage policies. Managing policies refers to general housekeeping functionality relating to policies. 2. The administrator shall be able to view all suggested policies. 3. The administrator shall be able to approve or deny suggested policies. 4. The system will notify a user when their suggested policy is approved or denied. 5. The administrator may toggle the activity status of a policy. The activity status refers to whether the policy is active or inactive in the system. iv. Quizzes 1. The administrator shall be able to create quizzes. Quizzes will be true/false, multiple choice, and/or short answer. 2. The administrator shall be able to assign a time frame for quiz submission. The time frame will consist of a date and time. 3. The administrator shall be able to assign quizzes to different categories of users. Categories are words that define where a policy/user will be located when viewing/searching policies. 4. The administrator shall be able to view quiz analytics. Quiz analytics will include individual user results on a question by question basis. Quiz analytics will also include overall results from entire categories of users on a question by question basis. Incomplete quizzes shall be flagged as such. 5. The administrator shall be able to grade quiz answers. The system shall automatically grade multiple choice and true/false questions, the administrator shall be able to grade short answer questions. 6. The system shall notify users when their quizzes have been graded. 7. The administrator shall able to add comments to quiz answers for the user to see. Comments will be viewable after grade submission. Software Requirements Specification for PNR PMS Fall 2018

Matsayin aiki yana nufin ko manufar tana aiki ko ba ta aiki a cikin tsarin . iv. Tambayoyi 1. Mai gudanarwa na <TECH> zai zai iya ƙirƙirar. Tambayoyi za su kasance gaskiya/ƙarya, zaɓi da yawa, da/ko gajeriyar amsa. 2. Mai gudanarwa na zai zai iya sanya lokacin da za a gabatar da tambayoyi. Tsarin lokaci zai ƙunshi kwanan wata da lokaci. 3. Mai gudanarwa na zai zai iya sanya tambayoyi ga nau'ikan masu amfani daban-daban. Rukuni kalmomi ne da ke bayyana inda za a sami manufa/mai amfani na  lokacin duba/bincika manufofi. 4. Mai gudanarwa na <TECH>zai zai iya duba tambayoyi. Tambayoyi za su haɗa da sakamakon mai amfani na na mutum ɗaya bisa ga tambaya ta tambaya. Nazarin tambayoyi zai kuma haɗa da sakamakon gaba ɗaya daga dukkan rukunan masu amfani bisa ga tambaya bayan tambaya. Za a yi wa tambayoyin <TECH>wanda ba su cika ba alama a matsayin haka. 5. Mai gudanarwa <TECH>zaizai</TECH> zai iya yin maki ga amsoshin tambayoyi. Tsarin zaizai</TECH> zai> yi maki ta atomatik ga tambayoyi da yawa da na gaskiya/ƙarya, mai gudanarwa zaizai</TECH> zai iya yin maki ga tambayoyin amsoshi na gajeru. 6. Tsarin zaizai</TECH> ya sanar da masu amfani lokacin da aka yi maki ga tambayoyinsu. 7. Mai gudanarwa zaizai</TECH> zai iya ƙara tsokaci zuwa amsoshin tambayoyi don mai amfani yaya gani. Za a iya ganin tsokaci bayan an gabatar da maki. Bayanin Bukatun Software don PNR PMS Fall 2018

translation.en: VR (Virtual Reality) - A computer-generated environment experienced through a head- mounted display. VREF (Virtual Reality Equation Facilitator) - The name of the application outlined in this document. VSCode – An integrated development environment with support for various programming languages and workflows. 2. User Requirements 2.1 Summary The system will consider two types of users: the lecturer and the student. Before entering the graphing space, the lecturer will set up a “room” for other students to join by using a room ID. Once in the room, the lecturer will be able to input formulas for which VREF will solve and display to all users. All of the changes to the space and formulas by the lecturer will be propagated to the students in real-time. 2.2 Requirement Elicitation We have met with our primary faculty contact on several occasions to discuss requirements and expectations. As we develop this system, we plan to meet on a bi-weekly basis to evaluate and receive feedback on prototype builds. If time allows, we may also reach out to other math faculty for feedback on VREF. 2.3 High-Level Functionalities 2.3.1 General User Functionality When starting the application, the user will be presented with the main menu. This interface will consist of a mode selector, a server connector, and a room ID selector. Users will specify if they wish to be in lecturer or student mode using the mode selector, input details of the synchronization server to use for this session and choose the room to be part of with the room ID selector. After entering these details and joining a room, the user will be presented with a graphing environment. This environment will have a component for displaying graphed equations, objects, solutions, a component for inputting equations, and a component for modifying the view. Access to some components will be dependent on the user’s role and is outlined in the following sections. 6
translation.ha: VR (Gaskiya ta Kama-da-wane) - Muhalli da kwamfuta ta samar ta hanyar nunin wanda aka ɗora kai. VREF (<TECH>Gaskiya ta Kama-da-wane EMai Sauƙaƙewa) - Sunan aikace-aikacen wanda aka bayyana a cikin wannan takarda. VSCode - Muhalli mai haɗewa tare da tallafi ga harsunan shirye-shirye daban-daban da ayyukan aiki. 2. Bukatun Mai amfani 2.1 Takaitawa Tsarin  zai yi la'akari da nau'ikan masu amfani guda biyu: malami da ɗalibi. Kafin shiga sararin zane, malamin zai kafa "ɗaki" don sauran ɗalibai su shiga ta amfani da ID na ɗaki. Da zarar ya shiga ɗakin, malamin zai iya shigar da dabarun da VREF zai warware kuma ya nuna ga duk masu amfani. Duk canje-canjen da malamin zai yi wa sarari da dabarun za a yaɗa su ga ɗalibai a ainihin lokaci. 2.2 Bukatu Elicitation Mun haɗu da abokin hulɗarmu na farko a fannoni da yawa don tattauna buƙatu da tsammanin. Yayin da muke haɓaka wannan tsarin , muna shirin haɗuwa sau biyu a mako don kimantawa da karɓar ra'ayoyi kan gina samfuri. Idan lokaci ya ba da dama, za mu iya tuntuɓar sauran malamai na lissafi don samun ra'ayoyi kan VREF. 2.3 Ayyukan Mataki na 2.3.1 Aikin Gabaɗaya Mai Amfani Lokacin fara aikace-aikacen , za a gabatar da mai amfani  tare da babban menu. Wannan hanyar sadarwa za ta ƙunshi mai zaɓar yanayi, mai haɗa sabar, da mai zaɓar ID na ɗaki. translation.en: PTAASS - Software Requirement Specification v1.0 1. INTRODUCTION 1.1. Purpose This document represents the Software Requirements Specification (SRS) for the logic sub-component of the BrainTech. It is designed and written for the stakeholders, such as the psychologists, admission staff, and developers involved in the project. Its purpose is to describe the scope, functional and non-functional software requirements, and the design constraints of the whole logic sub-component. Furthermore, this document shows how the system's interfaces are designed in detail. 1.2. Scope This software system is a personality test and admission support system, helping students easily access and understand their personalities and know which universities are suitable for their personality. This system is designed to take full advantage of the Myers–Briggs Type Indicator (MBTI) personality testing method to improve and provide the most accurate personality tests. By maximizing the work of psychologists and admissions staff, the system will meet the demons of students while remaining easy to understand and use. More specifically, based on the personality of the student who participated in the test, the system will make suggestions about the universities that are most suitable for the student. The system will create conditions for students to apply to the suggested majors of thousands of different universities. We have a use-case model that states the correlation relationship between the user and the system, from which we develop a relational database containing the list of Personality Tests, Psychologists, Admissions staff, and types of personality tests. 1.3. Definitions, Acronyms, and Abbreviations Acronym Definition Vietnamese Guest A person is a newbie who has Khách mời never used the website before or is a user without logging in. Authenticated User A person who has previously Người dùng đã chứng thực registered and authorized the site and use some of function that website offers. Student A person who is authorized for the Học Sinh website and is allowed to use all the functions of the website for his own purposes System handler A group outside the website Quản lý hệ thống keeping runs the background in safe 06be-BM/PM/HDCV/FSOFT v1/1 6/63
translation.ha: PTAASS - Software Bukatar Bayani v1.0 1. GABATARWA 1.1. Manufa Wannan takarda tana wakiltar Bayanin Bukatun Software (SRS) don sashin dabaru na sashen dabaru na BrainTech. An tsara ta kuma an rubuta ta ne ga masu ruwa da tsaki, kamar masana ilimin halayyar dan adam, ma'aikatan shiga, da masu haɓakawa da ke da hannu a cikin aikin. Manufarta ita ce bayyana iyakokin, buƙatun software na aiki da waɗanda ba na aiki ba, da iyakokin ƙira na dukkan sashin dabaru na sashen dabaru. Bugu da ƙari, wannan takarda tana nuna yadda aka tsara hanyoyin haɗin tsarin dalla-dalla. 1.2. Faɗi Wannan software tsarin gwaji ne na hali da tallafin shiga tsarin, yana taimaka wa ɗalibai su sami damar fahimtar halayensu cikin sauƙi kuma su san waɗanne jami'o'i ne suka dace da halayensu. An tsara wannan tsarin  ne don amfani da cikakkiyar hanyar gwajin halayen Myers-Briggs (MBTI) don ingantawa da kuma samar da gwaje-gwajen halayen da suka fi dacewa. Ta hanyar haɓaka aikin masana halayyar ɗan adam da ma'aikatan shiga, tsarin <TECH> zai haɗu da aljanu na ɗalibai yayin da yake da sauƙin fahimta da amfani. Musamman ma, bisa ga halayen ɗalibin da ya shiga gwajin, tsarin  zai ba da shawarwari game da jami'o'in da suka fi dacewa da ɗalibi. Tsarin  zai  ƙirƙiri yanayi ga ɗalibai don neman shiga manyan fannoni da aka ba da shawarar na dubban jami'o'i daban-daban. Muna da samfurin amfani wanda ke bayyana alaƙar da ke tsakanin mai amfani da  da tsarin , daga inda muke haɓaka bayanan  na dangantaka wanda ya ƙunshi jerin Gwaje-gwajen Halayyar Mutum, Masana Ilimin Halayyar Dan Adam, ma'aikatan Shiga, da nau'ikan gwaje-gwajen halayen mutum. 1.3. An Tabbatar da Mai Amfani Mutumin da a da ya yi rijista kuma ya ba da izini ga shafin kuma ya yi amfani da wasu ayyukan da gidan yanar gizon ke bayarwa. translation.en: MODULE - 9 Population Composition in India Human Resource District Level Pattern development in India Like Scheduled Castes, district level analysis of Scheduled Tribes reveals that there are different levels of concentration. These levels can be grouped into three categories. They are (i) areas of high concentration; (ii) areas of medium concentration and (iii) areas of low concentration. (i) Areas of High Concentration: There are 40 districts in the country where Scheduled Tribes hold a dominant position. In these 40 districts the share of Notes Scheduled Tribes population to total population ranges from 75.01% to 98.09%. Among them, eight districts are in Mizoram, seven each in Nagaland and Meghalaya, six in Arunachal Pradesh and five in Manipur and the rest seven districts are spread over four states i.e. Jammu and Kashmir, Gujarat, Madhya Pradesh and Chhatisgarh. Serchhip district of Mizoram have highest concentration of tribal population in the country i.e. 98.09% followed by West Khasi hills of Meghalaya having 98.02% of tribal population. (ii) Areas of Moderate Concentration : In these regions the share of tribal population varies between 25.01% to 75.00% of total population. This include 85 districts belonging to 17 states and Union Territories of the country. Spatially, the major occupancy is constituted by the districts from the states of Madhya Pradesh and Orissa (14 each), Chhatisgarh (10), Jharkhand (8) and Arunachal Pradesh and Gujarat (7 each). (iii) Areas of low concentration : In this region the proportion of tribal population varies from 5.00-25.00 percent. This holds the highest number of 140 districts in the country. These districts are distributed among 18 States/ Union Territories. The spatial pattern of districts in this region may be seen in Madhya Pradesh (18), Maharashtra and Rajasthan (17 each), Karnataka (14), Assam (13), Andhra Pradesh, West Bengal and Orissa (10 each), Jharkhand (8), Jammu and Kashmir (6) and Chhatisgarh (5). Remainng are scattered in Gujarat and Sikkim (3 each) Uttarakhand (2), and Manipur, Kerala, Daman and Diu, and Bihar (One each). Apart from this there are as many as 143 districts spread over 18 States and Union Territories where tribal population are found whose range varies between 0.5% to 5.00%. 27.7 LITERACY Literacy is generally defined as a person’s ability to read, write and able to understand as well as to do some simple calculation. Despite this liberal definition, the rate of literacy in India is not very high. According to the Census of India 2001, the average literacy rate in India is 65.38 percent. This percentage does not include the population below 7 years of age-group. The rate of literacy varies a great deal from one part of the country to the other. On the one hand, it is the state of Kerala having literacy rate as high as the 90.92 percent and on the other extreme is the state of Bihar, where this rate is only 47.53 percent. In the Union Territories, Lakshadweep has the highest rate of literacy where it is 87.52 percent and the lowest rate is in Dadra & Nagar Haveli (60.03 percent). 278 GEOGRAPHY
translation.ha: MASU KYAU - Tsarin Yawan Jama'a 9 a Indiya Tsarin Tsarin Yankin Albarkatun Dan Adam a Indiya Kamar Tsarin Yankin da aka Tsara, nazarin matakin gunduma na Kabilun da aka Tsara ya nuna cewa akwai matakai daban-daban na tattarawa. Ana iya raba waɗannan matakan zuwa rukuni uku. Su ne (i) yankunan da aka tsara mai yawa; (ii) yankunan da aka tsara mai matsakaici da (iii) yankunan da ba su da isasshen tattarawa. (i) Yankunan da aka tsara mai yawa: Akwai gundumomi 40 a ƙasar inda Kabilun da aka Tsara suke da matsayi mafi rinjaye. A cikin waɗannan gundumomi 40, rabon adadin Kabilun da aka Tsara mai yawa ya kama daga 75.01% zuwa 98.09%. Daga cikinsu, gundumomi takwas suna cikin Mizoram, bakwai kowannensu a Nagaland da Meghalaya, shida a Arunachal Pradesh da biyar a Manipur kuma sauran gundumomi bakwai sun bazu a jihohi huɗu wato Jammu da Kashmir, Gujarat, Madhya Pradesh da Chhatisgarh. Gundumar Serchhip ta Mizoram tana da mafi yawan yawan kabilu a ƙasar wato kashi 98.09% sai kuma tsaunukan Yammacin Khasi na Meghalaya da ke da kashi 98.02% na yawan kabilu. (ii) Yankunan da ke da matsakaicin yawan jama'a: A waɗannan yankuna, yawan jama'ar ƙabilu ya bambanta tsakanin kashi 25.01% zuwa 75.00% na jimillar jama'a. Wannan ya haɗa da gundumomi 85 da ke cikin jihohi 17 da yankunan Tarayyar ƙasar. A fannin yanayi, mafi yawan mazauna yankin sun ƙunshi gundumomi daga jihohin Madhya Pradesh da Orissa (kowannensu 14), Chhatisgarh (10), Jharkhand (8) da Arunachal Pradesh da Gujarat (kowannensu 7). (iii) Yankunan da ba su da ƙarancin yawan jama'a: A wannan yankin, yawan jama'ar ƙabilu ya bambanta daga kashi 5.00-25.00. Wannan yana ɗauke da mafi yawan gundumomi 140 a ƙasar. Waɗannan gundumomi an rarraba su tsakanin Jihohi/Yankunan Tarayyar 18. Tsarin sararin samaniya na gundumomi a wannan yanki na iya za a iya gani a Madhya Pradesh (18), Maharashtra da Rajasthan (17 kowanne), Karnataka (14), Assam (13), Andhra Pradesh, West Bengal da Orissa (10 kowanne), Jharkhand (8), Jammu da Kashmir (6) da Chhatisgarh (5). Sauran sun bazu a Gujarat da Sikkim (3 kowanne) Uttarakhand (2), da Manipur, Kerala, Daman da Diu, da Bihar (Ɗaya kowanne). Baya ga wannan akwai gundumomi 143 da suka bazu a jihohi 18 da yankunan Tarayyar Turai inda ake samun yawan kabilu waɗanda yawansu ya bambanta tsakanin 0.5% zuwa 5.00%. 27.7 KARATUN ILMI Ana bayyana Karatu a matsayin ikon mutum na karatu, rubutu da kuma iya fahimta da kuma yin wasu ƙididdiga masu sauƙi. Duk da wannan ma'anar sassaucin ra'ayi, yawan karatu da rubutu a Indiya ba shi da yawa. A bisa ga ƙidayar jama'a ta Indiya ta shekarar 2001, matsakaicin adadin masu karatu da rubutu a Indiya shine kashi 65.38. Wannan kaso bai haɗa da yawan jama'a 'yan ƙasa da shekara 7 ba. Yawan masu karatu da rubutu ya bambanta sosai daga wani yanki na ƙasar zuwa wani. A gefe guda, jihar Kerala ce ke da yawan masu karatu da rubutu har zuwa kashi 90.92, a gefe guda kuma jihar Bihar ce, inda wannan adadin yake kashi 47.53 kacal. A Yankin Tarayyar Turai, Lakshadweep tana da mafi girman adadin masu karatu da rubutu inda take da kashi 87.52, kuma mafi ƙanƙanta yana cikin Dadra & Nagar Haveli (kashi 60.03). 278 GEOGRAPHY

Acronyms Acronym CSS Cascading Style Sheets CSV Comma Separated Values HTML Hypertext Markup Language HTTPS Hypertext Transfer Protocol Secure JS JavaScript RAM Random Access Memory UI User Interface 2. Overall Description 2.1. User Needs The webinar web application will be used by users who could efficiently and easily search, register, and attend various webinars that are of their interests, while organizers will be promoting and posting their online events and webinars that are open to be participated by either a specific audience or the public. 2.2. Assumptions and Dependencies It is assumed that the users are familiar with using the browser to access the web application. It is also assumed that they have basic knowledge on how to operate and navigate the web application through their gadget of choice (i.e. handling the mouse and keyboard when using a desktop or a laptop). In addition, since the web application needs internet connection for users to access it, it is assumed that they have access to it prior to going to our web application. The web application is dependent on the backend framework used, which is Django for this case, its corresponding database and authentication system, and the built web application reused from CMSC 126 submission. 3. System Features and Requirements 3.1. Functional Requirements The general functional requirements for the web application are listed below this section. The detailed functional requirements are included in the system features of the web application. Page | 4

translation.en: Movie Ticketing System 1. Launch Website 2. Login, register a user account, or access as guest 3. Select desired movie and theater location based on zip code 4. Select desired seat and get ticket information 5. Add to shopping cart and proceed to Payment Page 6. Input, verify, and system processes paymentTicket Purchase Flow 7. Ticket Status Updated to Booked: check if selecting a movie ticket correctly leads to payment processing, updates ticket status, and generates a transaction. 8. Transaction record is created a logged, user gets confirmation and ticket delivery 5.1.1.3 Expected Result User is able to successfully select seats and movie details Payment processing is successful and user receives confirmation and ticket. Ticket and UserAccount Databases and status are updated Transaction is created and stored 5.2 Functional / Integration Test Cases 5.2.2 Test Case #6 Verify Seat Reservation 5.2.2.1 Test Description Confirm as soon as a ticket is added to cart, it is reserved on a timer, and cannot be booked by other users while it is reserved. 5.2.2.2 Test Steps 1. User A and User B launch website from different devices 2. User A and B both go to select the same seat 3. User A adds ticket to cart before User B 4. Ticket becomes unavailable for User B to add to cart 5. 15 minute timer begins for User A to checkout with ticket 6. If payment not completed within timer, ticket becomes available again. 5.2.2.3 Expected Result User B should receive a popup/message that the ticket is no longer available. 5.2.3 Test Case #7 Verify Loyalty Points 5.2.3.1 Test Description Verify that users can redeem loyalty points for discounts on ticket prices. 5.2.3.2 Test Steps 1. User logs into account and selects movie ticket 2. User continues to payment page 3. Clicks "redeem points" option at checkout page 4. System applies a discount based on available points 5. Completes discounted payment 5.2.3.3 Expected Result Software Requirements Specification Page 21

translation.en: Software RequirementsSpecificationforStudentAssistant Page12 The Student Assistant is built specifically for the Android operating system, intended for use on Android-based smartphones and tablets. However, if the project is completed on optimistic estimation, the product shall also be developed for IOS based Operating Systems using XCode development Environment. It makes extensive use of Python for data analysis and AI components, enabling advanced analysis and AI-driven features within the application. The integration with the Gmail API ensures efficient email extraction from Gmail accounts. The reliable availability of internet connectivity is essential to maintain real-time features and keep the application up to date. 2.5 Design and Implementation Constraints  Corporate and Regulatory Policies: The project must adhere to the corporate policies of the university, including data security and privacy regulations. Compliance with relevant data protection and privacy laws is mandatory.  Hardware Limitations: The application's performance will be influenced by the hardware capabilities of the user's device. To ensure usability on a wide range of Android devices, the application must be optimized for devices with varying memory and processing capabilities.  Interfaces to Other Applications: The integration with the Gmail API for email extraction is subject to the availability and functionality of this external service. Any changes or limitations in the Gmail API could affect the application's email extraction capabilities. Specific Technologies and Tools: The use of Kotlin for Android development, Python for data analysis and AI components, and Java Runtime Environment (JRE) for the AI component are predetermined technologies.  Parallel Operations:

translation.en: Human Settlement MODULE - 9 Human resource Bengal, eastern Uttar Pradesh, Madhya Pradesh and coastal plains. development in India Geographically it covers lower Ganga plain, lower valleys of the Himalayas and central plateau or upland region of the country. 4. Dispersed Settlements: This is also known as isolated settlements. Here the settlement is characterized by units of small size which may consist of a single house to a small group of houses. It varies from two to seven huts. Therefore, in this type, hamlets are scattered over a vast area and does not Notes have any specific pattern. Such type of settlements are found in tribal areas of central part of India covering Chhota Nagpur plateau, Madhya Pradesh, Rajasthan, etc. Such patterns are also common in the hills of north Bengal, Jammu & Kashmir, Tamil Nadu and Kerala. INTEXT QUESTIONS 29.1 1. Answer the following questions in not more than one sentence (i) What is a settlement. ___________________________________________________ (ii) What are the two major basis on which we differentiate between rural and Urban settlements? (a) ________________________ (b) _______________________ (iii) Name the four broad categories on which rural settlements in India are grouped. (a) ________ (b) _________ (c) __________ (d) ___________ (iv) Which type of settlement has maximum area coverage in India? ___________________________________________________ (v) Describe hamleted settlements. ___________________________________________________ (vi) Where do we find dispersed settlements ? Give two examples? (a) _________________________________________________ (b) __________________________________________________ 29.3 FACTORS INFLUENCING THE TYPE OF RURAL SETTLEMENTS There are three factors that influence the type of settlements in India. These factors are (i) Physical (ii) Ethnic or cultural and (iii) Historical or defence. Let us discuss these factors one by one. GEOGRAPHY 305

Mazaunin da aka Warwatse: Wannan kuma an san shi da matsugunan da aka keɓe. A nan mazaunin yana da siffa ta ƙananan girma waɗanda na iya ya ƙunshi gida ɗaya zuwa ƙaramin rukuni na gidaje. Ya bambanta daga bukkoki biyu zuwa bakwai. Saboda haka, a cikin wannan nau'in, ƙauyuka suna warwatse a kan babban yanki kuma ba shi da takamaiman tsari. Irin waɗannan mazaunin ana samun su a yankunan ƙabilu na tsakiyar yankin Indiya waɗanda suka rufe tsaunin Chhota Nagpur, Madhya Pradesh, Rajasthan, da sauransu. Irin waɗannan tsare-tsare kuma sun zama ruwan dare a tsaunukan arewacin Bengal, Jammu & Kashmir, Tamil Nadu da Kerala. TAMBAYOYIN RUBUTU 29.1 1. translation.en: Sport Facility Booking System Kirtan Shah 4 Product Scenarios 4a Product Scenario List 1. Facility booking by an user 2. Facility management by staff 3. Reporting and analysing the use of the facility by the manager 4. Scheduling an event 4b Individual Product Scenario 1. Facility booking by an user Scenario: A tennis player, wants to book a court to play a match with his friend the next morning. He opens the application and logs into his account. On the home page, he selects the location to view the nearby facility listings. He further opts to use the filter to see only the facilities that have tennis courts. He selects the facility of his choice then selects the date and time slot he wants to select. Then he gets a choice of courts that he can select in the facility. After selecting the date, time and court he is then redirected to the payment page. After successful payment he receives an email for successful confirmation of his booking. 2. Facility management by staff Scenario: The facility staff member, wants to perform maintenance on his courts. He logs into the system and accesses the booking schedule. He checks the calendar to check for the date and time with no current bookings made. He hires the maintenance crew to arrive at the time with no bookings made. He then inputs the time slots on that day as booked so that no other further reservations are made at that time period. 3. Reporting and analysing the use of the facility by the manager Scenario: The facility owner, wants to make a monthly report on facility usage and revenue. He logs into the system and checks the total time the facility was booked in the past month, the total revenue generated for the whole month, and also the time of the day that the facility was booked the most for. Such analytics helps him to create a monthly report that helps the team in strategic planning for the upcoming month. 7

Sannan yana shigar da lokutan da aka yi rajista a wannan ranar don kada a sake yin rajista a wannan lokacin. 3. Yana shiga cikin tsarin  kuma yana duba jimillar lokacin da aka yi rajista a cikin watan da ya gabata, jimillar kuɗin shiga da aka samu na tsawon watan, da kuma lokacin da aka fi yin rajista a wurin. translation.en: Humidity and Precipitation MODULE - 4 The domain of Air on they form. the Earth To an observer directly beneath, a cumulonimbus cloud may cover the whole sky and have the appearance of Nimbostratus, The word nimbus (or prefix nimbo) applies to a cloud from which rain is falling. It derives from the Latin for “violent rain”. Notes Medium clouds: These clouds are formed at altitudes between 2000 to 6000 metres. This group of clouds include altocumulus and altostratus. High clouds: These clouds are formed above the altitude of 6000 metres and include cirrus, cirrostratus and cirrocumulus (see fig. 12.2). Fig. 12.2 : Cloud types are grouped into families according to height and form  Forms of condensation include dew, frost, mist, fog, smog and clouds.  Frost and some clouds are formed when condensation takes place below freezing point.  Clouds are grouped into three types on the basis of appearance and altitude.
